1.Name: Airlift
1.Credit: Dir: Raja Menon With: Akshay Kumar, Nimrat Kaur, Taranjit Kaur
1.Outline: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August, 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

2.Name: Inception
2.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
2.Outline: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

3.Name: Drishyam
3.Credit: Dir: Nishikant Kamat With: Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran, Tabu
3.Outline: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

4.Name: Vishwaroopam
4.Credit: Dir: Kamal Haasan With: Pooja Kumar, Miles Anderson, Kamal Haasan
4.Outline: Vishwanathan, a Kathak dance teacher in New York, is in a rather happy marriage with Nirupama who is a nuclear oncologist...

5.Name: Se7en
5.Credit: Dir: David Fincher With: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey
5.Outline: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

6.Name: The Usual Suspects
6.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri
6.Outline: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which begin when five criminals meet at a seemingly random police lineup.

7.Credit: Dir: Sukumar With: Mahesh Babu, Kriti Sanon, Nasser
7.Outline: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.

8.Name: The Silence of the Lambs
8.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Demme With: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney
8.Outline: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

9.Name: Léon: The Professional
9.Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman
9.Outline: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by LÃ©on, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. LÃ©on and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protÃ©gÃ©e and learns the assassin's trade.

10.Name: Hera Pheri
10.Credit: Dir: Priyadarshan With: Akshay Kumar, Paresh Rawal, Sunil Shetty
10.Outline: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they recieve a call from a kidnapper. However, things do not go as planned...

11.Name: The Bandit
11.Credit: Dir: Yavuz Turgul With: Sener Sen, Ugur YÃ¼cel, Sermin HÃ¼rmeric
11.Outline: The epic adventures of the legendary Baran the Bandit following his release from prison. After serving 35 years...

12.Name: Psycho
12.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles
12.Outline: A Phoenix secretary steals $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

13.Name: Rear Window
13.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey
13.Outline: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

14.Name: The Departed
14.Credit: Dir: Martin Scorsese With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson
14.Outline: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

15.Name: Memento
15.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano
15.Outline: A man creates a strange system to help him remember things; so he can hunt for the murderer of his wife without his short-term memory loss being an obstacle.

16.Name: The Prestige
16.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson
16.Outline: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.

17.Name: Waar
17.Credit: Dir: Bilal Lashari With: Shaan Shahid, Hamza Abbasi, Shamoon Abbasi
17.Outline: The efforts of the Pakistani security forces in their fight against terrorism and how the lives of security officials are affected. A retired security officer returns to save Pakistan from a major terrorist attack.

18.Name: The Dark Knight Rises
18.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway
18.Outline: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight, with the help of the enigmatic Selina, is forced from his imposed exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

19.Name: Sholay
19.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Musical | Thriller
19.Credit: Dir: Ramesh Sippy With: Dharmendra, Sanjeev Kumar, Hema Malini
19.Outline: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture him.

20.Name: The Lives of Others
20.Credit: Dir: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck With: Ulrich MÃ¼he, Martina Gedeck, Sebastian Koch
20.Outline: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

21.Name: A Wednesday
21.Credit: Dir: Neeraj Pandey With: Anupam Kher, Naseeruddin Shah, Jimmy Shergill
21.Outline: A retiring police officer reminisces the most astounding day of his career, about a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

22.Name: Witness for the Prosecution
22.Credit: Dir: Billy Wilder With: Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich, Charles Laughton
22.Outline: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

23.Name: Das Boot
23.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: JÃ¼rgen Prochnow, Herbert GrÃ¶nemeyer, Klaus Wennemann
23.Outline: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

24.Name: M
24.Credit: Dir: Fritz Lang With: Peter Lorre, Ellen Widmann, Inge Landgut
24.Outline: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

25.Name: Oldboy
25.Credit: Dir: Chan-wook Park With: Min-sik Choi, Ji-tae Yu, Hye-jeong Kang
25.Outline: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

26.Name: North by Northwest
26.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason
26.Outline: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

27.Name: Vertigo
27.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes
27.Outline: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

28.Name: Double Indemnity
28.Credit: Dir: Billy Wilder With: Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson
28.Outline: An insurance representative lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

29.Name: Reservoir Dogs
29.Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen
29.Outline: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

30.Name: Gangs of Wasseypur
30.Credit: Dir: Anurag Kashyap With: Manoj Bajpayee, Richa Chadha, Nawazuddin Siddiqui
30.Outline: A clash between Sultan (a Qureishi dacoit chief) and Shahid Khan (a Pathan who impersonates him) leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

31.Name: Haider
31.Credit: Dir: Vishal Bhardwaj With: Shahid Kapoor, Tabu, Shraddha Kapoor
31.Outline: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle - the man he suspects to have a role in his father's fate.

32.Name: The Third Man
32.Credit: Dir: Carol Reed With: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli
32.Outline: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

33.Name: L.A. Confidential
33.Credit: Dir: Curtis Hanson With: Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce
33.Outline: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

34.Name: The Great Escape
34.Credit: Dir: John Sturges With: Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough
34.Outline: Allied P.O.W.s plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

35.Name: Kahaani
35.Credit: Dir: Sujoy Ghosh With: Vidya Balan, Parambrata Chatterjee, Dhritiman Chatterjee
35.Outline: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met her husband.

36.Name: Chinatown
36.Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston
36.Outline: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption and murder.

37.Name: Heat
37.Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer
37.Outline: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

38.Name: Die Hard
38.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia
38.Outline: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

39.Name: The Secret in Their Eyes
39.Credit: Dir: Juan JosÃ© Campanella With: Ricardo DarÃ­n, Soledad Villamil, Pablo Rago
39.Outline: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

40.Name: Blade Runner
40.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young
40.Outline: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

41.Name: V for Vendetta
41.Credit: Dir: James McTeigue With: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves
41.Outline: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

42.Name: The Wages of Fear
42.Credit: Dir: Henri-Georges Clouzot With: Yves Montand, Charles Vanel, Peter van Eyck
42.Outline: In a decrepit South American village, men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

43.Name: Rebecca
43.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine, George Sanders
43.Outline: A self-conscious bride is tormented by the memory of her husband's dead first wife.

44.Name: Dial M for Murder
44.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Ray Milland, Grace Kelly, Robert Cummings
44.Outline: An ex-tennis pro carries out a plot to murder his wife. When things go wrong, he improvises a brilliant plan B.

45.Name: Baby
45.Credit: Dir: Neeraj Pandey With: Danny Denzongpa, Rana Daggubati, Akshay Kumar
45.Outline: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

46.Name: The Revenant
46.Credit: Dir: Alejandro GonzÃ¡lez IÃ±Ã¡rritu With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Will Poulter
46.Outline: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

47.Name: Fargo
47.Credit: Dir: Joel Coen With: William H. Macy, Frances McDormand, Steve Buscemi
47.Outline: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

48.Name: Persona
48.Credit: Dir: Ingmar Bergman With: Bibi Andersson, Liv Ullmann, Margaretha Krook
48.Outline: A nurse is put in charge of an actress who can't talk and finds that the actress's persona is melding with hers.

49.Name: The Sixth Sense
49.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette
49.Outline: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

50.Name: Mad Max: Fury Road
50.Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult
50.Outline: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

51.Name: Gone Girl
51.Credit: Dir: David Fincher With: Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike, Neil Patrick Harris
51.Outline: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

52.Name: Wild Tales
52.Credit: Dir: DamiÃ¡n SzifrÃ³n With: DarÃ­o Grandinetti, MarÃ­a Marull, MÃ³nica Villa
52.Outline: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

53.Name: No Country for Old Men
53.Credit: Dir: Ethan Coen, Joel Coen With: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin

54.Name: Diabolique
54.Credit: Dir: Henri-Georges Clouzot With: Simone Signoret, VÃ©ra Clouzot, Paul Meurisse
54.Outline: The wife of a cruel headmaster and his mistress conspire to kill him, but after the murder is committed, his body disappears, and strange events begin to plague the two women.

55.Name: Touch of Evil
55.Credit: Dir: Orson Welles With: Charlton Heston, Orson Welles, Janet Leigh
55.Outline: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

56.Name: Amores Perros
56.Credit: Dir: Alejandro GonzÃ¡lez IÃ±Ã¡rritu With: Emilio EchevarrÃ­a, Gael GarcÃ­a Bernal, Goya Toledo
56.Outline: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

57.Name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
57.Credit: Dir: Robert Aldrich With: Bette Davis, Joan Crawford, Victor Buono
57.Outline: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

58.Name: Shutter Island
58.Credit: Dir: Martin Scorsese With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo
58.Outline: A U.S Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

59.Name: Memories of Murder
59.Credit: Dir: Joon Ho Bong With: Kang-ho Song, Sang-kyung Kim, Roe-ha Kim
59.Outline: In 1986, in the province of Gyunggi, in South Korea, a second young and beautiful woman is found dead...

60.Name: Le Samouraï
60.Credit: Dir: Jean-Pierre Melville With: Alain Delon, Nathalie Delon, FranÃ§ois PÃ©rier
60.Outline: After killing a night-club owner, professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses. His efforts to provide himself with an alibi fail and more and more he gets driven into a corner.

61.Name: Infernal Affairs
61.Credit: Dir: Wai-Keung Lau, Alan Mak With: Andy Lau, Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Anthony Chau-Sang Wong
61.Outline: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.

62.Name: Donnie Darko
62.Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Jena Malone, Mary McDonnell
62.Outline: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.

63.Name: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
63.Credit: Dir: Robert Wiene With: Werner Krauss, Conrad Veidt, Friedrich Feher
63.Outline: Dr. Caligari's somnambulist, Cesare, and his deadly predictions.

64.Name: Sleuth
64.Credit: Dir: Joseph L. Mankiewicz With: Laurence Olivier, Michael Caine, Alec Cawthorne
64.Outline: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

65.Name: Elite Squad: The Enemy Within
65.Credit: Dir: JosÃ© Padilha With: Wagner Moura, Irandhir Santos, AndrÃ© Ramiro
65.Outline: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

66.Name: Jurassic Park
66.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
66.Outline: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

67.Name: The Bourne Ultimatum
67.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: Matt Damon, Edgar Ramirez, Joan Allen
67.Outline: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

68.Name: Strangers on a Train
68.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Farley Granger, Robert Walker, Ruth Roman
68.Outline: A psychotic socialite confronts a pro tennis star with a theory on how two complete strangers can get away with murder - a theory that he plans to implement.

69.Name: Elite Squad
69.Credit: Dir: JosÃ© Padilha With: Wagner Moura, AndrÃ© Ramiro, Caio Junqueira
69.Outline: 1997, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his occupation while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope comes to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

70.Name: The Imitation Game
70.Credit: Dir: Morten Tyldum With: Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode
70.Outline: During World War II, mathematician Alan Turing tries to crack the enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

71.Name: Anatomy of a Murder
71.Credit: Dir: Otto Preminger With: James Stewart, Lee Remick, Ben Gazzara
71.Outline: In a murder trial, the defendant says he suffered temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

72.Name: Sin City
72.Credit: Dir: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez With: Mickey Rourke, Clive Owen, Bruce Willis
72.Outline: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

73.Name: Arsenic and Old Lace
73.Credit: Dir: Frank Capra With: Cary Grant, Priscilla Lane, Raymond Massey
73.Outline: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

74.Name: The Night of the Hunter
74.Credit: Dir: Charles Laughton With: Robert Mitchum, Shelley Winters, Lillian Gish
74.Outline: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

75.Name: Twelve Monkeys
75.Credit: Dir: Terry Gilliam With: Bruce Willis, Madeleine Stowe, Brad Pitt
75.Outline: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

76.Name: Prisoners
76.Credit: Dir: Denis Villeneuve With: Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal, Viola Davis
76.Outline: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?

77.Name: Notorious
77.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Cary Grant, Ingrid Bergman, Claude Rains
77.Outline: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

78.Name: The Big Sleep
78.Credit: Dir: Howard Hawks With: Humphrey Bogart, Lauren Bacall, John Ridgely
78.Outline: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

79.Name: The Killing
79.Credit: Dir: Stanley Kubrick With: Sterling Hayden, Coleen Gray, Vince Edwards
79.Outline: Crooks plan and execute a daring race-track robbery.

80.Name: Jaws
80.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss
80.Outline: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and a grizzled fisherman set out to stop it.

81.Name: X-Men: Days of Future Past
81.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Hugh Jackman
81.Outline: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

82.Name: The Manchurian Candidate
82.Credit: Dir: John Frankenheimer With: Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh
82.Outline: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

83.Name: Rope
83.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: James Stewart, John Dall, Farley Granger
83.Outline: Two young men strangle their "inferior" classmate, hide his body in their apartment, and invite his friends and family to a dinner party as a means to challenge the "perfection" of their crime.

84.Name: Blood Diamond
84.Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou, Jennifer Connelly
84.Outline: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

85.Name: Special 26
85.Credit: Dir: Neeraj Pandey With: Anupam Kher, Manoj Bajpayee, Akshay Kumar
85.Outline: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

86.Name: The Return
86.Credit: Dir: Andrey Zvyagintsev With: Vladimir Garin, Ivan Dobronravov, Konstantin Lavronenko
86.Outline: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.

87.Name: JFK
87.Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Kevin Costner, Gary Oldman, Jack Lemmon
87.Outline: A New Orleans DA discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

88.Name: The Raid 2
88.Credit: Dir: Gareth Evans With: Iko Uwais, Yayan Ruhian, Arifin Putra
88.Outline: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

89.Name: Ghost in the Shell
89.Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Atsuko Tanaka, Iemasa Kayumi, Akio Ãtsuka
89.Outline: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

90.Name: All the President's Men
90.Credit: Dir: Alan J. Pakula With: Dustin Hoffman, Robert Redford, Jack Warden
90.Outline: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon 's resignation.

91.Name: Charade
91.Credit: Dir: Stanley Donen With: Cary Grant, Audrey Hepburn, Walter Matthau
91.Outline: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Who can she trust?

92.Name: In the Heat of the Night
92.Credit: Dir: Norman Jewison With: Sidney Poitier, Rod Steiger, Warren Oates
92.Outline: An African American police detective is asked to investigate a murder in a racially hostile southern town.

93.Name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
93.Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Michael Madsen
93.Outline: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

94.Name: Black Swan
94.Credit: Dir: Darren Aronofsky With: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel
94.Outline: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

95.Name: Shadow of a Doubt
95.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Teresa Wright, Joseph Cotten, Macdonald Carey
95.Outline: A young woman discovers her visiting "Uncle Charlie" may not be the man he seems to be.

96.Name: Casino Royale
96.Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Judi Dench
96.Outline: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.

97.Name: Mystic River
97.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Sean Penn, Tim Robbins, Kevin Bacon
97.Outline: With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one has a family tragedy.

98.Name: My Name Is Khan
98.Credit: Dir: Karan Johar With: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Sheetal Menon
98.Outline: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President seriously, and embarks on a cross-country journey.

99.Name: The Lady Vanishes
99.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Margaret Lockwood, Michael Redgrave, Paul Lukas
99.Outline: While traveling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

100.Name: Mulholland Dr.
100.Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Naomi Watts, Laura Harring, Justin Theroux
100.Outline: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

101.Name: Serenity
101.Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Nathan Fillion, Gina Torres, Chiwetel Ejiofor
101.Outline: The crew of the ship Serenity tries to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their number who is telepathic.

102.Name: True Romance
102.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper
102.Outline: Clarence marries hooker Alabama, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood, while the owners of the coke try to reclaim it.

103.Name: The Untouchables
103.Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Kevin Costner, Sean Connery, Robert De Niro
103.Outline: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

104.Name: The Hateful Eight
104.Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh
104.Outline: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

105.Name: The Conversation
105.Credit: Dir: Francis Ford Coppola With: Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Allen Garfield
105.Outline: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that a couple he is spying on will be murdered.

106.Name: Nine Queens
106.Credit: Dir: FabiÃ¡n Bielinsky With: Ricardo DarÃ­n, GastÃ³n Pauls, Leticia BrÃ©dice
106.Outline: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

107.Name: The Bourne Identity
107.Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Franka Potente, Matt Damon, Chris Cooper
107.Outline: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and regain his memory.

108.Name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
108.Genre: Animation | Action | Crime | Drama | Sci-Fi | Thriller
108.Credit: Dir: ShinichirÃ´ Watanabe With: Beau Billingslea, Melissa Fahn, Nicholas Guest
108.Outline: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

109.Name: Key Largo
109.Credit: Dir: John Huston With: Humphrey Bogart, Edward G. Robinson, Lauren Bacall
109.Outline: A man visits his old friend's hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

110.Name: The Chaser
110.Credit: Dir: Hong-jin Na With: Yun-seok Kim, Jung-woo Ha, Yeong-hie Seo
110.Outline: A cash-strapped pimp and former police detective draws upon the skills of his old job to track down his missing stable of prostitutes.

111.Name: Children of Men
111.Credit: Dir: Alfonso CuarÃ³n With: Julianne Moore, Clive Owen, Chiwetel Ejiofor
111.Outline: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

112.Name: Ninja Scroll
112.Credit: Dir: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Kevin Seymour With: Stephen Apostolina, Dean Wein, Wendee Lee
112.Outline: A mysterious vagabond sets out on a journey to confront his past. Little does he know he is up against a demonic force of killers, with a ghost from his past as the leader.

113.Name: The Killer
113.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Yun-Fat Chow, Danny Lee, Sally Yeh
113.Outline: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded, only to be double-crossed by his boss.

114.Name: Hard Boiled
114.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Yun-Fat Chow, Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Teresa Mo
114.Outline: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

115.Name: The Insider
115.Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Russell Crowe, Al Pacino, Christopher Plummer
115.Outline: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

116.Name: The Boondock Saints
116.Credit: Dir: Troy Duffy With: Willem Dafoe, Sean Patrick Flanery, Norman Reedus
116.Outline: Fraternal twins set out to rid Boston of the evil men operating there while being tracked down by an FBI agent.

117.Name: Nightcrawler
117.Credit: Dir: Dan Gilroy With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo, Bill Paxton
117.Outline: When Louis Bloom, a driven man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story. Aiding him in his effort is Nina, a TV-news veteran.

118.Name: Miller's Crossing
118.Credit: Dir: Joel Coen With: Gabriel Byrne, Albert Finney, John Turturro
118.Outline: Tom Regan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

119.Name: Halloween
119.Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tony Moran
119.Outline: On Halloween night of 1963, 6-year old Michael Myers stabbed his sister to death. After sitting in a mental hospital for 15 years, Myers escapes and returns to Haddonfield to kill.

120.Name: The Man from Nowhere
120.Credit: Dir: Jeong-beom Lee With: Bin Won, Sae-ron Kim, Tae-hoon Kim
120.Outline: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

121.Name: Captain Phillips
121.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: Tom Hanks, Barkhad Abdi, Barkhad Abdirahman
121.Outline: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the US-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

122.Name: Taken
122.Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: Liam Neeson, Maggie Grace, Famke Janssen
122.Outline: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

123.Name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
123.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Family | Mystery | Romance | Sci-Fi | Thriller
123.Credit: Dir: Eric Radomski, Bruce W. Timm With: Kevin Conroy, Dana Delany, Hart Bochner
123.Outline: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

124.Name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
124.Credit: Dir: Niels Arden Oplev With: Michael Nyqvist, Noomi Rapace, Ewa FrÃ¶ling
124.Outline: A journalist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing -- or dead -- for forty years by a young female hacker.

125.Name: Gravity
125.Credit: Dir: Alfonso CuarÃ³n With: Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris
125.Outline: A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.

126.Name: Confessions
126.Credit: Dir: Tetsuya Nakashima With: Takako Matsu, Yoshino Kimura, Masaki Okada
126.Outline: A psychological thriller of a grieving mother turned cold-blooded avenger with a twisty master plan to pay back those who were responsible for her daughter's death.

127.Name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
127.Credit: Dir: David Fincher With: Daniel Craig, Rooney Mara, Christopher Plummer
127.Outline: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

128.Name: The Day of the Jackal
128.Credit: Dir: Fred Zinnemann With: Edward Fox, Terence Alexander, Michel Auclair
128.Outline: A professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" plots to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

129.Name: I Saw the Devil
129.Credit: Dir: Jee-woon Kim With: Byung-hun Lee, Min-sik Choi, In-seo Kim
129.Outline: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

130.Name: The 39 Steps
130.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Robert Donat, Madeleine Carroll, Lucie Mannheim
130.Outline: A man in London tries to help a counterespionage agent. But when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to both save himself and also stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

131.Name: Perfect Blue
131.Credit: Dir: Satoshi Kon With: Junko Iwao, Rica Matsumoto, Shinpachi Tsuji
131.Outline: A retired pop-singer-turned-actress' sense of reality is shaken when she is stalked by an obsessed fan and seemingly a ghost of her past.

132.Name: Misery
132.Credit: Dir: Rob Reiner With: James Caan, Kathy Bates, Richard Farnsworth
132.Outline: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

133.Name: Mother
133.Credit: Dir: Joon Ho Bong With: Hye-ja Kim, Bin Won, Ku Jin
133.Outline: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

134.Name: Black Book
134.Credit: Dir: Paul Verhoeven With: Carice van Houten, Sebastian Koch, Thom Hoffman
134.Outline: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

135.Name: Evil Dead II
135.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Bruce Campbell, Sarah Berry, Dan Hicks
135.Outline: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holds up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

136.Name: Mississippi Burning
136.Credit: Dir: Alan Parker With: Gene Hackman, Willem Dafoe, Frances McDormand
136.Outline: Two FBI agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

137.Name: Open Your Eyes
137.Credit: Dir: Alejandro AmenÃ¡bar With: Eduardo Noriega, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Chete Lera
137.Outline: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

138.Name: Gattaca
138.Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Jude Law
138.Outline: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

139.Name: Apocalypto
139.Credit: Dir: Mel Gibson With: Gerardo Taracena, Raoul Max Trujillo, Dalia HernÃ¡ndez
139.Outline: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

140.Name: Blue Velvet
140.Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Isabella Rossellini, Kyle MacLachlan, Dennis Hopper
140.Outline: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

141.Name: Repulsion
141.Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Catherine Deneuve, Ian Hendry, John Fraser
141.Outline: A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.

142.Name: Dirty Harry
142.Credit: Dir: Don Siegel With: Clint Eastwood, Andrew Robinson, Harry Guardino
142.Outline: When a mad man calling himself 'the Scorpio Killer' menaces the city, tough as nails San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and ferret out the crazed psychopath.

143.Name: The French Connection
143.Credit: Dir: William Friedkin With: Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey
143.Outline: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

144.Name: The Dirty Dozen
144.Credit: Dir: Robert Aldrich With: Lee Marvin, Ernest Borgnine, Charles Bronson
144.Outline: A US Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers in World War II.

145.Name: The Fugitive
145.Genre: Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Mystery | Thriller
145.Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Harrison Ford, Tommy Lee Jones, Sela Ward
145.Outline: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt.

146.Name: The Tenant
146.Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Roman Polanski, Isabelle Adjani, Melvyn Douglas
146.Outline: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

147.Name: The Game
147.Credit: Dir: David Fincher With: Michael Douglas, Deborah Kara Unger, Sean Penn
147.Outline: Wealthy San Francisco financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.

148.Name: Lucky Number Slevin
148.Credit: Dir: Paul McGuigan With: Josh Hartnett, Ben Kingsley, Morgan Freeman
148.Outline: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.

149.Name: The Experiment
149.Credit: Dir: Oliver Hirschbiegel With: Moritz Bleibtreu, Christian Berkel, Oliver Stokowski
149.Outline: For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

150.Name: Serpico
150.Credit: Dir: Sidney Lumet With: Al Pacino, John Randolph, Jack Kehoe
150.Outline: The true story about an honest New York cop who blew the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

151.Name: Skyfall
151.Credit: Dir: Sam Mendes With: Daniel Craig, Javier Bardem, Naomie Harris
151.Outline: Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. Whilst MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

152.Name: The Name of the Rose
152.Credit: Dir: Jean-Jacques Annaud With: Sean Connery, Christian Slater, Helmut Qualtinger
152.Outline: An intellectually nonconformist monk investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

153.Name: The Bourne Supremacy
153.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Joan Allen
153.Outline: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

154.Name: Changeling
154.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Angelina Jolie, Colm Feore, Amy Ryan
154.Outline: A grief-stricken mother takes on the LAPD to her own detriment when it stubbornly tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child, while also refusing to give up hope that she will find him one day.

155.Name: Kingsman: The Secret Service
155.Credit: Dir: Matthew Vaughn With: Colin Firth, Taron Egerton, Samuel L. Jackson
155.Outline: A spy organization recruits an unrefined, but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program, just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

156.Name: Goldfinger
156.Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Sean Connery, Gert FrÃ¶be, Honor Blackman
156.Outline: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

157.Name: Ocean's Eleven
157.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts
157.Outline: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

158.Name: Argo
158.Credit: Dir: Ben Affleck With: Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, John Goodman
158.Outline: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1980.

159.Name: Deliverance
159.Credit: Dir: John Boorman With: Jon Voight, Burt Reynolds, Ned Beatty
159.Outline: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

160.Name: Man on Fire
160.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Dakota Fanning
160.Outline: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

161.Name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
161.Credit: Dir: Nicholas Meyer With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
161.Outline: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

162.Name: The Count of Monte Cristo
162.Credit: Dir: Kevin Reynolds With: Jim Caviezel, Guy Pearce, Richard Harris
162.Outline: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

163.Name: Paprika
163.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Crime | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
163.Credit: Dir: Satoshi Kon With: Megumi Hayashibara, TÃ´ru Emori, Katsunosuke Hori
163.Outline: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist can stop it: Paprika.

164.Name: Battle Royale
164.Credit: Dir: Kinji Fukasaku With: Tatsuya Fujiwara, Aki Maeda, TarÃ´ Yamamoto
164.Outline: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

165.Name: The Machinist
165.Credit: Dir: Brad Anderson With: Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Aitana SÃ¡nchez-GijÃ³n
165.Outline: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

166.Name: Road to Perdition
166.Credit: Dir: Sam Mendes With: Tom Hanks, Tyler Hoechlin, Rob Maxey
166.Outline: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

167.Name: 10 Cloverfield Lane
167.Credit: Dir: Dan Trachtenberg With: John Goodman, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, John Gallagher Jr.
167.Outline: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter with two men, who claim the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.

168.Name: Ex Machina
168.Credit: Dir: Alex Garland With: Alicia Vikander, Domhnall Gleeson, Oscar Isaac
168.Outline: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

169.Name: Dark City
169.Genre: Action | Drama | Fantasy | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
169.Credit: Dir: Alex Proyas With: Rufus Sewell, Kiefer Sutherland, Jennifer Connelly
169.Outline: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

170.Name: Dead Man's Shoes
170.Credit: Dir: Shane Meadows With: Paddy Considine, Gary Stretch, Toby Kebbell
170.Outline: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

171.Name: The Last King of Scotland
171.Credit: Dir: Kevin Macdonald With: James McAvoy, Forest Whitaker, Gillian Anderson
171.Outline: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s

172.Name: Enter the Dragon
172.Credit: Dir: Robert Clouse With: Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly
172.Outline: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

173.Name: Training Day
173.Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn
173.Outline: On his first day on the job as a Los Angeles narcotics officer, a rookie cop goes on a 24-hour training course with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears.

174.Name: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance
174.Credit: Dir: Chan-wook Park With: Kang-ho Song, Ha-kyun Shin, Doona Bae
174.Outline: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.

175.Name: Primal Fear
175.Credit: Dir: Gregory Hoblit With: Richard Gere, Laura Linney, Edward Norton
175.Outline: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

176.Name: The Butterfly Effect
176.Credit: Dir: Eric Bress, J. Mackye Gruber With: Ashton Kutcher, Amy Smart, Melora Walters
176.Outline: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

177.Name: Gone Baby Gone
177.Credit: Dir: Ben Affleck With: Morgan Freeman, Ed Harris, Casey Affleck
177.Outline: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

178.Name: The Warriors
178.Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Michael Beck, James Remar, Dorsey Wright
178.Outline: In 1979, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down to kill them.

179.Name: After Hours
179.Credit: Dir: Martin Scorsese With: Griffin Dunne, Rosanna Arquette, Verna Bloom
179.Outline: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho whom he met that evening at a coffee shop.

180.Name: Match Point
180.Credit: Dir: Woody Allen With: Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Emily Mortimer
180.Outline: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

181.Name: Blood Simple.
181.Credit: Dir: Joel Coen With: John Getz, Frances McDormand, Dan Hedaya
181.Outline: A rich but jealous man hires a private investigator to kill his cheating wife and her new man. But, when blood is involved, nothing is simple.

182.Name: Sicario
182.Credit: Dir: Denis Villeneuve With: Emily Blunt, Josh Brolin, Benicio Del Toro
182.Outline: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

183.Name: Eastern Promises
183.Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Naomi Watts, Viggo Mortensen, Armin Mueller-Stahl
183.Outline: A Russian teenager living in London who dies during childbirth leaves clues to a midwife in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

184.Name: Cell 211
184.Credit: Dir: Daniel MonzÃ³n With: Luis Tosar, Alberto Ammann, Antonio Resines
184.Outline: The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

185.Name: Blow-Up
185.Credit: Dir: Michelangelo Antonioni With: David Hemmings, Vanessa Redgrave, Sarah Miles
185.Outline: A mod London photographer seems to find something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park.

186.Name: Zodiac
186.Credit: Dir: David Fincher With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr., Mark Ruffalo
186.Outline: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.

187.Name: Minority Report
187.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton
187.Outline: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

188.Name: End of Watch
188.Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Michael PeÃ±a, Anna Kendrick
188.Outline: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

189.Name: Sympathy for Lady Vengeance
189.Credit: Dir: Chan-wook Park With: Yeong-ae Lee, Min-sik Choi, Shi-hoo Kim
189.Outline: After a thirteen-year imprisonment for the kidnap and murder of a six-year-old boy, Guem-Ja Lee seeks...

190.Name: Lost Highway
190.Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Bill Pullman, Patricia Arquette, John Roselius
190.Outline: After a bizarre encounter at a party, a jazz saxophonist is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to prison, where he inexplicably morphs into a young mechanic and begins leading a new life.

191.Name: Spellbound
191.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Ingrid Bergman, Gregory Peck, Michael Chekhov
191.Outline: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

192.Name: Traffic
192.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: Michael Douglas, Benicio Del Toro, Catherine Zeta-Jones
192.Outline: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

193.Name: Inside Man
193.Credit: Dir: Spike Lee With: Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster
193.Outline: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

194.Name: A Few Good Men
194.Credit: Dir: Rob Reiner With: Tom Cruise, Jack Nicholson, Demi Moore
194.Outline: Neo military lawyer Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder; they contend they were acting under orders.

195.Name: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
195.Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Mel Gibson, Bruce Spence, Michael Preston
195.Outline: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline rich, community escape a band of bandits.

196.Name: Grindhouse
196.Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez, Eli Roth With: Kurt Russell, Rose McGowan, Danny Trejo
196.Outline: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to drive-in double features in the 60s and 70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.

197.Name: Bridge of Spies
197.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Hanks, Mark Rylance, Alan Alda
197.Outline: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

198.Name: The Skin I Live In
198.Credit: Dir: Pedro AlmodÃ³var With: Antonio Banderas, Elena Anaya, Jan Cornet
198.Outline: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

199.Name: Lethal Weapon
199.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey
199.Outline: A veteran cop, Murtaugh, is partnered with a young suicidal cop, Riggs. Both having one thing in common; hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

200.Name: The Illusionist
200.Credit: Dir: Neil Burger With: Edward Norton, Jessica Biel, Paul Giamatti
200.Outline: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

201.Name: Sherlock Holmes
201.Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Rachel McAdams
201.Outline: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

202.Name: 127 Hours
202.Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: James Franco, Amber Tamblyn, Kate Mara
202.Outline: An adventurous mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

203.Name: 28 Days Later...
203.Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Christopher Eccleston
203.Outline: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

204.Name: United 93
204.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: David Alan Basche, Olivia Thirlby, Liza ColÃ³n-Zayas
204.Outline: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September eleventh, 2001, that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

205.Name: The Raid: Redemption
205.Credit: Dir: Gareth Evans With: Iko Uwais, Ananda George, Ray Sahetapy
205.Outline: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

206.Name: Lord of War
206.Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Nicolas Cage, Ethan Hawke, Jared Leto
206.Outline: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an Interpol agent.

207.Name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
207.Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Akio Ãtsuka, Atsuko Tanaka, Tamio Ãki
207.Outline: In the year 2032, BatÃ´, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

208.Name: Munich
208.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Eric Bana, Daniel Craig, Marie-JosÃ©e Croze
208.Outline: Based on the true story of the Black September aftermath, about the five men chosen to eliminate the ones responsible for that fateful day.

209.Name: The Others
209.Credit: Dir: Alejandro AmenÃ¡bar With: Nicole Kidman, Christopher Eccleston, Fionnula Flanagan
209.Outline: A woman who lives in a darkened old house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that her family home is haunted.

210.Name: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
210.Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
210.Outline: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

211.Name: West Side Story
211.Credit: Dir: Jerome Robbins, Robert Wise With: Natalie Wood, George Chakiris, Richard Beymer
211.Outline: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

212.Name: The Hunt for Red October
212.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin, Scott Glenn
212.Outline: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

213.Name: The Hurt Locker
213.Credit: Dir: Kathryn Bigelow With: Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie, Brian Geraghty
213.Outline: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

214.Name: Funny Games
214.Credit: Dir: Michael Haneke With: Susanne Lothar, Ulrich MÃ¼he, Arno Frisch
214.Outline: Two psychotic young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

215.Name: The Impossible
215.Credit: Dir: J.A. Bayona With: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland
215.Outline: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

216.Name: The Time Machine
216.Credit: Dir: George Pal With: Rod Taylor, Alan Young, Yvette Mimieux
216.Outline: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

217.Name: Falling Down
217.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Michael Douglas, Robert Duvall, Barbara Hershey
217.Outline: A borderline personality disordered defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

218.Name: Following
218.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Jeremy Theobald, Alex Haw, Lucy Russell
218.Outline: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

219.Name: The Wave
219.Credit: Dir: Dennis Gansel With: Frederick Lau, Max Riemelt, Jennifer Ulrich
219.Outline: A high school teacher's experiment to demonstrate to his students what life is like under a dictatorship spins horribly out of control when he forms a social unit with a life of its own.

220.Name: The Abyss
220.Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Ed Harris, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Michael Biehn
220.Outline: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

221.Name: Lust, Caution
221.Credit: Dir: Ang Lee With: Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Wei Tang, Joan Chen
221.Outline: During World War II era, a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.

222.Name: Mesrine Part 1: Killer Instinct
222.Credit: Dir: Jean-FranÃ§ois Richet With: Vincent Cassel, CÃ©cile De France, GÃ©rard Depardieu
222.Outline: The story of french gangster Jacques Mesrine, before he was called Public Enemy NÂ°1.

223.Name: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
223.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Bruce Willis, Jeremy Irons, Samuel L. Jackson
223.Outline: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

224.Name: Midnight Run
224.Credit: Dir: Martin Brest With: Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto
224.Outline: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the FBI, and the Mafia after jumping bail.

225.Name: The Town
225.Credit: Dir: Ben Affleck With: Ben Affleck, Rebecca Hall, Jon Hamm
225.Outline: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the FBI agent looking to bring him and his crew down.

226.Name: Disconnect
226.Credit: Dir: Henry Alex Rubin With: Jason Bateman, Jonah Bobo, Haley Ramm
226.Outline: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.

227.Name: Lone Survivor
227.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Emile Hirsch
227.Outline: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

228.Name: Tell No One
228.Credit: Dir: Guillaume Canet With: FranÃ§ois Cluzet, Marie-JosÃ©e Croze, AndrÃ© Dussollier
228.Outline: Police find two bodies at an old murder scene and evidence to suggest the scene's first victim's husband is a murderer. Coincidentally, the husband receives clues suggesting his deceased wife is actually alive and begins to investigate.

229.Name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
229.Credit: Dir: Rupert Wyatt With: James Franco, Andy Serkis, Freida Pinto
229.Outline: A substance, designed to help the brain repair itself, gives rise to a super-intelligent chimp who leads an ape uprising.

230.Name: Headhunters
230.Credit: Dir: Morten Tyldum With: Aksel Hennie, SynnÃ¸ve Macody Lund, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau
230.Outline: An accomplished headhunter risks everything to obtain a valuable painting owned by a former mercenary.

231.Name: Collateral
231.Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Tom Cruise, Jamie Foxx, Jada Pinkett Smith
231.Outline: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

232.Name: Star Trek: First Contact
232.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Frakes With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
232.Outline: The Borg go back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

233.Name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
233.Credit: Dir: Jim Jarmusch With: Forest Whitaker, Henry Silva, John Tormey
233.Outline: An African American mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

234.Name: Sleepers
234.Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Robert De Niro, Kevin Bacon, Brad Pitt
234.Outline: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized; over 10 years later, they get their chance for revenge.

235.Name: The Life of David Gale
235.Credit: Dir: Alan Parker With: Kevin Spacey, Kate Winslet, Laura Linney
235.Outline: A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.

236.Name: Menace II Society
236.Credit: Dir: Albert Hughes, Allen Hughes With: Tyrin Turner, Larenz Tate, June Kyoto Lu
236.Outline: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

237.Name: RoboCop
237.Credit: Dir: Paul Verhoeven With: Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Dan O'Herlihy
237.Outline: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

238.Name: Straw Dogs
238.Credit: Dir: Sam Peckinpah With: Dustin Hoffman, Susan George, Peter Vaughan
238.Outline: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.

239.Name: A Perfect World
239.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Kevin Costner, Clint Eastwood, Laura Dern
239.Outline: A kidnapped boy strikes up a friendship with his captor: an escaped convict on the run from the law, headed by an honorable U.S. Marshal.

240.Name: Jackie Brown
240.Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Pam Grier, Samuel L. Jackson, Robert Forster
240.Outline: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

241.Name: Equilibrium
241.Credit: Dir: Kurt Wimmer With: Christian Bale, Sean Bean, Emily Watson
241.Outline: In a Fascist future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system.

242.Name: A Simple Plan
242.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Bill Paxton, Billy Bob Thornton, Bridget Fonda
242.Outline: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

243.Name: We Need to Talk About Kevin
243.Credit: Dir: Lynne Ramsay With: Tilda Swinton, John C. Reilly, Ezra Miller
243.Outline: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child, despite the increasingly vicious things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.

244.Name: The Man Who Knew Too Much
244.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: James Stewart, Doris Day, Brenda de Banzie
244.Outline: A family vacationing in Morocco accidentally stumble on to an assassination plot and the conspirators are determined to prevent them from interfering.

245.Name: Marathon Man
245.Credit: Dir: John Schlesinger With: Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier, Roy Scheider
245.Outline: A graduate history student is unwittingly caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

246.Name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
246.Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Jared Harris
246.Outline: Sherlock Holmes and his sidekick Dr. Watson join forces to outwit and bring down their fiercest adversary, Professor Moriarty.

247.Name: Three Days of the Condor
247.Credit: Dir: Sydney Pollack With: Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson
247.Outline: A bookish CIA researcher finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

248.Name: The Orphanage
248.Credit: Dir: J.A. Bayona With: BelÃ©n Rueda, Fernando Cayo, Roger PrÃ­ncep
248.Outline: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.

249.Name: The Devil's Advocate
249.Credit: Dir: Taylor Hackford With: Keanu Reeves, Al Pacino, Charlize Theron
249.Outline: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job to work in New York City for a high-end law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

250.Name: X2
250.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
250.Outline: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.

251.Name: To Catch a Thief
251.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Cary Grant, Grace Kelly, Jessie Royce Landis
251.Outline: When a reformed jewel thief is suspected of returning to his former occupation, he must ferret out the real thief in order to prove his innocence.

252.Name: Source Code
252.Credit: Dir: Duncan Jones With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga
252.Outline: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train. A mission he has only 8 minutes to complete.

253.Name: A History of Violence
253.Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Viggo Mortensen, Maria Bello, Ed Harris
253.Outline: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

254.Name: The Constant Gardener

255.Name: Pi
255.Credit: Dir: Darren Aronofsky With: Sean Gullette, Mark Margolis, Ben Shenkman
255.Outline: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

256.Name: Frenzy
256.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Jon Finch, Barry Foster, Alec McCowen
256.Outline: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

257.Name: Bad Education
257.Credit: Dir: Pedro AlmodÃ³var With: Gael GarcÃ­a Bernal, Fele MartÃ­nez, Javier CÃ¡mara
257.Outline: An examination on the effect of Franco-era religious schooling and sexual abuse on the lives of two longtime friends.

258.Name: From Russia with Love
258.Credit: Dir: Terence Young With: Sean Connery, Robert Shaw, Lotte Lenya
258.Outline: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

259.Name: Thesis
259.Credit: Dir: Alejandro AmenÃ¡bar With: Ana Torrent, Fele MartÃ­nez, Eduardo Noriega
259.Outline: While doing a thesis about violence, Ãngela finds a snuff video where a girl is tortured until death. Soon she discovers that the girl was a former student in her faculty...

260.Name: Bullitt
260.Credit: Dir: Peter Yates With: Steve McQueen, Jacqueline Bisset, Robert Vaughn
260.Outline: An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

261.Name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
261.Credit: Dir: Christopher McQuarrie With: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Jeremy Renner
261.Outline: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

262.Name: Witness
262.Credit: Dir: Peter Weir With: Harrison Ford, Kelly McGillis, Lukas Haas
262.Outline: A young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder; policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

263.Name: Running Scared

263.Outline: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.

264.Credit: Dir: Rian Johnson With: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt
264.Outline: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

265.Credit: Dir: Richard Eyre With: Cate Blanchett, Judi Dench, Andrew Simpson
265.Outline: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her 15-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond platonic friendship.

268.Name: Mean Streets

269.Outline: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

270.Name: Brick
270.Credit: Dir: Rian Johnson With: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Lukas Haas, Emilie de Ravin

271.Name: Bound

272.Name: The Walk

272.Outline: In 1974, high-wire artist Philippe Petit recruits a team of people to help him realize his dream: to walk the immense void between the World Trade Center towers.

275.Name: The Rock

275.Outline: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

276.Name: Contact

276.Outline: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of intelligent aliens, who send plans for a mysterious machine.

277.Name: Zero Dark Thirty
277.Credit: Dir: Kathryn Bigelow With: Jessica Chastain, Joel Edgerton, Chris Pratt
277.Outline: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

278.Name: A Time to Kill

278.Outline: A young lawyer defends a black man accused of murdering two men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, sparking a rebirth of the K.K.K.

279.Name: Dirty Pretty Things

280.Name: Grosse Pointe Blank

281.Name: La Femme Nikita

281.Outline: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

282.Name: Assault on Precinct 13

283.Name: Dolores Claiborne
283.Credit: Dir: Taylor Hackford With: Kathy Bates, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Christopher Plummer
283.Outline: A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.

284.Name: Irreversible

285.Name: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
285.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
285.Credit: Dir: Tetsuya Nomura, Takeshi Nozue With: Takahiro Sakurai, Ayumi ItÃ´, Shotaro Morikubo
285.Outline: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

286.Name: Layer Cake
286.Credit: Dir: Matthew Vaughn With: Daniel Craig, Sienna Miller, Michael Gambon
286.Outline: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

287.Name: The Next Three Days
287.Credit: Dir: Paul Haggis With: Russell Crowe, Elizabeth Banks, Liam Neeson
287.Outline: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

288.Name: Blow Out
288.Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: John Travolta, Nancy Allen, John Lithgow
288.Outline: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

289.Name: The Italian Job
289.Credit: Dir: Peter Collinson With: Michael Caine, NoÃ«l Coward, Benny Hill
289.Outline: Comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

290.Name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
290.Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg
290.Outline: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

291.Name: Mr. Brooks
291.Credit: Dir: Bruce A. Evans With: Kevin Costner, Demi Moore, William Hurt
291.Outline: A psychological thriller about a man who is sometimes controlled by his murder-and-mayhem-loving alter ego.

292.Name: Shallow Grave
292.Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: Kerry Fox, Christopher Eccleston, Ewan McGregor
292.Outline: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

293.Name: The Phantom of the Opera
293.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Gerard Butler, Emmy Rossum, Patrick Wilson
293.Outline: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured musical genius who lives beneath the Paris OpÃ©ra House.

294.Name: Don't Look Now
294.Credit: Dir: Nicolas Roeg With: Julie Christie, Donald Sutherland, Hilary Mason
294.Outline: A married couple grieving the recent death of their little daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

295.Name: The Lincoln Lawyer
295.Credit: Dir: Brad Furman With: Matthew McConaughey, Marisa Tomei, Ryan Phillippe
295.Outline: Mick Haller is a defense lawyer who works out of his Lincoln. When a wealthy Realtor is accused of assaulting a prostitute...

296.Name: Dead Ringers
296.Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Jeremy Irons, GeneviÃ¨ve Bujold, Heidi von Palleske
296.Outline: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

297.Name: Frequency
297.Credit: Dir: Gregory Hoblit With: Dennis Quaid, Jim Caviezel, Shawn Doyle
297.Outline: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

298.Name: The Talented Mr. Ripley

299.Name: Fast Five

299.Outline: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

300.Name: Angel Heart
300.Credit: Dir: Alan Parker With: Mickey Rourke, Robert De Niro, Lisa Bonet
300.Outline: Harry Angel is a private investigator. He is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer called Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

301.Name: Clue
301.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Lynn With: Eileen Brennan, Tim Curry, Madeline Kahn
301.Outline: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery.

302.Name: Ghajini
302.Credit: Dir: A.R. Murugadoss With: Aamir Khan, Asin, Jiah Khan
302.Outline: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.

303.Name: RocknRolla

303.Outline: In London, a real-estate scam puts millions of pounds up for grabs, attracting some of the city's scrappiest tough guys and its more established underworld types, all of whom are looking to get rich quick. While the city's seasoned criminals vie for the cash, an unexpected player -- a drugged out rock 'n' roller presumed to be dead but very much alive -- has a multi-million dollar prize fall into his hands.

304.Name: The Place Beyond the Pines
304.Credit: Dir: Derek Cianfrance With: Ryan Gosling, Bradley Cooper, Eva Mendes
304.Outline: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.

305.Name: Cube

305.Outline: 6 complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless kafkaesque maze containing deadly traps.

306.Name: Cape Fear

306.Outline: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

307.Name: American Sniper

307.Outline: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home to his wife and kids after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.

308.Name: Eyes Wide Shut
308.Credit: Dir: Stanley Kubrick With: Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Todd Field
308.Outline: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

309.Name: Caché
309.Credit: Dir: Michael Haneke With: Daniel Auteuil, Juliette Binoche, Maurice BÃ©nichou
309.Outline: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

310.Name: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest

310.Outline: Lisbeth is recovering in a hospital and awaiting trial for three murders when she is released. Mikael must prove her innocence, but Lisbeth must be willing to share the details of her sordid experiences with the court.

311.Name: The Guard
