311.Outline: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is partnered with an up-tight F.B.I. agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.

312.Name: The Crying Game

312.Outline: A British soldier is kidnapped by IRA terrorists. He befriends one of his captors, who is drawn into the soldier's world.

313.Name: Flight
313.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Denzel Washington, Nadine Velazquez, Don Cheadle
313.Outline: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

314.Name: Frailty

314.Outline: A man confesses to an FBI agent his family's story of how his religious fanatic father's visions lead to a series of murders to destroy supposed "demons."

315.Name: Matchstick Men
315.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Nicolas Cage, Alison Lohman, Sam Rockwell
315.Outline: A phobic con artist and his protÃ©gÃ© are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

316.Name: Thirteen Days
316.Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Kevin Costner, Bruce Greenwood, Shawn Driscoll
316.Outline: A dramatization of the Kennedy administration's struggle to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis in October 1962.

317.Name: Animal Kingdom
317.Credit: Dir: David MichÃ´d With: James Frecheville, Guy Pearce, Joel Edgerton
317.Outline: A seventeen year-old navigates his survival amongst an explosive criminal family and the detective who thinks he can save him.

318.Name: Punch-Drunk Love
318.Credit: Dir: Paul Thomas Anderson With: Adam Sandler, Emily Watson, Philip Seymour Hoffman
318.Outline: A psychologically troubled novelty supplier is nudged towards a romance with an English woman, all the while being extorted by a phone-sex line run by a crooked mattress salesman, and purchasing stunning amounts of pudding.

319.Name: Monster
319.Credit: Dir: Patty Jenkins With: Charlize Theron, Christina Ricci, Bruce Dern
319.Outline: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

320.Name: Michael Clayton
320.Credit: Dir: Tony Gilroy With: George Clooney, Tilda Swinton, Tom Wilkinson
320.Outline: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multi-billion dollar class action suit.

321.Name: Dr. No
321.Credit: Dir: Terence Young With: Sean Connery, Ursula Andress, Bernard Lee
321.Outline: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

322.Name: Sunshine
322.Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: Cillian Murphy, Rose Byrne, Chris Evans
322.Outline: A team of international astronauts is sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

323.Name: Identity
323.Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: John Cusack, Ray Liotta, Amanda Peet
323.Outline: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain-storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

324.Name: The Hitcher
324.Credit: Dir: Robert Harmon With: Rutger Hauer, C. Thomas Howell, Jennifer Jason Leigh
324.Outline: A young man who escaped the clutches of a murderous hitch-hiker is subsequently stalked, framed for the hitcher's crimes, and has his life made into hell by the same man he escaped.

325.Name: Talaash
325.Credit: Dir: Reema Kagti With: Aamir Khan, Kareena Kapoor, Rani Mukerji
325.Outline: A cop, investigating the mysterious death of a filmstar, meets a sex-worker, while he faces some personal problems psychologically. The mystery connects these people in a way, that ultimately changes their lives.

326.Name: Now You See Me
326.Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier With: Jesse Eisenberg, Common, Mark Ruffalo
326.Outline: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.

327.Name: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
327.Credit: Dir: Sidney Lumet With: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ethan Hawke, Albert Finney
327.Outline: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife hurtling towards a shattering climax.

328.Name: Crimson Tide
328.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Gene Hackman, Denzel Washington, Matt Craven
328.Outline: On a US nuclear missile sub, a young first officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

329.Name: The Negotiator
329.Credit: Dir: F. Gary Gray With: Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey, David Morse
329.Outline: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

330.Name: Sexy Beast
330.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Glazer With: Ray Winstone, Ben Kingsley, Ian McShane
330.Outline: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

331.Name: A Tale of Two Sisters
331.Credit: Dir: Jee-woon Kim With: Kap-su Kim, Jung-ah Yum, Su-jeong Lim
331.Outline: A family is haunted by the tragedies of deaths within the family.

332.Name: Furious 7
332.Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson
332.Outline: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

333.Name: Enemy of the State
333.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight
333.Outline: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

334.Name: Face/Off
334.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: John Travolta, Nicolas Cage, Joan Allen
334.Outline: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a face-transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a ruthless terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same criminal impersonates the cop.

335.Name: Ronin
335.Credit: Dir: John Frankenheimer With: Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone
335.Outline: A freelancing former US intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by both the Irish and the Russians.

336.Name: The Bank Job
336.Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Jason Statham, Saffron Burrows, Stephen Campbell Moore
336.Outline: Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry. But Terry and his crew don't realize the boxes also contain a treasure trove of dirty secrets - secrets that will thrust them into a deadly web of corruption and illicit scandal.

337.Name: The Hunger Games
337.Credit: Dir: Gary Ross With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
337.Outline: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

338.Name: Wild at Heart
338.Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Willem Dafoe
338.Outline: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

339.Name: Dogtooth
339.Credit: Dir: Yorgos Lanthimos With: Christos Stergioglou, Michele Valley, Angeliki Papoulia
339.Outline: Three teenagers live isolated, without leaving their house, because their over-protective parents say they can only leave when their dogtooth falls out.

340.Name: The Dead Zone
340.Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Christopher Walken, Brooke Adams, Tom Skerritt
340.Outline: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

341.Name: Broken Embraces
341.Credit: Dir: Pedro AlmodÃ³var With: PenÃ©lope Cruz, LluÃ­s Homar, Blanca Portillo
341.Outline: Harry Caine, a blind writer, reaches this moment in time when he has to heal his wounds from 14 years back. He was then still known by his real name, Mateo Blanco, and directing his last movie.

342.Name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
342.Credit: Dir: Nicholas Meyer With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
342.Outline: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

343.Name: The Andromeda Strain
343.Credit: Dir: Robert Wise With: James Olson, Arthur Hill, David Wayne
343.Outline: A group of scientists investigates a deadly new alien virus before it can spread.

344.Name: The Ghost Writer
344.Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Ewan McGregor, Pierce Brosnan, Olivia Williams
344.Outline: A ghostwriter hired to complete the memoirs of a former British prime minister uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

345.Name: Red Dragon
345.Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Anthony Hopkins, Edward Norton, Ralph Fiennes
345.Outline: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer; aiding him is imprisoned criminal genius Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

346.Name: Manhunter
346.Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: William Petersen, Kim Greist, Joan Allen
346.Outline: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial murderer named "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.

347.Name: Nothing But the Truth
347.Credit: Dir: Rod Lurie With: Kate Beckinsale, Matt Dillon, Vera Farmiga
347.Outline: In Washington, D.C., a female reporter faces a possible jail sentence for outing a CIA agent and refusing to reveal her source.

348.Name: Timecrimes
348.Credit: Dir: Nacho Vigalondo With: Karra Elejalde, Candela FernÃ¡ndez, BÃ¡rbara Goenaga
348.Outline: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

349.Name: Harry Brown
349.Credit: Dir: Daniel Barber With: Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer, David Bradley
349.Outline: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

350.Name: Elephant
350.Credit: Dir: Gus Van Sant With: Elias McConnell, Alex Frost, Eric Deulen
350.Outline: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

351.Name: In the Line of Fire
351.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo
351.Outline: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

352.Name: Narc
352.Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Ray Liotta, Jason Patric, Chi McBride
352.Outline: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

353.Name: True Lies
353.Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold
353.Outline: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman.

354.Name: Arlington Road
354.Credit: Dir: Mark Pellington With: Jeff Bridges, Tim Robbins, Joan Cusack
354.Outline: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

355.Name: Fracture
355.Credit: Dir: Gregory Hoblit With: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling, David Strathairn
355.Outline: An attorney, intent on climbing the career ladder toward success, finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he is trying to prosecute.

356.Name: Unbreakable
356.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Bruce Willis, Samuel L. Jackson, Robin Wright
356.Outline: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

357.Name: Point Break
357.Credit: Dir: Kathryn Bigelow With: Patrick Swayze, Keanu Reeves, Gary Busey
357.Outline: An FBI agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

358.Name: Marnie
358.Credit: Dir: Alfred Hitchcock With: Tippi Hedren, Sean Connery, Martin Gabel
358.Outline: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

359.Credit: Dir: Michael Radford With: John Hurt, Richard Burton, Suzanna Hamilton
359.Outline: George Orwell's novel of a totalitarian future society in which a man whose daily work is rewriting history tries to rebel by falling in love.

360.Name: Live Free or Die Hard
360.Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Bruce Willis, Justin Long, Timothy Olyphant
360.Outline: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

361.Name: In the Valley of Elah
361.Credit: Dir: Paul Haggis With: Tommy Lee Jones, Charlize Theron, Jonathan Tucker
361.Outline: A retired military investigator works with a police detective to uncover the truth behind his son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.

362.Name: The Equalizer
362.Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Denzel Washington, Marton Csokas, ChloÃ« Grace Moretz
362.Outline: A man believes he has put his mysterious past behind him and has dedicated himself to beginning a new, quiet life. But when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters, he can't stand idly by - he has to help her.

363.Name: Lethal Weapon 2
363.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
363.Outline: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

364.Name: District B13
364.Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: Cyril Raffaelli, David Belle, Tony D'Amario
364.Outline: Set in the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.

365.Name: GoldenEye
365.Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Pierce Brosnan, Sean Bean, Izabella Scorupco
365.Outline: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow agent formerly believed to be dead.

366.Name: Defiance
366.Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell
366.Outline: Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters and endeavor to build a village in order to protect themselves and about 1,000 Jewish non-combatants.

367.Name: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
367.Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Sheryl Lee, Ray Wise, MÃ¤dchen Amick
367.Outline: A young FBI agent disappears while investigating a murder miles from Twin Peaks that may be related to the future murder of Laura Palmer; the last week of the life of Laura Palmer is chronicled.

368.Name: Magnum Force
368.Credit: Dir: Ted Post With: Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan
368.Outline: Dirty Harry is on the trail of vigilante cops who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

369.Name: Insomnia
369.Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Al Pacino, Robin Williams, Hilary Swank
369.Outline: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

370.Name: The Salton Sea
370.Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Val Kilmer, Vincent D'Onofrio, Adam Goldberg
370.Outline: After his wife is murdered, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.

371.Name: Shooter
371.Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Mark Wahlberg, Michael PeÃ±a, Rhona Mitra
371.Outline: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to find the real killer and the reason he was set up.

372.Name: John Wick
372.Credit: Dir: Chad Stahelski With: Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen
372.Outline: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.

373.Name: Desperado
373.Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Joaquim de Almeida
373.Outline: A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

374.Name: In the Mouth of Madness
374.Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Sam Neill, JÃ¼rgen Prochnow, Julie Carmen
374.Outline: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

375.Name: Speed
375.Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Keanu Reeves, Dennis Hopper, Sandra Bullock
375.Outline: A young cop must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

376.Credit: Dir: Yann Demange With: Jack O'Connell, Sam Reid, Sean Harris
376.Outline: In 1971, a young and disorientated British soldier is accidentally abandoned by his unit following a riot on the deadly streets of Belfast.

377.Name: Strange Days
377.Credit: Dir: Kathryn Bigelow With: Ralph Fiennes, Angela Bassett, Juliette Lewis
377.Outline: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a police conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

378.Name: The Lobster
378.Credit: Dir: Yorgos Lanthimos With: Jacqueline Abrahams, Roger Ashton-Griffiths, Jessica Barden
378.Outline: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into beasts and sent off into The Woods.

379.Name: Fast & Furious 6
379.Credit: Dir: Justin Lin With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson
379.Outline: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets convoluted also facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

380.Name: Coherence
380.Credit: Dir: James Ward Byrkit With: Emily Baldoni, Maury Sterling, Nicholas Brendon
380.Outline: Strange things begin to happen when a group of friends gather for a dinner party on an evening when a comet is passing overhead.

381.Name: The Girl Who Played with Fire
381.Credit: Dir: Daniel Alfredson With: Noomi Rapace, Michael Nyqvist, Lena Endre
381.Outline: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.

382.Name: Hard Candy
382.Credit: Dir: David Slade With: Patrick Wilson, Ellen Page, Sandra Oh
382.Outline: A teenage girl raids a man's home in order to expose him under suspicion that he is a sex offender with pedophilia (not to be confused with a person who suffers the condition of pedophilia).

383.Name: Die Hard 2
383.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Bruce Willis, William Atherton, Bonnie Bedelia
383.Outline: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

384.Name: Margin Call
384.Credit: Dir: J.C. Chandor With: Zachary Quinto, Stanley Tucci, Kevin Spacey
384.Outline: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the financial crisis.

385.Name: Bitter Moon
385.Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Hugh Grant, Kristin Scott Thomas, Emmanuelle Seigner
385.Outline: British couple Fiona and Nigel Dobson are sailing to Istanbul en route to India. They encounter a beautiful French woman...

386.Name: State of Play
386.Credit: Dir: Kevin Macdonald With: Russell Crowe, Rachel McAdams, Ben Affleck
386.Outline: When a congressional aide is killed, a Washington D.C. journalist starts investigating the case involving the congressman, his old college friend.

387.Name: The Jacket
387.Credit: Dir: John Maybury With: Adrien Brody, Keira Knightley, Daniel Craig
387.Outline: A Gulf war veteran is wrongly sent to a mental institution for insane criminals, where he becomes the object of a Doctor's experiments, and his life is completely affected by them.

388.Name: A Scanner Darkly
388.Credit: Dir: Richard Linklater With: Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder, Robert Downey Jr.
388.Outline: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

389.Name: The Devil's Double
389.Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Dominic Cooper, Ludivine Sagnier, Raad Rawi
389.Outline: A chilling vision of the House of Saddam Hussein comes to life through the eyes of the man who was forced to become the double of Hussein's sadistic son.

390.Name: Valkyrie
390.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Tom Cruise, Bill Nighy, Carice van Houten
390.Outline: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

391.Name: Brothers
391.Credit: Dir: Jim Sheridan With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Natalie Portman, Tobey Maguire
391.Outline: A young man comforts his older brother's wife and children after he goes missing in Afghanistan.

392.Name: The Protector
392.Credit: Dir: Prachya Pinkaew With: Tony Jaa, Nathan Jones, Petchtai Wongkamlao
392.Outline: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.

393.Name: Shutter
393.Credit: Dir: Banjong Pisanthanakun, Parkpoom Wongpoom With: Ananda Everingham, Natthaweeranuch Thongmee, Achita Sikamana
393.Outline: A young photographer and his girlfriend discover mysterious shadows in their photographs after a tragic accident. They soon learn that you can not escape your past.

394.Name: Body of Lies
394.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Russell Crowe, Mark Strong
394.Outline: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.

395.Name: Sneakers
395.Credit: Dir: Phil Alden Robinson With: Robert Redford, Dan Aykroyd, Sidney Poitier
395.Outline: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

396.Name: Unthinkable
396.Credit: Dir: Gregor Jordan With: Samuel L. Jackson, Carrie-Anne Moss, Michael Sheen
396.Outline: A psychological thriller centered around a black-ops interrogator and an FBI agent who press a suspect terrorist into divulging the location of three nuclear weapons set to detonate in the U.S.

397.Name: Blue Ruin
397.Credit: Dir: Jeremy Saulnier With: Macon Blair, Devin Ratray, Amy Hargreaves
397.Outline: A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. Proving himself an amateur assassin, he winds up in a brutal fight to protect his estranged family.

398.Name: The Gift
398.Credit: Dir: Joel Edgerton With: Jason Bateman, Rebecca Hall, Joel Edgerton
398.Outline: A young married couple's lives are thrown into a harrowing tailspin when an acquaintance from the husband's past brings mysterious gifts and a horrifying secret to light after more than 20 years.

399.Name: Fright Night
399.Credit: Dir: Tom Holland With: Chris Sarandon, William Ragsdale, Amanda Bearse
399.Outline: When a teenager learns that his next door neighbour is a vampire, no one will believe him.

400.Name: Ichi the Killer
400.Genre: Action | Comedy | Crime | Drama | Horror | Thriller
400.Credit: Dir: Takashi Miike With: Tadanobu Asano, Nao Ãmori, Shin'ya Tsukamoto
400.Outline: As sadomasochistic yakuza enforcer Kakihara searches for his missing boss he comes across Ichi, a repressed and psychotic killer who may be able to inflict levels of pain that Kakihara has only dreamed of.

401.Name: Everest
401.Credit: Dir: Baltasar KormÃ¡kur With: Jason Clarke, Ang Phula Sherpa, Thomas M. Wright
401.Outline: A climbing expedition on Mt. Everest is devastated by a severe snow storm.

402.Name: Runaway Jury
402.Credit: Dir: Gary Fleder With: John Cusack, Rachel Weisz, Gene Hackman
402.Outline: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

403.Name: Mission: Impossible
403.Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle BÃ©art
403.Outline: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

404.Name: No Way Out
404.Genre: Action | Crime | Drama | Mystery | Romance | Thriller
404.Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Kevin Costner, Gene Hackman, Sean Young
404.Outline: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

405.Name: Brotherhood of the Wolf
405.Credit: Dir: Christophe Gans With: Samuel Le Bihan, Mark Dacascos, JÃ©rÃ©mie Renier
405.Outline: In 18th century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his native American friend Mani are sent by the King to the Gevaudan province to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

406.Name: The Rainmaker
406.Credit: Dir: Francis Ford Coppola With: Matt Damon, Danny DeVito, Claire Danes
406.Outline: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent Insurance company.

407.Name: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
407.Genre: Biography | Comedy | Crime | Drama | Romance | Thriller
407.Credit: Dir: George Clooney With: Sam Rockwell, Drew Barrymore, George Clooney
407.Outline: An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris, in which he purports to have been a CIA hitman.

408.Name: Side Effects
408.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: Rooney Mara, Channing Tatum, Jude Law
408.Outline: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.

409.Name: WarGames
409.Credit: Dir: John Badham With: Matthew Broderick, Ally Sheedy, John Wood
409.Outline: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

410.Name: I, Robot
410.Credit: Dir: Alex Proyas With: Will Smith, Bridget Moynahan, Bruce Greenwood
410.Outline: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

411.Name: The Lookout
411.Credit: Dir: Scott Frank With: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Jeff Daniels, Matthew Goode
411.Outline: Chris is a once promising high school athlete whose life is turned upside down following a tragic accident. As he tries to maintain a normal life, he takes a job as a janitor at a bank, where he ultimately finds himself caught up in a planned heist.

412.Name: Phone Booth
412.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Forest Whitaker
412.Outline: Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle.

413.Name: Soylent Green
413.Credit: Dir: Richard Fleischer With: Charlton Heston, Edward G. Robinson, Leigh Taylor-Young
413.Outline: With the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a CEO with ties to the world's main food supply.

414.Name: Westworld
414.Credit: Dir: Michael Crichton With: Yul Brynner, Richard Benjamin, James Brolin
414.Outline: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

415.Name: Payback
415.Credit: Dir: Brian Helgeland With: Mel Gibson, Gregg Henry, Maria Bello
415.Outline: Porter is shot by his wife and best friend and is left to die. When he survives he plots revenge.

416.Name: The Poseidon Adventure
416.Credit: Dir: Ronald Neame With: Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters
416.Outline: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

417.Name: The Spy Who Loved Me
417.Credit: Dir: Lewis Gilbert With: Roger Moore, Barbara Bach, Curd JÃ¼rgens
417.Outline: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads with the help of a KGB agent whose lover he killed.

418.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Drama | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
418.Credit: Dir: Shane Acker With: Elijah Wood, Jennifer Connelly, Crispin Glover
418.Outline: A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

419.Name: Death Proof
419.Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Kurt Russell, ZoÃ« Bell, Rosario Dawson
419.Outline: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

420.Name: Rambo
420.Credit: Dir: Sylvester Stallone With: Sylvester Stallone, Julie Benz, Matthew Marsden
420.Outline: In Thailand, John Rambo joins a group of mercenaries to venture into war-torn Burma, and rescue a group of Christian aid workers who were kidnapped by the ruthless local infantry unit.

421.Name: Don 2
421.Credit: Dir: Farhan Akhtar With: Shah Rukh Khan, Florian Lukas, Om Puri
421.Outline: An international gangster turns himself in, then dramatically escapes - only to face treachery and betrayal.

422.Name: Jurassic World
422.Credit: Dir: Colin Trevorrow With: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Ty Simpkins
422.Outline: A new theme park is built on the original site of Jurassic Park. Everything is going well until the park's newest attraction--a genetically modified giant stealth killing machine--escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

423.Name: The Adjustment Bureau
423.Credit: Dir: George Nolfi With: Matt Damon, Emily Blunt, Lisa Thoreson
423.Outline: The affair between a politician and a ballerina is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

424.Name: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
424.Credit: Dir: Tomas Alfredson With: Gary Oldman, Colin Firth, Tom Hardy
424.Outline: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet agent within MI6.

425.Name: Bone Tomahawk
425.Credit: Dir: S. Craig Zahler With: Kurt Russell, Patrick Wilson, Matthew Fox
425.Outline: Four men set out in the Wild West to rescue a group of captives from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

426.Name: RED
426.Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, Morgan Freeman
426.Outline: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

427.Name: Chronicle
427.Credit: Dir: Josh Trank With: Dane DeHaan, Alex Russell, Michael B. Jordan
427.Outline: Whilst attending a party, three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon, though, they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

428.Name: The Kingdom
428.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Jamie Foxx, Chris Cooper, Jennifer Garner
428.Outline: A team of U.S. government agents is sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

429.Name: Ravenous
429.Credit: Dir: Antonia Bird With: Guy Pearce, Robert Carlyle, David Arquette
429.Outline: In a remote military outpost in the 19th Century, Captain John Boyd and his regiment embark on a rescue mission which takes a dark turn when they are ambushed by a sadistic cannibal.

430.Name: Super 8
430.Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Elle Fanning, AJ Michalka, Kyle Chandler
430.Outline: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

431.Name: Out of Sight
431.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames
431.Outline: A career bank robber breaks out of jail and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a US Marshall he has kidnapped.

432.Name: Alive
432.Credit: Dir: Frank Marshall With: Ethan Hawke, Vincent Spano, Josh Hamilton
432.Outline: Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

433.Name: Spy Game
433.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Robert Redford, Brad Pitt, Catherine McCormack
433.Outline: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

434.Name: A Most Violent Year
434.Credit: Dir: J.C. Chandor With: Oscar Isaac, Jessica Chastain, David Oyelowo
434.Outline: In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.

435.Name: Deja Vu
435.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Jim Caviezel
435.Outline: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.

436.Name: John Q
436.Credit: Dir: Nick Cassavetes With: Denzel Washington, Robert Duvall, Gabriela Oltean
436.Outline: John Quincy Archibald takes a hospital emergency room hostage when his insurance won't cover his son's heart transplant.

437.Name: Breach
437.Credit: Dir: Billy Ray With: Chris Cooper, Ryan Phillippe, Dennis Haysbert
437.Outline: FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.

438.Name: Unleashed
438.Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier With: Jet Li, Bob Hoskins, Morgan Freeman
438.Outline: A man enslaved by the mob since childhood and raised into behaving like a human attack dog escapes his captors and attempts to start a new life.

439.Name: Snowpiercer
439.Credit: Dir: Joon Ho Bong With: Chris Evans, Jamie Bell, Tilda Swinton
439.Outline: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet except for a lucky few who boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, where a class system emerges.

440.Name: Wicker Park
440.Credit: Dir: Paul McGuigan With: Josh Hartnett, Diane Kruger, Matthew Lillard
440.Outline: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a cafÃ© is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.

441.Name: The Thirteenth Floor
441.Credit: Dir: Josef Rusnak With: Craig Bierko, Gretchen Mol, Armin Mueller-Stahl
441.Outline: Computer scientist Hannon Fuller has discovered something extremely important. He's about to tell the discovery to his colleague...

442.Name: The Cabin in the Woods
442.Credit: Dir: Drew Goddard With: Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison
442.Outline: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin in the woods, where they get more than they bargained for. Together, they must discover the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

443.Name: Traitor
443.Credit: Dir: Jeffrey Nachmanoff With: Don Cheadle, Guy Pearce, Archie Panjabi
443.Outline: When straight arrow FBI agent Roy Clayton heads up the investigation into a dangerous international conspiracy, all clues seem to lead back to former U.S. Special Operations officer, Samir Horn.

444.Name: Thunderball
444.Credit: Dir: Terence Young With: Sean Connery, Claudine Auger, Adolfo Celi
444.Outline: James Bond heads to The Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by SPECTRE agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

445.Name: Get the Gringo
445.Credit: Dir: Adrian Grunberg With: Mel Gibson, Kevin Hernandez, Daniel GimÃ©nez Cacho
445.Outline: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

446.Name: Fallen
446.Genre: Action | Crime | Drama | Fantasy | Mystery | Thriller
446.Credit: Dir: Gregory Hoblit With: Denzel Washington, John Goodman, Donald Sutherland
446.Outline: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

447.Name: Stir of Echoes
447.Credit: Dir: David Koepp With: Kevin Bacon, Zachary David Cope, Kathryn Erbe
447.Outline: After being hypnotized by his sister in law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.

448.Name: Legend
448.Credit: Dir: Brian Helgeland With: Tom Hardy, Emily Browning, Taron Egerton
448.Outline: The film tells the story of the identical twin gangsters Reggie and Ronnie Kray, two of the most notorious criminals in British history, and their organised crime empire in the East End of London during the 1960s.

449.Name: Buried
449.Credit: Dir: Rodrigo CortÃ©s With: Ryan Reynolds, JosÃ© Luis GarcÃ­a PÃ©rez, Robert Paterson
449.Outline: Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap.

450.Name: Boiler Room
450.Credit: Dir: Ben Younger With: Giovanni Ribisi, Vin Diesel, Nia Long
450.Outline: A college dropout gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it sounds.

451.Name: Maverick
451.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Jodie Foster, James Garner
451.Outline: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

452.Name: World War Z
452.Credit: Dir: Marc Forster With: Brad Pitt, Mireille Enos, Daniella Kertesz
452.Outline: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.

453.Name: Ghost
453.Credit: Dir: Jerry Zucker With: Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Whoopi Goldberg
453.Outline: After an accident leaves a young man dead, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

454.Name: The Italian Job
454.Credit: Dir: F. Gary Gray With: Donald Sutherland, Mark Wahlberg, Edward Norton
454.Outline: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

455.Name: Non-Stop
455.Credit: Dir: Jaume Collet-Serra With: Liam Neeson, Julianne Moore, Scoot McNairy
455.Outline: An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages that put his fellow passengers at risk unless the airline transfers $150 million into an off-shore account.

456.Name: The X Files
456.Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, John Neville
456.Outline: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

457.Name: Crank
457.Credit: Dir: Mark Neveldine, Brian Taylor With: Jason Statham, Amy Smart, Carlos Sanz
457.Outline: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

458.Name: Inland Empire
458.Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Laura Dern, Jeremy Irons, Justin Theroux
458.Outline: As an actress starts to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world starts to become nightmarish and surreal.

459.Name: Syriana
459.Credit: Dir: Stephen Gaghan With: George Clooney, Matt Damon, Amanda Peet
459.Outline: A politically-charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved and affected by it.

460.Name: Jack Reacher
460.Credit: Dir: Christopher McQuarrie With: Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Richard Jenkins
460.Outline: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

461.Name: In the Heart of the Sea
461.Genre: Action | Adventure | Biography | Drama | History | Thriller
461.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy, Brendan Gleeson
461.Outline: A recounting of a New England whaling ship's sinking by a giant whale in 1820, an experience that later inspired the great novel Moby-Dick.

462.Name: Trust
462.Credit: Dir: David Schwimmer With: Clive Owen, Catherine Keener, Liana Liberato
462.Outline: A teenage girl is targeted by an online sexual predator.

463.Name: Mad Max
463.Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Mel Gibson, Joanne Samuel, Hugh Keays-Byrne
463.Outline: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

464.Name: Orphan
464.Credit: Dir: Jaume Collet-Serra With: Vera Farmiga, Peter Sarsgaard, Isabelle Fuhrman
464.Outline: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she claims to be.

465.Name: Primer
465.Credit: Dir: Shane Carruth With: Shane Carruth, David Sullivan, Casey Gooden
465.Outline: Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.

466.Name: Kill the Messenger
466.Credit: Dir: Michael Cuesta With: Jeremy Renner, Robert Patrick, Jena Sims
466.Outline: Based on the True story of Journalist Gary Webb. The film takes place in the mid 1990s, when Webb uncovered...

467.Name: Harsh Times
467.Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Christian Bale, Eva Longoria, Freddy RodrÃ­guez
467.Outline: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

468.Name: Trance
468.Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: James McAvoy, Rosario Dawson, Vincent Cassel
468.Outline: An art auctioneer who has become mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.

469.Name: Martha Marcy May Marlene
469.Credit: Dir: Sean Durkin With: Elizabeth Olsen, Sarah Paulson, John Hawkes
469.Outline: Haunted by painful memories and increasing paranoia, a damaged woman struggles to re-assimilate with her family after fleeing an abusive cult.

470.Name: The Last Boy Scout
470.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Bruce Willis, Damon Wayans, Chelsea Field
470.Outline: A down and out cynical detective teams up with a down and out ex-quarterback to try and solve a murder...

471.Name: El mariachi
471.Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Carlos Gallardo, Consuelo GÃ³mez, Jaime de Hoyos
471.Outline: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

472.Name: Cop Land
472.Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: Sylvester Stallone, Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta
472.Outline: The sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community populated by New York City policemen slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

473.Name: Constantine
473.Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Djimon Hounsou
473.Outline: Constantine tells the story of irreverent supernatural detective John Constantine, who has literally been to hell and back.

474.Name: Rush Hour
474.Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Jackie Chan, Chris Tucker, Ken Leung
474.Outline: Two cops team up to get back a kidnapped daughter.

475.Name: The Air I Breathe
475.Credit: Dir: Jieho Lee With: Brendan Fraser, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Andy Garcia
475.Outline: A drama based on an ancient Chinese proverb that breaks life down into four emotional cornerstones: happiness, pleasure, sorrow and love. A businessman bets his life on a horse race; a gangster sees the future; a pop star falls prey to a crime boss; a doctor must save the love of his life.

476.Name: Vanilla Sky
476.Credit: Dir: Cameron Crowe With: Tom Cruise, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Cameron Diaz
476.Outline: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

477.Name: Triangle
477.Credit: Dir: Christopher Smith With: Melissa George, Joshua McIvor, Jack Taylor
477.Outline: The story revolves around the passengers of a yachting trip in the Atlantic Ocean who, when struck by mysterious weather conditions, jump to another ship only to experience greater havoc on the open seas.

478.Name: Anonymous
478.Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Rhys Ifans, Vanessa Redgrave, David Thewlis
478.Outline: The theory that it was in fact Edward De Vere, Earl of Oxford, who penned Shakespeare's plays. Set against the backdrop of the succession of Queen Elizabeth I and the Essex rebellion against her.

479.Name: You Only Live Twice
479.Credit: Dir: Lewis Gilbert With: Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Mie Hama
479.Outline: Agent 007 and the Japanese secret service ninja force must find and stop the true culprit of a series of spacejackings before nuclear war is provoked.

480.Name: Basic Instinct
480.Credit: Dir: Paul Verhoeven With: Michael Douglas, Sharon Stone, George Dzundza
480.Outline: A violent, suspended police detective investigates a brutal murder, in which a seductive woman could be involved.

481.Name: Clear and Present Danger
481.Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Harrison Ford, Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer
481.Outline: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

482.Name: 48 Hrs.
482.Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Nick Nolte, Eddie Murphy, Annette O'Toole
482.Outline: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

483.Name: The Edge
483.Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Anthony Hopkins, Alec Baldwin, Elle Macpherson
483.Outline: An intellectual billionaire and two lesser men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.

484.Name: Presumed Innocent
484.Credit: Dir: Alan J. Pakula With: Harrison Ford, Raul Julia, Greta Scacchi
484.Outline: When the female deputy prosecutor R.K. Sabich had an affair with is murdered, he is chosen to lead the investigation. However, when he digs too deeply, he finds himself framed for the murder.

485.Name: The Crimson Rivers
485.Credit: Dir: Mathieu Kassovitz With: Jean Reno, Vincent Cassel, Nadia FarÃ¨s
485.Outline: A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.

486.Name: The Last Castle
486.Credit: Dir: Rod Lurie With: Robert Redford, James Gandolfini, Mark Ruffalo
486.Outline: A court-martialed general rallies together 1200 inmates to rise against the corrupt system that put him away.

487.Name: Get Shorty
487.Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Gene Hackman, Rene Russo, Danny DeVito
487.Outline: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

488.Name: The Towering Inferno
488.Credit: Dir: John Guillermin With: Paul Newman, Steve McQueen, William Holden
488.Outline: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

489.Name: Fatal Attraction
489.Credit: Dir: Adrian Lyne With: Michael Douglas, Glenn Close, Anne Archer
489.Outline: A married man's one night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

490.Name: Breakdown
490.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Mostow With: Kurt Russell, J.T. Walsh, Kathleen Quinlan
490.Outline: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

491.Name: Chappie
491.Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel, Hugh Jackman
491.Outline: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

492.Name: Patriot Games
492.Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Anne Archer
492.Outline: When CIA Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

493.Name: Ocean's Thirteen
493.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon
493.Outline: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist, after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

494.Name: We Own the Night
494.Credit: Dir: James Gray With: Joaquin Phoenix, Mark Wahlberg, Eva Mendes
494.Outline: A New York nightclub manager tries to save his brother and father from Russian mafia hit men.

495.Name: Disturbia
495.Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Shia LaBeouf, David Morse, Carrie-Anne Moss
495.Outline: A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.

496.Name: Unknown
496.Credit: Dir: Jaume Collet-Serra With: Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, January Jones
496.Outline: A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is.

497.Name: Stay
497.Credit: Dir: Marc Forster With: Ewan McGregor, Naomi Watts, Ryan Gosling
497.Outline: This movie focuses on the attempts of a psychiatrist to prevent one of his patients from committing suicide while trying to maintain his own grip on reality.

498.Name: Exam
498.Credit: Dir: Stuart Hazeldine With: Adar Beck, Gemma Chan, Nathalie Cox
498.Outline: The final eight candidates for a highly desirable corporate job are locked together in an exam room and given a test with one question. It seems simple yet confusing that soon, tensions begin to unravel.

499.Name: Spectre
499.Credit: Dir: Sam Mendes With: Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, LÃ©a Seydoux
499.Outline: A cryptic message from Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover a sinister organization. While M battles political forces to keep the secret service alive, Bond peels back the layers of deceit to reveal the terrible truth behind SPECTRE.

500.Name: The Debt
500.Credit: Dir: John Madden With: Helen Mirren, Sam Worthington, Tom Wilkinson
500.Outline: In 1965, three Mossad agents cross into East Berlin to apprehend a notorious Nazi war criminal. Thirty years later, the secrets the agents share come back to haunt them.

501.Name: Mission: Impossible III
501.Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Tom Cruise, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames
501.Outline: Agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fianceÃ© in response .

502.Name: Jumanji
502.Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst, Bonnie Hunt
502.Outline: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

503.Name: Frantic
503.Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Harrison Ford, Betty Buckley, Emmanuelle Seigner
503.Outline: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

504.Name: Four Brothers
504.Credit: Dir: John Singleton With: Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Garrett Hedlund
504.Outline: Four brothers look to avenge their mother's death.

505.Name: It Follows
505.Credit: Dir: David Robert Mitchell With: Maika Monroe, Keir Gilchrist, Olivia Luccardi
505.Outline: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

506.Name: The Island
506.Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Scarlett Johansson, Ewan McGregor, Djimon Hounsou
506.Outline: Lincoln Six Echo is just like everyone else - he's waiting to go to the Island, the only place left in the world to actually live a life...

507.Name: The Book of Eli
507.Credit: Dir: Albert Hughes, Allen Hughes With: Denzel Washington, Mila Kunis, Ray Stevenson
507.Outline: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

508.Name: Green Zone
508.Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: Matt Damon, Jason Isaacs, Greg Kinnear
508.Outline: Discovering covert and faulty intelligence causes a U.S. Army officer to go rogue as he hunts for Weapons of Mass Destruction in an unstable region.

509.Name: The East
509.Credit: Dir: Zal Batmanglij With: Brit Marling, Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd, Ellen Page
509.Outline: An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities changing dramatically after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations.

510.Name: Odd Thomas
510.Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Anton Yelchin, Ashley Sommers, Leonor Varela
510.Outline: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces.

511.Name: Spider
511.Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Ralph Fiennes, Miranda Richardson, Gabriel Byrne
511.Outline: A mentally disturbed man takes residence in a halfway house. His mind gradually slips back into the realm created by his illness, where he replays a key part of his childhood.

512.Name: Adventures in Babysitting
512.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller
512.Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Elisabeth Shue, Maia Brewton, Keith Coogan
512.Outline: A babysitter must leave her safe suburban surroundings and head for the heart of the big city to rescue a stranded friend, unaware of the perilous adventures that await her and the kids she's looking after who have tagged along.

513.Name: Enemy
513.Credit: Dir: Denis Villeneuve With: Jake Gyllenhaal, MÃ©lanie Laurent, Sarah Gadon
513.Outline: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

514.Name: Cypher
514.Credit: Dir: Vincenzo Natali With: Jeremy Northam, Lucy Liu, Nigel Bennett
514.Outline: An unsuspecting, disenchanted man finds himself working as a spy in the dangerous, high-stakes world of corporate espionage. Quickly getting way over-his-head, he teams up with a mysterious femme fatale.

515.Name: The Pledge
515.Credit: Dir: Sean Penn With: Jack Nicholson, Benicio Del Toro, Patricia Clarkson
515.Outline: A retiring police chief pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

516.Name: The Babadook
516.Credit: Dir: Jennifer Kent With: Essie Davis, Noah Wiseman, Daniel Henshall
516.Outline: A single mother, plagued by the violent death of her husband, battles with her son's fear of a monster lurking in the house, but soon discovers a sinister presence all around her.

517.Name: Stoker
517.Credit: Dir: Chan-wook Park With: Mia Wasikowska, Nicole Kidman, Matthew Goode
517.Outline: After India's father dies, her Uncle Charlie, who she never knew existed, comes to live with her and her unstable mother. She comes to suspect this mysterious, charming man has ulterior motives and becomes increasingly infatuated with him.

518.Name: The Score
518.Credit: Dir: Frank Oz With: Robert De Niro, Edward Norton, Marlon Brando
518.Outline: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

519.Name: Eden Lake
519.Credit: Dir: James Watkins With: Kelly Reilly, Michael Fassbender, Tara Ellis
519.Outline: Refusing to let anything spoil their romantic weekend break, a young couple confront a gang of loutish youths with terrifyingly brutal consequences.

520.Name: Bad Boys
520.Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Lisa Boyle
520.Outline: Two hip detectives protect a murder witness while investigating a case of stolen heroin.

521.Name: The 'Burbs
521.Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Tom Hanks, Bruce Dern, Carrie Fisher
521.Outline: An overstressed suburbanite and two of his neighbors struggle to prove their paranoid theory that the new family on the block are part of a murderous cult.

522.Name: Bringing Out the Dead
522.Credit: Dir: Martin Scorsese With: Nicolas Cage, Patricia Arquette, John Goodman
522.Outline: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

523.Name: Keeping Mum
523.Credit: Dir: Niall Johnson With: Rowan Atkinson, Kristin Scott Thomas, Maggie Smith
523.Outline: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair and his children are up to no good.

524.Name: The Maze Runner
524.Credit: Dir: Wes Ball With: Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario, Will Poulter
524.Outline: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.

525.Name: eXistenZ
525.Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Jude Law, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Ian Holm
525.Outline: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

526.Name: Insidious
526.Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Ty Simpkins
526.Outline: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

527.Name: Live and Let Die
527.Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Roger Moore, Yaphet Kotto, Jane Seymour
527.Outline: 007 is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

528.Name: Big Nothing
528.Credit: Dir: Jean-Baptiste Andrea With: David Schwimmer, Simon Pegg, Alice Eve
528.Outline: A frustrated, unemployed teacher joining forces with a scammer and his girlfriend in a blackmailing scheme.

529.Name: The Transporter
529.Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier, Corey Yuen With: Jason Statham, Qi Shu, Matt Schulze
529.Outline: Frank is hired to "transport" packages for unknown clients and has made a very good living doing so. But when asked to move a package that begins moving, complications arise.

530.Name: Rendition
530.Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Reese Witherspoon, Jake Gyllenhaal, Peter Sarsgaard
530.Outline: A CIA analyst questions his assignment after witnessing an unorthodox interrogation at a secret detention facility outside the US.

531.Name: From Hell
531.Credit: Dir: Albert Hughes, Allen Hughes With: Johnny Depp, Heather Graham, Ian Holm
531.Outline: In Victorian Era London, a troubled clairvoyant police detective investigates the murders by Jack The Ripper.

532.Name: Con Air
532.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich
532.Outline: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

533.Name: Young Guns
533.Credit: Dir: Christopher Cain With: Emilio Estevez, Kiefer Sutherland, Lou Diamond Phillips
533.Outline: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

534.Name: Stonehearst Asylum
534.Credit: Dir: Brad Anderson With: Kate Beckinsale, Jim Sturgess, David Thewlis
534.Outline: An Oxford graduate takes up a job in a mental asylum, only to discover that the "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane and that there is more going on than meets the eye.

535.Name: Street Kings
535.Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Keanu Reeves, Forest Whitaker, Hugh Laurie
535.Outline: An undercover cop, disillusioned by the recent murder of his wife, is implicated in the murder of an officer and must struggle to clear himself.

536.Name: Dead Calm
536.Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Nicole Kidman, Sam Neill, Billy Zane
536.Outline: A mass murderer kidnaps and seduces a young woman after leaving her husband to die on the vessel whose crew he has just slaughtered.

537.Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Jim Sturgess, Kate Bosworth, Kevin Spacey
537.Outline: "21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

538.Name: The Matador
538.Credit: Dir: Richard Shepard With: Pierce Brosnan, Greg Kinnear, Hope Davis
538.Outline: A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.

539.Name: Fair Game
539.Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Naomi Watts, Sean Penn, Sonya Davison
539.Outline: CIA operative Valerie Plame discovers her identity is allegedly leaked by the government as payback for an op-ed article her husband wrote criticizing the Bush administration.

540.Name: Who Am I?
540.Credit: Dir: Benny Chan, Jackie Chan With: Jackie Chan, Michelle Ferre, Mirai Yamamoto
540.Outline: A secret agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by a number of other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.

541.Name: The Brave One
541.Credit: Dir: Neil Jordan With: Jodie Foster, Terrence Howard, Naveen Andrews
541.Outline: A woman struggles to recover from a brutal attack by setting out on a mission for revenge.

542.Name: The Thomas Crown Affair
542.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Pierce Brosnan, Rene Russo, Denis Leary
542.Outline: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

543.Name: A Most Wanted Man
543.Credit: Dir: Anton Corbijn With: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Rachel McAdams, Daniel BrÃ¼hl
543.Outline: A Chechen Muslim illegally immigrates to Hamburg, where he gets caught in the international war on terror.

544.Name: The Ghost and the Darkness
544.Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Michael Douglas, Val Kilmer, Tom Wilkinson
544.Outline: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

545.Name: Hanna
545.Credit: Dir: Joe Wright With: Saoirse Ronan, Cate Blanchett, Eric Bana
545.Outline: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

546.Name: Veronica Mars
546.Credit: Dir: Rob Thomas With: Kristen Bell, Jason Dohring, Enrico Colantoni
546.Outline: Years after walking away from her past as a teenage private eye, Veronica Mars gets pulled back to her hometown - just in time for her high school reunion - in order to help her old flame Logan Echolls, who's embroiled in a murder mystery.

547.Name: Death Sentence
547.Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Kevin Bacon, John Goodman, Kelly Preston
547.Outline: Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.

548.Name: The A-Team
548.Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley
548.Outline: A group of Iraq War veterans looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

549.Name: THX 1138
549.Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Robert Duvall, Donald Pleasence, Don Pedro Colley
549.Outline: Set in the 25th century, the story centers around a man and a woman who rebel against their rigidly controlled society.

550.Name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
550.Credit: Dir: Peter R. Hunt With: George Lazenby, Diana Rigg, Telly Savalas
550.Outline: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

551.Name: The Firm
551.Credit: Dir: Sydney Pollack With: Tom Cruise, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Gene Hackman
551.Outline: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

552.Name: For Your Eyes Only
552.Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Carole Bouquet, Topol
552.Outline: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

553.Name: One Hour Photo
553.Credit: Dir: Mark Romanek With: Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan
553.Outline: An employee of a one-hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a young suburban family.

554.Name: Pandorum
554.Credit: Dir: Christian Alvart With: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet
554.Outline: A pair of crew members aboard a spaceship wake up with no knowledge of their mission or their identities.

555.Name: The Grey
555.Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Liam Neeson, Dermot Mulroney, Frank Grillo
555.Outline: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

556.Credit: Dir: Peter Hyams With: Roy Scheider, John Lithgow, Helen Mirren
556.Outline: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery.

557.Name: Out of the Furnace
557.Credit: Dir: Scott Cooper With: Christian Bale, Casey Affleck, Zoe Saldana
557.Outline: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell, takes matters into his own hands to find justice.

558.Name: Trick 'r Treat
558.Credit: Dir: Michael Dougherty With: Anna Paquin, Brian Cox, Dylan Baker
558.Outline: Five interwoven stories that occur on Halloween: An everyday high school principal has a secret life as a serial killer; a college virgin might have just met the guy for her; a group of teenagers pull a mean prank; a woman who loathes the night has to contend with her holiday-obsessed husband; and a mean old man meets his match with a demonic, supernatural trick-or-treater.

559.Name: The Man with the Golden Gun
559.Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Roger Moore, Christopher Lee, Britt Ekland
559.Outline: James Bond is led to believe that he is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

560.Name: X-Men: The Last Stand
560.Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
560.Outline: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.

561.Name: Safe House
561.Credit: Dir: Daniel Espinosa With: Denzel Washington, Ryan Reynolds, Robert Patrick
561.Outline: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

562.Name: U Turn
562.Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Sean Penn, Jennifer Lopez, Nick Nolte
562.Outline: A man heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him, is forced to stop in an Arizona town where everything that can go wrong, does go wrong.

563.Name: Unstoppable
563.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Denzel Washington, Chris Pine, Rosario Dawson
563.Outline: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

564.Name: The Hunter
564.Credit: Dir: Daniel Nettheim With: Willem Dafoe, Sam Neill, Morgana Davies
564.Outline: Martin, a mercenary, is sent from Europe by a mysterious biotech company to the Tasmanian wilderness on a hunt for the last Tasmanian tiger.

565.Name: The Enforcer
565.Credit: Dir: James Fargo With: Clint Eastwood, Tyne Daly, Harry Guardino
565.Outline: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with a rookie female partner that he's not too excited to be working with.

566.Name: No Escape
566.Credit: Dir: John Erick Dowdle With: Lake Bell, Pierce Brosnan, Owen Wilson
566.Outline: In their new overseas home, an American family soon finds themselves caught in the middle of a coup, and they frantically look for a safe escape from an environment where foreigners are being immediately executed.

567.Name: Panic Room
567.Credit: Dir: David Fincher With: Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker
567.Outline: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

568.Name: Swimming Pool
568.Credit: Dir: FranÃ§ois Ozon With: Charlotte Rampling, Charles Dance, Ludivine Sagnier
568.Outline: A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.

569.Name: Underworld: Evolution
569.Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Bill Nighy
569.Outline: Picking up directly from the previous film, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

570.Name: Sea of Love
570.Credit: Dir: Harold Becker With: Al Pacino, Ellen Barkin, John Goodman
570.Outline: A detective investigating a series of murders becomes involved with a woman who may be the culprit.

571.Name: Hannibal
571.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman
571.Outline: Living in exile, Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced FBI agent Clarice Starling and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.

572.Name: Gangster Squad
572.Credit: Dir: Ruben Fleischer With: Sean Penn, Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone
572.Outline: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

573.Name: Escape Plan
573.Credit: Dir: Mikael HÃ¥fstrÃ¶m With: Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, 50 Cent
573.Outline: When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the world's most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.

574.Name: 2 Guns
574.Credit: Dir: Baltasar KormÃ¡kur With: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton
574.Outline: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.

575.Name: Redirected
575.Credit: Dir: Emilis Velyvis With: Vinnie Jones, Scot Williams, Gil Darnell
575.Outline: Three friends try to make money and invite another friend in on a plot.

576.Name: Innerspace
576.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
576.Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Dennis Quaid, Martin Short, Meg Ryan
576.Outline: A hapless store clerk must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.

577.Name: The Long Kiss Goodnight
577.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Geena Davis, Samuel L. Jackson, Yvonne Zima
577.Outline: A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.

578.Name: Cassandra's Dream
578.Credit: Dir: Woody Allen With: Colin Farrell, Ewan McGregor, Hayley Atwell
578.Outline: The tale of two brothers with serious financial woes. When a third party proposes they turn to crime, things go badly and the two become enemies.

579.Name: The Way of the Gun
579.Credit: Dir: Christopher McQuarrie With: Ryan Phillippe, Benicio Del Toro, Juliette Lewis
579.Outline: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

580.Name: Shoot 'Em Up
580.Credit: Dir: Michael Davis With: Clive Owen, Monica Bellucci, Paul Giamatti
580.Outline: A man named Mr. Smith delivers a woman's baby during a shootout, and is then called upon to protect the newborn from the army of gunmen.

581.Name: Apt Pupil
581.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Ian McKellen, Brad Renfro, Joshua Jackson
581.Outline: A boy blackmails his neighbour after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

582.Name: Confidence
582.Credit: Dir: James Foley With: Edward Burns, Dustin Hoffman, Rachel Weisz
582.Outline: Jake Vig (Burns) is a consummate grifter about to pull his biggest con yet, one set to avenge his friend's murder. But his last scam backfired, leaving him indebted to a mob boss (Hoffman) and his enforcer.

583.Name: The Mask of Zorro
583.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Romance | Thriller | Western
583.Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Antonio Banderas, Anthony Hopkins, Catherine Zeta-Jones
583.Outline: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.

584.Name: Signs
584.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Mel Gibson, Joaquin Phoenix, Rory Culkin
584.Outline: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.

585.Name: The Call
585.Credit: Dir: Brad Anderson With: Halle Berry, Evie Thompson, Abigail Breslin
585.Outline: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.

586.Name: The Wolverine
586.Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto
586.Outline: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.

587.Name: The Good Shepherd
587.Credit: Dir: Robert De Niro With: Matt Damon, Angelina Jolie, Robert De Niro
587.Outline: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.

588.Name: Backdraft
588.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, Robert De Niro
588.Outline: Two Chicago firefighter brothers who don't get along have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

589.Name: Kalifornia
589.Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: Brad Pitt, Juliette Lewis, Kathy Larson
589.Outline: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

590.Name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
590.Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
590.Outline: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

591.Name: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
591.Credit: Dir: Scott Derrickson With: Laura Linney, Tom Wilkinson, Shohreh Aghdashloo
591.Outline: A lawyer takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest who performed an exorcism on a young girl.

592.Name: Killer Joe
592.Credit: Dir: William Friedkin With: Matthew McConaughey, Emile Hirsch, Juno Temple
592.Outline: When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.

593.Name: The Client
593.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Susan Sarandon, Tommy Lee Jones, Brad Renfro
593.Outline: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the district attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

594.Name: Wanted
594.Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy, Morgan Freeman
594.Outline: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

595.Name: Transsiberian
595.Credit: Dir: Brad Anderson With: Woody Harrelson, Emily Mortimer, Ben Kingsley
595.Outline: A Trans-Siberian train journey from China to Moscow becomes a thrilling chase of deception and murder when an American couple encounters a mysterious pair of fellow travelers.

596.Name: Angels & Demons
596.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer
596.Outline: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican.

597.Name: The Living Daylights
597.Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Maryam d'Abo, Jeroen KrabbÃ©
597.Outline: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.

598.Name: The Guest
598.Credit: Dir: Adam Wingard With: Dan Stevens, Sheila Kelley, Maika Monroe
598.Outline: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

599.Name: The Rundown
599.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Christopher Walken
599.Outline: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.

600.Name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
600.Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds
600.Outline: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.

601.Name: Conspiracy Theory
601.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Julia Roberts, Patrick Stewart
601.Outline: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

602.Name: Safe Haven
602.Credit: Dir: Lasse HallstrÃ¶m With: Julianne Hough, Josh Duhamel, Cobie Smulders
602.Outline: A young woman with a mysterious past lands in Southport, North Carolina where her bond with a widower forces her to confront the dark secret that haunts her.

603.Name: Lethal Weapon 3
603.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
603.Outline: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue an arms dealer who is a former LAPD officer.

604.Name: The Fast and the Furious
604.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez
604.Outline: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

605.Name: Brooklyn's Finest
605.Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Richard Gere, Don Cheadle, Ethan Hawke
605.Outline: Three unconnected Brooklyn cops wind up at the same deadly location after enduring vastly different career paths.

606.Name: Absolute Power
606.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Ed Harris
606.Outline: A career thief witnesses a horrific crime involving the U.S. President.

607.Name: The Ninth Gate
607.Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin
