607.Outline: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

608.Name: Smokin' Aces
608.Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Jeremy Piven, Ryan Reynolds, Ray Liotta
608.Outline: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

609.Name: The Bourne Legacy
609.Credit: Dir: Tony Gilroy With: Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz, Edward Norton
609.Outline: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

610.Name: The Chronicles of Riddick
610.Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Vin Diesel, Judi Dench, Colm Feore
610.Outline: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

611.Name: Commando
611.Credit: Dir: Mark L. Lester With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rae Dawn Chong, Dan Hedaya
611.Outline: A retired elite Black Ops Commando launches a one man war against a group of South American criminals who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into starting a revolution and getting an exiled dictator back into power.

612.Name: Diamonds Are Forever
612.Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray
612.Outline: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

613.Name: The Loved Ones
613.Credit: Dir: Sean Byrne With: Xavier Samuel, Robin McLeavy, Victoria Thaine
613.Outline: When Brent turns down his classmate Lola's invitation to the prom, she concocts a wildly violent plan for revenge.

614.Name: In Time
614.Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried, Cillian Murphy
614.Outline: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

615.Name: Unfaithful
615.Credit: Dir: Adrian Lyne With: Richard Gere, Diane Lane, Olivier Martinez
615.Outline: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

616.Name: Machete
616.Credit: Dir: Ethan Maniquis, Robert Rodriguez With: Danny Trejo, Michelle Rodriguez, Robert De Niro
616.Outline: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

617.Name: Pride and Glory
617.Credit: Dir: Gavin O'Connor With: Edward Norton, Colin Farrell, Noah Emmerich
617.Outline: A family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.

618.Name: The Expendables 2
618.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Sylvester Stallone, Liam Hemsworth, Randy Couture
618.Outline: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

619.Name: Blade II
619.Credit: Dir: Guillermo del Toro With: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Ron Perlman
619.Outline: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reaper vampires who feed on vampires.

620.Name: RED 2
620.Credit: Dir: Dean Parisot With: Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, John Malkovich
620.Outline: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

621.Name: The Bone Collector
621.Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Queen Latifah
621.Outline: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

622.Name: K-19: The Widowmaker
622.Credit: Dir: Kathryn Bigelow With: Harrison Ford, Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings
622.Outline: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

623.Name: Contagion
623.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: Matt Damon, Kate Winslet, Jude Law
623.Outline: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a worldwide epidemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

624.Name: Fast & Furious
624.Credit: Dir: Justin Lin With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez
624.Outline: Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

625.Name: Elysium
625.Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley
625.Outline: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

626.Name: Blindness
626.Credit: Dir: Fernando Meirelles With: Julianne Moore, Mark Ruffalo, Gael GarcÃ­a Bernal
626.Outline: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant "white blindness". Those first afflicted are quarantined...

627.Name: The Running Man
627.Credit: Dir: Paul Michael Glaser With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Maria Conchita Alonso, Yaphet Kotto
627.Outline: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

628.Name: Arbitrage
628.Credit: Dir: Nicholas Jarecki With: Richard Gere, Susan Sarandon, Brit Marling
628.Outline: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

629.Name: Black Rain
629.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia, Ken Takakura
629.Outline: Two NYC cops arrest a Yakuza member and must escort him when he's extradited to Japan.

630.Name: Summer of Sam
630.Credit: Dir: Spike Lee With: John Leguizamo, Adrien Brody, Mira Sorvino
630.Outline: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

631.Name: Wasabi
631.Credit: Dir: GÃ©rard Krawczyk With: Jean Reno, RyÃ´ko Hirosue, Michel Muller
631.Outline: Hubert is a French policeman with very sharp methods. After being forced to take 2 months off by his boss...

632.Name: Sudden Impact
632.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Pat Hingle
632.Outline: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

633.Name: Attack the Block
633.Credit: Dir: Joe Cornish With: John Boyega, Jodie Whittaker, Alex Esmail
633.Outline: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

634.Name: Ransom
634.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Mel Gibson, Gary Sinise, Rene Russo
634.Outline: When a rich man's son is kidnapped, he cooperates with the police at first but then tries a unique tactic against the criminals.

635.Name: Man on a Ledge
635.Credit: Dir: Asger Leth With: Sam Worthington, Elizabeth Banks, Jamie Bell
635.Outline: As a police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop, the biggest diamond heist ever committed is in motion.

636.Name: Tears of the Sun
636.Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Bruce Willis, Cole Hauser, Monica Bellucci
636.Outline: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

637.Name: Vantage Point
637.Credit: Dir: Pete Travis With: Dennis Quaid, Forest Whitaker, Matthew Fox
637.Outline: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

638.Name: The Recruit
638.Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Al Pacino, Colin Farrell, Bridget Moynahan
638.Outline: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

639.Name: Lethal Weapon 4
639.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
639.Outline: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with a deadly Chinese crimelord trying to get his brother out of prison.

640.Name: The Manchurian Candidate
640.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Demme With: Denzel Washington, Liev Schreiber, Meryl Streep
640.Outline: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

641.Name: Armageddon
641.Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck
641.Outline: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

642.Name: Crimson Peak
642.Genre: Drama | Fantasy | Horror | Mystery | Romance | Thriller
642.Credit: Dir: Guillermo del Toro With: Mia Wasikowska, Jessica Chastain, Tom Hiddleston
642.Outline: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider. Trying to escape the ghosts of her past, she is swept away to a house that breathes, bleeds - and remembers.

643.Name: Eagle Eye
643.Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan, Rosario Dawson
643.Outline: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

644.Name: Edge of Darkness
644.Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Mel Gibson, Ray Winstone, Danny Huston
644.Outline: As homicide detective Thomas Craven investigates the death of his activist daughter, he uncovers not only her secret life, but a corporate cover-up and government collusion that attracts an agent tasked with cleaning up the evidence.

645.Name: 16 Blocks
645.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Bruce Willis, Yasiin Bey, David Morse
645.Outline: An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.

646.Name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
646.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: John Cusack, Kevin Spacey, Jack Thompson
646.Outline: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

647.Name: Kiss of the Dragon
647.Credit: Dir: Chris Nahon With: Jet Li, Bridget Fonda, TchÃ©ky Karyo
647.Outline: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

648.Name: The Beach
648.Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon
648.Outline: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

649.Name: Courage Under Fire
649.Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Denzel Washington, Meg Ryan, Lou Diamond Phillips
649.Outline: A US Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

650.Name: Christine
650.Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Keith Gordon, John Stockwell, Alexandra Paul
650.Outline: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

651.Name: Spartan
651.Credit: Dir: David Mamet With: Val Kilmer, Derek Luke, William H. Macy
651.Outline: The investigation into a kidnapping of the daughter of a high-ranking US government official.

652.Name: Om Shanti Om
652.Genre: Action | Comedy | Drama | Musical | Romance | Thriller
652.Credit: Dir: Farah Khan With: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Arjun Rampal
652.Outline: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

653.Name: Demolition Man
653.Credit: Dir: Marco Brambilla With: Sylvester Stallone, Wesley Snipes, Sandra Bullock
653.Outline: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

654.Name: Licence to Kill
654.Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Robert Davi, Carey Lowell
654.Outline: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

655.Name: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
655.Credit: Dir: Patrick Tatopoulos With: Rhona Mitra, Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy
655.Outline: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

656.Name: Drag Me to Hell
656.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Alison Lohman, Justin Long, Ruth Livier
656.Outline: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.

657.Name: Derailed
657.Credit: Dir: Mikael HÃ¥fstrÃ¶m With: Clive Owen, Jennifer Aniston, Vincent Cassel
657.Outline: When two married business executives having an affair are blackmailed by a violent criminal, the two must turn the tables on him to save their families.

658.Name: Insidious: Chapter 2
658.Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Barbara Hershey
658.Outline: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

659.Name: The Last House on the Left
659.Credit: Dir: Dennis Iliadis With: Garret Dillahunt, Monica Potter, Tony Goldwyn
659.Outline: After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics.

660.Name: Rush Hour 2
660.Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Jackie Chan, Chris Tucker, John Lone
660.Outline: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

661.Name: Terminator Genisys
661.Credit: Dir: Alan Taylor With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jason Clarke, Emilia Clarke
661.Outline: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

662.Name: Star Trek: Generations
662.Credit: Dir: David Carson With: Patrick Stewart, William Shatner, Malcolm McDowell
662.Outline: Captain Picard, with the help of supposedly dead Captain Kirk, must stop a madman willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

663.Name: Joy Ride
663.Credit: Dir: John Dahl With: Matthew Kimbrough, Leelee Sobieski, Steve Zahn
663.Outline: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.

664.Name: Hostage
664.Credit: Dir: Florent-Emilio Siri With: Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Serena Scott Thomas
664.Outline: A failed police negotiator turned small town cop, must save the lives of a family held hostage, which draws him into a much more dangerous situation.

665.Name: What Lies Beneath
665.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Harrison Ford, Michelle Pfeiffer, Katharine Towne
665.Outline: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

666.Name: Octopussy
666.Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan
666.Outline: A fake FabergÃ© egg and a fellow agent's death lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

667.Name: Run All Night
667.Credit: Dir: Jaume Collet-Serra With: Liam Neeson, Ed Harris, Joel Kinnaman
667.Outline: Mobster and hit man Jimmy Conlon has one night to figure out where his loyalties lie: with his estranged son, Mike, whose life is in danger, or his longtime best friend, mob boss Shawn Maguire, who wants Mike to pay for the death of his own son.

668.Name: Secret Window
668.Credit: Dir: David Koepp With: Johnny Depp, Maria Bello, John Turturro
668.Outline: A writer is accused for plagiarism by a strange man, who then starts haunting him for "justice."

669.Name: The Mechanic
669.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Jason Statham, Ben Foster, Donald Sutherland
669.Outline: Follows an elite hit man as he teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

670.Name: Kiss the Girls
670.Credit: Dir: Gary Fleder With: Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Cary Elwes
670.Outline: Police hunting for a serial killer are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

671.Name: Copycat
671.Credit: Dir: Jon Amiel With: Sigourney Weaver, Holly Hunter, Dermot Mulroney
671.Outline: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

672.Name: Bad Boys II
672.Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union
672.Outline: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida.

673.Name: Severance
673.Credit: Dir: Christopher Smith With: Danny Dyer, Laura Harris, Tim McInnerny
673.Outline: During a team-building retreat in the mountains a group of sales representatives are hunted down one by one.

674.Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
674.Credit: Dir: Chuck Russell With: Heather Langenkamp, Robert Englund, Craig Wasson
674.Outline: Survivors of undead serial killer Freddy Krueger - who stalks his victims in their dreams - learn to take control of their own dreams in order to fight back.

675.Name: Outbreak
675.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Dustin Hoffman, Rene Russo, Morgan Freeman
675.Outline: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?

676.Name: Idiocracy
676.Credit: Dir: Mike Judge With: Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard
676.Outline: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.

677.Name: The Da Vinci Code
677.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Jean Reno
677.Outline: A murder inside the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years -- which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

678.Name: Awake
678.Credit: Dir: Joby Harold With: Hayden Christensen, Jessica Alba, Terrence Howard
678.Outline: The story focuses on a man who suffers "anesthetic awareness" and finds himself awake and aware, but paralyzed, during heart surgery. His mother must wrestle with her own demons as a turn of events unfolds around them, while trying to unfold the story hidden behind her son's young wife.

679.Name: Flatliners
679.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Kiefer Sutherland, Kevin Bacon, Julia Roberts
679.Outline: Four Medical students experiment on "near death" experiences that involve past tragedies until the dark consequences begin to jeopardize their lives.

680.Name: Day Watch
680.Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Konstantin Khabenskiy, Mariya Poroshina, Vladimir Menshov
680.Outline: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

681.Name: Heist
681.Credit: Dir: David Mamet With: Gene Hackman, Rebecca Pidgeon, Danny DeVito
681.Outline: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

682.Name: Byzantium
682.Credit: Dir: Neil Jordan With: Saoirse Ronan, Gemma Arterton, Sam Riley
682.Outline: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.

683.Name: Hollywoodland
683.Genre: Biography | Crime | Drama | History | Mystery | Romance | Thriller
683.Credit: Dir: Allen Coulter With: Adrien Brody, Ben Affleck, Diane Lane
683.Outline: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves , the star of the television series Adventures of Superman .

684.Name: District 13: Ultimatum
684.Credit: Dir: Patrick Alessandrin With: Cyril Raffaelli, David Belle, Philippe Torreton
684.Outline: Damien and Leito return to District 13 on a mission to bring peace to the troubled sector that is controlled by five different gang bosses, before the city's secret services take drastic measures to solve the problem.

685.Name: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
685.Credit: Dir: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez With: Mickey Rourke, Jessica Alba, Josh Brolin
685.Outline: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.

686.Name: Need for Speed
686.Credit: Dir: Scott Waugh With: Aaron Paul, Dominic Cooper, Imogen Poots
686.Outline: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

687.Name: The Pelican Brief
687.Credit: Dir: Alan J. Pakula With: Julia Roberts, Denzel Washington, Sam Shepard
687.Outline: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

688.Name: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
688.Credit: Dir: Curtis Hanson With: Annabella Sciorra, Rebecca De Mornay, Matt McCoy
688.Outline: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

689.Name: Stand Up Guys
689.Credit: Dir: Fisher Stevens With: Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, Alan Arkin
689.Outline: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.

690.Name: Safe
690.Credit: Dir: Boaz Yakin With: Jason Statham, Catherine Chan, Chris Sarandon
690.Outline: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

691.Name: A Walk Among the Tombstones
691.Credit: Dir: Scott Frank With: Liam Neeson, Dan Stevens, David Harbour
691.Outline: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

692.Name: Homefront
692.Credit: Dir: Gary Fleder With: Jason Statham, James Franco, Winona Ryder
692.Outline: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

693.Name: A Perfect Getaway
693.Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Milla Jovovich, Steve Zahn, Timothy Olyphant
693.Outline: Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.

694.Name: The Double
694.Credit: Dir: Richard Ayoade With: Jesse Eisenberg, Mia Wasikowska, Wallace Shawn
694.Outline: A clerk in a government agency finds his unenviable life takes a turn for the horrific with the arrival of a new co-worker who is both his exact physical double and his opposite - confident, charismatic and seductive with women.

695.Name: Premium Rush
695.Credit: Dir: David Koepp With: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Michael Shannon, Dania Ramirez
695.Outline: In Manhattan, a bike messenger picks up an envelope that attracts the interest of a dirty cop, who pursues the cyclist throughout the city.

696.Name: Savages
696.Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Taylor Kitsch, Blake Lively
696.Outline: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

697.Name: Instinct
697.Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Anthony Hopkins, Cuba Gooding Jr., Donald Sutherland
697.Outline: When a noted anthropologist who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to a young psychiatrist to get through to him.

698.Name: You're Next
698.Credit: Dir: Adam Wingard With: Sharni Vinson, Joe Swanberg, AJ Bowen
698.Outline: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

699.Name: Swordfish
699.Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: John Travolta, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
699.Outline: A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.

700.Name: Unknown
700.Credit: Dir: Simon Brand With: Jim Caviezel, Greg Kinnear, Bridget Moynahan
700.Outline: Five men wake up in a locked-down warehouse with no memory of who they are. They are forced to figure out who is good and who is bad to stay alive.

701.Name: Wild Things
701.Credit: Dir: John McNaughton With: Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon, Neve Campbell
701.Outline: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

702.Name: Friday the 13th
702.Credit: Dir: Sean S. Cunningham With: Betsy Palmer, Adrienne King, Jeannine Taylor
702.Outline: A group of camp counselors is stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which, years before, was the site of a child's drowning.

703.Name: Act of Valor
703.Credit: Dir: Mike McCoy, Scott Waugh With: Alex Veadov, Roselyn Sanchez, Nestor Serrano
703.Outline: An elite team of Navy SEALs embark on a covert mission to recover a kidnapped CIA agent.

704.Name: Cellular
704.Credit: Dir: David R. Ellis With: Kim Basinger, Chris Evans, Jason Statham
704.Outline: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped; and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

705.Name: Out of Time
705.Credit: Dir: Carl Franklin With: Denzel Washington, Sanaa Lathan, Eva Mendes
705.Outline: A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.

706.Name: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
706.Credit: Dir: Tony Randel With: Doug Bradley, Ashley Laurence, Clare Higgins
706.Outline: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the death of her family, where the occult-obsessive head resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites once again.

707.Name: Horns
707.Credit: Dir: Alexandre Aja With: Daniel Radcliffe, Juno Temple, Max Minghella
707.Outline: In the aftermath of his girlfriend's mysterious death, a young man awakens to find strange horns sprouting from his temples.

708.Name: Basic
708.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Connie Nielsen
708.Outline: A DEA agent investigates the disappearance of a legendary Army ranger drill sergeant and several of his cadets during a training exercise gone severely awry.

709.Name: Ladder 49
709.Credit: Dir: Jay Russell With: Joaquin Phoenix, John Travolta, Jacinda Barrett
709.Outline: Under the watchful eye of his mentor Captain Mike Kennedy, probationary firefighter Jack Morrison matures...

710.Name: Dead Man Down
710.Credit: Dir: Niels Arden Oplev With: Colin Farrell, Noomi Rapace, Dominic Cooper
710.Outline: In New York City, a crime lord's right-hand man is helped by a woman seeking retribution.

711.Name: Olympus Has Fallen
711.Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Gerard Butler, Aaron Eckhart, Morgan Freeman
711.Outline: Disgraced Secret Service agent (and former presidential guard) Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack; using his inside knowledge, Banning works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

712.Name: Chaos
712.Credit: Dir: Tony Giglio With: Jason Statham, Ryan Phillippe, Wesley Snipes
712.Outline: Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

713.Name: The Missing
713.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tommy Lee Jones, Cate Blanchett, Evan Rachel Wood
713.Outline: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

714.Name: The Village
714.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Sigourney Weaver, William Hurt, Joaquin Phoenix
714.Outline: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

715.Name: Self/less
715.Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Ryan Reynolds, Natalie Martinez, Matthew Goode
715.Outline: A dying real estate mogul transfers his consciousness into a healthy young body, but soon finds that neither the procedure nor the company that performed it are quite what they seem.

716.Name: Night Watch
716.Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Konstantin Khabenskiy, Vladimir Menshov, Mariya Poroshina
716.Outline: A fantasy-thriller set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.

717.Name: The Awakening
717.Credit: Dir: Nick Murphy With: Rebecca Hall, Dominic West, Imelda Staunton
717.Outline: In 1921, England is overwhelmed by the loss and grief of World War I. Hoax exposer Florence Cathcart visits a boarding school to explain sightings of a child ghost. Everything she believes unravels as the 'missing' begin to show themselves.

718.Name: U.S. Marshals
718.Credit: Dir: Stuart Baird With: Tommy Lee Jones, Wesley Snipes, Robert Downey Jr.
718.Outline: US Marshal Samuel Gerard (Jones) and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan (Snipes), who has been accused of a double-murder.

719.Name: The Skeleton Key
719.Credit: Dir: Iain Softley With: Kate Hudson, Peter Sarsgaard, Joy Bryant
719.Outline: A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.

720.Name: Faster
720.Credit: Dir: George Tillman Jr. With: Dwayne Johnson, Billy Bob Thornton, Maggie Grace
720.Outline: An ex-con sets out to avenge his brother's death after they were double-crossed during a heist years ago. During his campaign, however, he's tracked by a veteran cop and an egocentric hit man.

721.Name: Funny Games
721.Credit: Dir: Michael Haneke With: Naomi Watts, Tim Roth, Michael Pitt
721.Outline: Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.

722.Name: The Expendables
722.Credit: Dir: Sylvester Stallone With: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, Jet Li
722.Outline: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

723.Name: From Paris with Love
723.Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: John Travolta, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Kasia Smutniak
723.Outline: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.

724.Name: Sleuth
724.Credit: Dir: Kenneth Branagh With: Michael Caine, Jude Law, Harold Pinter
724.Outline: On his sprawling country estate, an aging writer matches wits with the struggling actor who has stolen his wife's heart.

725.Name: Godzilla
725.Credit: Dir: Gareth Edwards With: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Elizabeth Olsen, Bryan Cranston
725.Outline: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

726.Name: Revolver
726.Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Jason Statham, Ray Liotta, Vincent Pastore
726.Outline: Gambler Jake Green enters into a game with potentially deadly consequences.

727.Name: 8MM
727.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Nicolas Cage, Joaquin Phoenix, James Gandolfini
727.Outline: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

728.Name: The Informant!
728.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: Matt Damon, Tony Hale, Patton Oswalt
728.Outline: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.

729.Name: Gone in Sixty Seconds
729.Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: Nicolas Cage, Angelina Jolie, Giovanni Ribisi
729.Outline: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal 50 cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

730.Name: A Perfect Murder
730.Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Michael Douglas, Gwyneth Paltrow, Viggo Mortensen
730.Outline: A remake of the Alfred Hitchcock classic Dial M for Murder .

731.Name: Snitch
731.Credit: Dir: Ric Roman Waugh With: Dwayne Johnson, Susan Sarandon, Jon Bernthal
731.Outline: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son who was imprisoned after being set up in drug deal.

732.Name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
732.Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody
732.Outline: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

733.Name: War of the Worlds
733.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Cruise, Dakota Fanning, Tim Robbins
733.Outline: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

734.Name: The International
734.Credit: Dir: Tom Tykwer With: Clive Owen, Naomi Watts, Armin Mueller-Stahl
734.Outline: An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

735.Name: Killer Elite
735.Credit: Dir: Gary McKendry With: Jason Statham, Clive Owen, Robert De Niro
735.Outline: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.

736.Name: Changing Lanes
736.Credit: Dir: Roger Michell With: Ben Affleck, Samuel L. Jackson, Kim Staunton
736.Outline: The story of what happens one day in New York when a young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident on F.D.R. Drive and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.

737.Name: Europa Report
737.Credit: Dir: SebastiÃ¡n Cordero With: Sharlto Copley, Michael Nyqvist, Christian Camargo
737.Outline: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

738.Name: Red Eye
738.Credit: Dir: Wes Craven With: Rachel McAdams, Cillian Murphy, Brian Cox
738.Outline: A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in offing a politician.

739.Name: The Purge: Anarchy
739.Credit: Dir: James DeMonaco With: Frank Grillo, Carmen Ejogo, Zach Gilford
739.Outline: Three groups of people are trying to survive Purge Night, when their stories intertwine and are left stranded in The Purge trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs.

740.Name: The Mothman Prophecies
740.Credit: Dir: Mark Pellington With: Richard Gere, Laura Linney, David Eigenberg
740.Outline: A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.

741.Name: Daybreakers
741.Credit: Dir: Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig With: Ethan Hawke, Willem Dafoe, Sam Neill
741.Outline: In the year 2019, a plague has transformed almost every human into vampires. Faced with a dwindling blood supply, the fractured dominant race plots their survival; meanwhile, a researcher works with a covert band of vamps on a way to save humankind.

742.Name: Tomorrow Never Dies
742.Credit: Dir: Roger Spottiswoode With: Pierce Brosnan, Jonathan Pryce, Michelle Yeoh
742.Outline: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

743.Name: Contraband
743.Credit: Dir: Baltasar KormÃ¡kur With: Mark Wahlberg, Giovanni Ribisi, Kate Beckinsale
743.Outline: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

744.Name: The Punisher
744.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Hensleigh With: Thomas Jane, John Travolta, Samantha Mathis
744.Outline: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

745.Name: A Dangerous Method
745.Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Michael Fassbender, Keira Knightley, Viggo Mortensen
745.Outline: A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.

746.Name: Dinosaur
746.Credit: Dir: Eric Leighton, Ralph Zondag With: D.B. Sweeney, Julianna Margulies, Samuel E. Wright
746.Outline: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sancturary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

747.Name: Child 44
747.Credit: Dir: Daniel Espinosa With: Tom Hardy, Gary Oldman, Noomi Rapace
747.Outline: A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union.

748.Name: Road House
748.Credit: Dir: Rowdy Herrington With: Patrick Swayze, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott
748.Outline: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

749.Name: The Woman in Black
749.Credit: Dir: James Watkins With: Daniel Radcliffe, Janet McTeer, CiarÃ¡n Hinds
749.Outline: A young lawyer travels to a remote village where he discovers the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorizing the locals.

750.Name: The Experiment
750.Credit: Dir: Paul Scheuring With: Adrien Brody, Cam Gigandet, Forest Whitaker
750.Outline: 26 men are chosen to participate in the roles of guards and prisoners in a psychological study that ultimately spirals out of control.

751.Name: Star Trek: Nemesis
751.Credit: Dir: Stuart Baird With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
751.Outline: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty.

752.Name: Under Siege
752.Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Steven Seagal, Gary Busey, Tommy Lee Jones
752.Outline: A former S.E.A.L., now cook, is the only person who can stop a gang of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. Navy battleship.

753.Name: Ocean's Twelve
753.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts
753.Outline: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's 11.

754.Name: Salt
754.Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber, Chiwetel Ejiofor
754.Outline: A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.

755.Name: Air Force One
755.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman, Glenn Close
755.Outline: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

756.Name: New Nightmare
756.Credit: Dir: Wes Craven With: Heather Langenkamp, Robert Englund, Jeff Davis
756.Outline: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

757.Name: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
757.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Denzel Washington, John Travolta, Luis GuzmÃ¡n
757.Outline: Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.

758.Name: Beverly Hills Cop II
758.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, JÃ¼rgen Prochnow
758.Outline: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogamil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

759.Name: The Interpreter
759.Credit: Dir: Sydney Pollack With: Nicole Kidman, Sean Penn, Catherine Keener
759.Outline: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot.

760.Name: The Collector
760.Credit: Dir: Marcus Dunstan With: Josh Stewart, Andrea Roth, Juan FernÃ¡ndez
760.Outline: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.

761.Name: The Nines
761.Credit: Dir: John August With: Ryan Reynolds, Hope Davis, Melissa McCarthy
761.Outline: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

762.Name: Riddick
762.Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Vin Diesel, Karl Urban, Katee Sackhoff
762.Outline: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

763.Name: Rambo: First Blood Part II
763.Credit: Dir: George P. Cosmatos With: Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Charles Napier
763.Outline: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

764.Name: Behind Enemy Lines
764.Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht
764.Outline: A Navy navigator is shot down over enemy territory and is ruthlessly pursued by a secret police enforcer and the opposing troops. Meanwhile his commanding officer goes against orders in an attempt to rescue him.

765.Name: Space Cowboys
765.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Tommy Lee Jones, Donald Sutherland
765.Outline: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

766.Name: Predators
766.Credit: Dir: NimrÃ³d Antal With: Adrien Brody, Laurence Fishburne, Topher Grace
766.Outline: A group of elite warriors are hunted by members of a merciless alien race known as Predators.

767.Name: The Day After Tomorrow
767.Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Dennis Quaid, Jake Gyllenhaal, Emmy Rossum
767.Outline: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek across America to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

768.Name: The Company You Keep
768.Credit: Dir: Robert Redford With: Robert Redford, Brit Marling, Stanley Tucci
768.Outline: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.

769.Name: Mindhunters
769.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Val Kilmer, LL Cool J, Christian Slater
769.Outline: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.

770.Name: Blood Work
770.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Jeff Daniels, Anjelica Huston
770.Outline: Still recovering from a heart transplant, a retired FBI profiler returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

771.Name: The Sum of All Fears
771.Credit: Dir: Phil Alden Robinson With: Ben Affleck, Morgan Freeman, Ian Mongrain
771.Outline: CIA analyst Jack Ryan must thwart the plans of a terrorist faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's newly elected president by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore.

772.Name: The Raven
772.Credit: Dir: James McTeigue With: John Cusack, Alice Eve, Luke Evans
772.Outline: When a madman begins committing horrific murders inspired by Edgar Allan Poe 's works, a young Baltimore detective joins forces with Poe to stop him from making his stories a reality.

773.Name: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
773.Credit: Dir: Wes Ball With: Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario, Thomas Brodie-Sangster
773.Outline: After having escaped the Maze, the Gladers now face a new set of challenges on the open roads of a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles.

774.Name: The Quick and the Dead
774.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman, Russell Crowe
774.Outline: Lady avenger returns to western town owned by a ruthless gunslinger hosting an elimination tournament.

775.Name: Star Trek: Insurrection
775.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Frakes With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
775.Outline: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

776.Name: Darkman
776.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Liam Neeson, Frances McDormand, Colin Friels
776.Outline: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

777.Name: The Number 23
777.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Jim Carrey, Virginia Madsen, Logan Lerman
777.Outline: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him. As his obsession increases, more and more similarities seem to arise.

778.Name: Death to Smoochy
778.Credit: Dir: Danny DeVito With: Robin Williams, Edward Norton, Catherine Keener
778.Outline: Kids show host Rainbow Randolph is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, aka Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the kid's TV business isn't all child's play.

779.Name: Death Race
779.Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Jason Statham, Joan Allen, Tyrese Gibson
779.Outline: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

780.Name: The Last Stand
780.Credit: Dir: Jee-woon Kim With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Forest Whitaker, Johnny Knoxville
780.Outline: The leader of a drug cartel busts out of a courthouse and speeds to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his path is a sheriff and his inexperienced staff.

781.Name: Last Man Standing
781.Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Bruce Willis, Bruce Dern, William Sanderson
781.Outline: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

782.Name: The Frozen Ground
782.Credit: Dir: Scott Walker With: Nicolas Cage, Vanessa Hudgens, John Cusack
782.Outline: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

783.Name: Colombiana
783.Credit: Dir: Olivier Megaton With: Zoe Saldana, Michael Vartan, Callum Blue
783.Outline: A young woman, after witnessing her parents' murder as a child in Bogota, grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

784.Name: Feast
784.Credit: Dir: John Gulager With: Navi Rawat, Krista Allen, Balthazar Getty
784.Outline: Patrons locked inside of a bar are forced to fight monsters.

785.Name: Executive Decision
785.Credit: Dir: Stuart Baird With: Kurt Russell, Halle Berry, Steven Seagal
785.Outline: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

786.Name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
786.Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Johnny Depp
786.Outline: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

787.Name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
787.Credit: Dir: Robert Wise With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
787.Outline: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

788.Name: The World Is Not Enough
788.Credit: Dir: Michael Apted With: Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle
788.Outline: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

789.Name: White House Down
789.Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal
789.Outline: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

790.Name: Centurion
790.Genre: Action | Adventure | Drama | History | Thriller | War
790.Credit: Dir: Neil Marshall With: Michael Fassbender, Dominic West, Olga Kurylenko
790.Outline: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is decimated in a devastating guerrilla attack.

791.Name: The Perfect Storm
791.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane
791.Outline: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

792.Name: Lucy
792.Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Scarlett Johansson, Morgan Freeman, Min-sik Choi
792.Outline: A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.

793.Name: Project Almanac
793.Credit: Dir: Dean Israelite With: Amy Landecker, Sofia Black-D'Elia, Virginia Gardner
793.Outline: A group of teens discover secret plans of a time machine, and construct one. However, things start to get out of control.

794.Name: Cliffhanger
794.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Sylvester Stallone, John Lithgow, Michael Rooker
794.Outline: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

795.Name: Ninja Assassin
795.Credit: Dir: James McTeigue With: Rick Yune, Naomie Harris, Rain
795.Outline: A young ninja turns his back on the orphanage that raised him, leading to a confrontation with a fellow ninja from the clan.

796.Name: The Uninvited
796.Credit: Dir: Charles Guard, Thomas Guard With: Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel, Elizabeth Banks
796.Outline: Anna Ivers returns home to her sister Alex after a stint in a mental hospital, though her recovery is jeopardized thanks to her cruel stepmother. Her dismay quickly turns to horror when she is visited by ghastly visions of her dead mother.

797.Name: The Losers
797.Credit: Dir: Sylvain White With: Idris Elba, Zoe Saldana, Jeffrey Dean Morgan
797.Outline: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

798.Name: Double Jeopardy
798.Credit: Dir: Bruce Beresford With: Ashley Judd, Tommy Lee Jones, Bruce Greenwood
798.Outline: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

799.Name: Rules of Engagement
799.Credit: Dir: William Friedkin With: Tommy Lee Jones, Samuel L. Jackson, Guy Pearce
799.Outline: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a third world country.

800.Name: The Good Son
800.Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Macaulay Culkin, Elijah Wood, Wendy Crewson
800.Outline: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle, and befriends his cousin who's the same age. But his cousin begins showing increasing signs of violent behavior.

801.Name: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
801.Credit: Dir: Troy Duffy With: Sean Patrick Flanery, Norman Reedus, Billy Connolly
801.Outline: The MacManus brothers are living a quiet life in Ireland with their father, but when they learn that their beloved priest has been killed by mob forces, they go back to Boston to bring justice to those responsible and avenge the priest.

802.Name: The Family
802.Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Robert De Niro, Michelle Pfeiffer, Dianna Agron
802.Outline: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging as their old habits die hard.

803.Name: Arachnophobia
803.Credit: Dir: Frank Marshall With: Jeff Daniels, Julian Sands, John Goodman
803.Outline: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

804.Name: A View to a Kill
804.Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Christopher Walken, Tanya Roberts
804.Outline: An investigation of a horse-racing scam leads 007 to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

805.Name: Repo Men
805.Credit: Dir: Miguel Sapochnik With: Jude Law, Forest Whitaker, Alice Braga
805.Outline: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased. He must therefore go on the run before said ticker is repossessed.

806.Name: The Jackal
806.Credit: Dir: Michael Caton-Jones With: Bruce Willis, Richard Gere, Sidney Poitier
806.Outline: An imprisoned IRA sniper is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

807.Name: The Mummy Returns
807.Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah
807.Outline: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

808.Name: Date Night
808.Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Steve Carell, Tina Fey, Mark Wahlberg
808.Outline: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

809.Name: Formula 51
809.Credit: Dir: Ronny Yu With: Samuel L. Jackson, Robert Carlyle, Emily Mortimer
809.Outline: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.

810.Name: The Siege
810.Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Denzel Washington, Bruce Willis, Annette Bening
810.Outline: The secret US abduction of a suspected terrorist leads to a wave of terrorist attacks in New York that lead to the declaration of martial law.

811.Name: The Voices
811.Credit: Dir: Marjane Satrapi With: Ryan Reynolds, Gemma Arterton, Anna Kendrick
811.Outline: A likable guy pursues his office crush with the help of his evil talking pets, but things turn sinister when she stands him up for a date.

812.Name: Chloe
812.Credit: Dir: Atom Egoyan With: Julianne Moore, Amanda Seyfried, Liam Neeson
812.Outline: A doctor hires an escort to seduce her husband, whom she suspects of cheating, though unforeseen events put the family in danger.

813.Name: Lock Up
813.Credit: Dir: John Flynn With: Sylvester Stallone, Donald Sutherland, John Amos
813.Outline: With only 6 months left of his prison sentence inmate Frank Leone is transferred from minimum security to maximum security by a vindictive warden.

814.Name: High Crimes
814.Credit: Dir: Carl Franklin With: Jim Caviezel, Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd
814.Outline: High powered lawyer Claire Kubik finds her world turned upside down when her husband, who she thought was Tom Kubik...

815.Name: Hitman
815.Credit: Dir: Xavier Gens With: Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott, Olga Kurylenko
815.Outline: A gun-for-hire known only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as 'The Organization' is ensnared in a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Russia and Eastern Europe.

816.Name: Nick of Time
816.Credit: Dir: John Badham With: Johnny Depp, Christopher Walken, Courtney Chase
816.Outline: An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

817.Name: Along Came a Spider
817.Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Morgan Freeman, Michael Wincott, Monica Potter
817.Outline: A congressman's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school by an insider who calls Det. Alex Cross, sucking him into the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.

818.Name: The Dead Pool
818.Credit: Dir: Buddy Van Horn With: Clint Eastwood, Liam Neeson, Patricia Clarkson
818.Outline: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

819.Name: The River Wild
819.Credit: Dir: Curtis Hanson With: Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn
819.Outline: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

820.Name: All Good Things
820.Credit: Dir: Andrew Jarecki With: Ryan Gosling, Kirsten Dunst, Frank Langella
820.Outline: Mr. David Marks was suspected but never tried for killing his wife Katie who disappeared in 1982, but the truth is eventually revealed.

821.Name: Dark Skies
821.Credit: Dir: Scott Stewart With: Keri Russell, Jake Brennan, Josh Hamilton
821.Outline: As the Barret family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them.

822.Name: Tango & Cash
822.Credit: Dir: Andrey Konchalovskiy With: Sylvester Stallone, Kurt Russell, Teri Hatcher
822.Outline: Two cops are framed and must clear their names.

823.Name: Transporter 2
823.Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier With: Jason Statham, Amber Valletta, Kate Nauta
823.Outline: Mercenary Frank Martin, who specializes moving goods of all kinds, surfaces again this time in Miami, Florida when he's implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

824.Name: Insurgent
824.Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Theo James
824.Outline: Beatrice Prior must confront her inner demons and continue her fight against a powerful alliance which threatens to tear her society apart with the help from others on her side.

825.Name: The Cell
825.Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Jennifer Lopez, Vince Vaughn, Vincent D'Onofrio
825.Outline: An FBI agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

826.Name: The American
826.Credit: Dir: Anton Corbijn With: George Clooney, Paolo Bonacelli, Violante Placido
826.Outline: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

827.Name: Very Bad Things
827.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Christian Slater, Daniel Stern, Cameron Diaz
827.Outline: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

828.Name: Before I Go to Sleep
828.Credit: Dir: Rowan Joffe With: Nicole Kidman, Colin Firth, Mark Strong
828.Outline: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

829.Name: Resident Evil: Extinction
829.Credit: Dir: Russell Mulcahy With: Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Oded Fehr
829.Outline: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

830.Name: The Human Stain
830.Credit: Dir: Robert Benton With: Anthony Hopkins, Nicole Kidman, Ed Harris
830.Outline: When a disgraced former college dean has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark, twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking fact about his own life that he has kept secret for 50 years.

831.Name: Transcendence
831.Credit: Dir: Wally Pfister With: Johnny Depp, Rebecca Hall, Morgan Freeman
831.Outline: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence, takes on dangerous implications when his consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

832.Name: Dorian Gray
832.Credit: Dir: Oliver Parker With: Ben Barnes, Colin Firth, Rebecca Hall
832.Outline: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

833.Name: Femme Fatale
833.Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Rebecca Romijn, Antonio Banderas, Peter Coyote
833.Outline: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

834.Name: Assault on Precinct 13
834.Credit: Dir: Jean-FranÃ§ois Richet With: Ethan Hawke, Laurence Fishburne, Gabriel Byrne
834.Outline: A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together to protect themselves on New Year's Eve, just as corrupt policeman surround the station with the intent of killing all to keep their deception in the ranks.

835.Name: Total Recall
835.Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Colin Farrell, Bokeem Woodbine, Bryan Cranston
835.Outline: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

836.Name: Assassins
836.Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Banderas, Julianne Moore
836.Outline: Professional hit-man Robert Rath wants to fulfill a few more contracts before retiring but unscrupulous ambitious newcomer hit-man Miguel Bain keeps killing Rath's targets.

837.Name: True Story
837.Credit: Dir: Rupert Goold With: James Franco, Jonah Hill, Felicity Jones
837.Outline: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo - who has taken on Finkel's identity - his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

838.Name: The Loft
838.Credit: Dir: Erik Van Looy With: Karl Urban, James Marsden, Wentworth Miller
838.Outline: Five married guys conspire to secretly share a penthouse loft in the city--a place where they can carry out hidden affairs and indulge in their deepest fantasies. But the fantasy becomes a nightmare when they discover the dead body of an unknown woman in the loft, and they realize one of the group must be involved.

839.Name: Don't Say a Word
839.Credit: Dir: Gary Fleder With: Michael Douglas, Sean Bean, Brittany Murphy
839.Outline: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

840.Name: Deadfall
840.Credit: Dir: Stefan Ruzowitzky With: Eric Bana, Olivia Wilde, Charlie Hunnam
840.Outline: A thriller that follows two siblings who decide to fend for themselves in the wake of a botched casino heist, and their unlikely reunion during another family's Thanksgiving celebration.

841.Name: Twister
841.Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes
841.Outline: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

842.Name: The November Man
842.Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Pierce Brosnan, Luke Bracey, Olga Kurylenko
842.Outline: An ex-CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.

843.Name: The Invisible
843.Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Justin Chatwin, Margarita Levieva, Marcia Gay Harden
843.Outline: A teenager is left invisible to the living after an attack.

844.Name: Blue Streak
844.Credit: Dir: Les Mayfield With: Martin Lawrence, Luke Wilson, Peter Greene
844.Outline: A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.

845.Name: Under the Skin
845.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Glazer With: Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy McWilliams, Lynsey Taylor Mackay
845.Outline: A mysterious woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. Events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.

846.Name: Surrogates
846.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Mostow With: Bruce Willis, Radha Mitchell, Ving Rhames
846.Outline: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.

847.Name: Paycheck
847.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Ben Affleck, Aaron Eckhart, Uma Thurman
847.Outline: What seemed like a breezy idea for an engineer to net him millions of dollars, leaves him on the run for his life and piecing together why he's being chased.

848.Name: Devil
848.Credit: Dir: John Erick Dowdle With: Chris Messina, Caroline Dhavernas, Bokeem Woodbine
848.Outline: A group of people are trapped in an elevator and the Devil is mysteriously amongst them.

849.Name: Moonraker
849.Credit: Dir: Lewis Gilbert With: Roger Moore, Lois Chiles, Michael Lonsdale
849.Outline: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

850.Name: The General's Daughter
850.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: John Travolta, Madeleine Stowe, James Cromwell
850.Outline: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

851.Name: Taken 2
851.Credit: Dir: Olivier Megaton With: Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen, Maggie Grace
851.Outline: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

852.Name: War
852.Credit: Dir: Philip G. Atwell With: Jet Li, Jason Statham, Nadine Velazquez
852.Outline: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.

853.Name: The Thing
853.Credit: Dir: Matthijs van Heijningen Jr. With: Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Joel Edgerton, Ulrich Thomsen
853.Outline: At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.

854.Name: Red Lights
854.Credit: Dir: Rodrigo CortÃ©s With: Sigourney Weaver, Robert De Niro, Cillian Murphy
854.Outline: Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.

855.Name: Entrapment
855.Credit: Dir: Jon Amiel With: Sean Connery, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Ving Rhames
855.Outline: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

856.Name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
856.Credit: Dir: George Miller, George Ogilvie With: Mel Gibson, Tina Turner, Bruce Spence
856.Outline: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

857.Name: Proof of Life
857.Credit: Dir: Taylor Hackford With: Meg Ryan, Russell Crowe, David Morse
857.Outline: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

858.Name: Parker
858.Credit: Dir: Taylor Hackford With: Jason Statham, Jennifer Lopez, Michael Chiklis
858.Outline: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.

859.Name: Two for the Money
859.Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Matthew McConaughey, Al Pacino, Rene Russo
859.Outline: After suffering a career-ending injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

860.Name: The Craft
860.Credit: Dir: Andrew Fleming With: Robin Tunney, Fairuza Balk, Neve Campbell
860.Outline: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who even slightly anger them.

861.Name: Takers
861.Credit: Dir: John Luessenhop With: Chris Brown, Hayden Christensen, Matt Dillon
861.Outline: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.

862.Name: Flightplan
862.Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean
862.Outline: A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet, the child vanishes, and nobody will admit she was ever on the plane.

863.Name: Vacancy
863.Credit: Dir: NimrÃ³d Antal With: Kate Beckinsale, Luke Wilson, Frank Whaley
863.Outline: A young married couple becomes stranded at an isolated motel and finds hidden video cameras in their room. They realize that unless they escape, they'll be the next victims of a snuff film

864.Name: Rising Sun
864.Credit: Dir: Philip Kaufman With: Sean Connery, Wesley Snipes, Harvey Keitel
864.Outline: At the offices of a Japanese corporation, during a party, a woman, who's evidently a professional mistress...

865.Name: Next
865.Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Nicolas Cage, Julianne Moore, Jessica Biel
865.Outline: A Las Vegas magician who can see into the future is pursued by FBI agents seeking to use his abilities to prevent a nuclear terrorist attack.

866.Name: RoboCop
866.Credit: Dir: JosÃ© Padilha With: Joel Kinnaman, Gary Oldman, Michael Keaton
866.Outline: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy - a loving husband, father and good cop - is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

867.Name: The Visit
867.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Olivia DeJonge, Ed Oxenbould, Deanna Dunagan
867.Outline: Two siblings become increasingly frightened by their grandparents' disturbing behavior while visiting them on vacation.

868.Name: Deliver Us from Evil
868.Credit: Dir: Scott Derrickson With: Eric Bana, Edgar Ramirez, Olivia Munn
868.Outline: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.

869.Name: Untraceable
869.Credit: Dir: Gregory Hoblit With: Diane Lane, Colin Hanks, Joseph Cross
869.Outline: FBI agent Jennifer Marsh is tasked with hunting down a seemingly untraceable serial killer who posts live videos of his victims on the Internet. As time runs out, the cat and mouse chase becomes more personal.

870.Name: The Hole
870.Credit: Dir: Nick Hamm With: Thora Birch, Desmond Harrington, Daniel Brocklebank
870.Outline: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.

871.Name: Red State
871.Credit: Dir: Kevin Smith With: Michael Parks, Melissa Leo, John Goodman
871.Outline: Set in Middle America, a group of teens receive an online invitation for sex, though they soon encounter fundamentalists with a much more sinister agenda.

872.Name: Killing Them Softly
872.Credit: Dir: Andrew Dominik With: Brad Pitt, Ray Liotta, Richard Jenkins
872.Outline: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

873.Name: Throw Momma from the Train
873.Credit: Dir: Danny DeVito With: Danny DeVito, Billy Crystal, Kim Greist
873.Outline: A bitter ex-husband. A put upon momma's boy. Both want their respective spouse and mother dead, but who will pull it off?

874.Name: Lions for Lambs
874.Credit: Dir: Robert Redford With: Tom Cruise, Meryl Streep, Robert Redford
874.Outline: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

875.Name: Rush Hour 3
875.Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Jackie Chan, Chris Tucker, Max von Sydow
875.Outline: After an attempted assassination on Ambassador Han, Lee and Carter head to Paris to protect a French woman with knowledge of the Triads' secret leaders.

876.Name: Frozen
876.Credit: Dir: Adam Green With: Shawn Ashmore, Emma Bell, Kevin Zegers
876.Outline: Three skiers stranded on a chairlift are forced to make life-or-death choices which prove more perilous than staying put and freezing to death.

877.Name: 3 Days to Kill
877.Credit: Dir: McG With: Kevin Costner, Hailee Steinfeld, Connie Nielsen
877.Outline: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

878.Name: Hackers
878.Credit: Dir: Iain Softley With: Jonny Lee Miller, Angelina Jolie, Jesse Bradford
878.Outline: A young boy is arrested by the U.S. Secret Service for writing a computer virus and is banned from using a computer until his 18th birthday...

879.Name: Crank: High Voltage
879.Credit: Dir: Mark Neveldine, Brian Taylor With: Jason Statham, Amy Smart, Clifton Collins Jr.
879.Outline: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker that requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

880.Name: Taking Lives
880.Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Angelina Jolie, Ethan Hawke, Kiefer Sutherland
880.Outline: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

881.Name: Case 39
881.Credit: Dir: Christian Alvart With: RenÃ©e Zellweger, Ian McShane, Jodelle Ferland
881.Outline: A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.

882.Name: Fear
882.Credit: Dir: James Foley With: Mark Wahlberg, Reese Witherspoon, William Petersen
882.Outline: When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.

883.Name: Never Say Never Again
883.Credit: Dir: Irvin Kershner With: Sean Connery, Kim Basinger, Klaus Maria Brandauer
883.Outline: A SPECTRE agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

884.Name: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
884.Credit: Dir: Kenneth Branagh With: Chris Pine, Kevin Costner, Keira Knightley
884.Outline: Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.

885.Name: Reign of Fire
885.Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: Matthew McConaughey, Christian Bale, Izabella Scorupco
885.Outline: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

886.Name: Knowing
886.Credit: Dir: Alex Proyas With: Nicolas Cage, Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne
886.Outline: M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.

887.Name: The Strangers
887.Credit: Dir: Bryan Bertino With: Scott Speedman, Liv Tyler, Gemma Ward
887.Outline: A young couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by three unknown assailants.

888.Name: Hannibal Rising
888.Credit: Dir: Peter Webber With: Gaspard Ulliel, Rhys Ifans, Li Gong
888.Outline: After the death of his parents during World War II, young Hannibal Lecter moves in with his beautiful aunt and begins plotting revenge on the barbarians responsible for his sister's death.

889.Name: The Ladykillers
889.Credit: Dir: Ethan Coen, Joel Coen With: Tom Hanks, Marlon Wayans, Irma P. Hall
889.Outline: An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a classical ensemble in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting but sharp old landlady.

890.Name: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
890.Credit: Dir: Alexander Witt With: Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Eric Mabius
890.Outline: Alice awakes in Raccoon City, only to find it has become infested with zombies and monsters. With the help of Jill Valentine and Carlos Olivera, Alice must find a way out of the city before it is destroyed by a nuclear missile.

891.Name: Duplicity
891.Credit: Dir: Tony Gilroy With: Julia Roberts, Clive Owen, Tom Wilkinson
891.Outline: Two ex-government agents turned rival industrial spies have to be at the top of their game when one of their companies prepares to launch a major product. However, they distract each other in more ways than one.

892.Name: Blitz
892.Credit: Dir: Elliott Lester With: Jason Statham, Paddy Considine, Aidan Gillen
892.Outline: A tough cop is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.

893.Name: Idle Hands
893.Credit: Dir: Rodman Flender With: Devon Sawa, Seth Green, Elden Henson
893.Outline: Lazy Anton's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

894.Name: Wolf
894.Credit: Dir: Mike Nichols With: Jack Nicholson, Michelle Pfeiffer, James Spader
894.Outline: Publisher Will Randall becomes a werewolf and has to fight to keep his job.

895.Name: The Final Cut
895.Credit: Dir: Omar Naim With: Robin Williams, Jim Caviezel, Mira Sorvino
895.Outline: Set in a world with memory implants, Robin Williams plays a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.

896.Name: Seeking Justice
896.Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Nicolas Cage, January Jones, Guy Pearce
896.Outline: After his wife is assaulted, a husband enlists the services of a vigilante group to help him settle the score. Then he discovers they want a 'favor' from him in return.

897.Name: The Saint
