897.Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue, Rade Serbedzija
897.Outline: Simon Templar has no real family, no real home and Simon Templar isn't even his real name. Yet Simon Templar...

898.Name: Broken City
898.Credit: Dir: Allen Hughes With: Mark Wahlberg, Russell Crowe, Catherine Zeta-Jones
898.Outline: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed and then framed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.

899.Name: The Fifth Estate
899.Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: Benedict Cumberbatch, Daniel BrÃ¼hl, Carice van Houten
899.Outline: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

900.Name: Man of the Year
900.Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Robin Williams, Laura Linney, Lewis Black
900.Outline: A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.

901.Name: Coriolanus
901.Credit: Dir: Ralph Fiennes With: Ralph Fiennes, Gerard Butler, Brian Cox
901.Outline: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.

902.Name: Lakeview Terrace
902.Credit: Dir: Neil LaBute With: Samuel L. Jackson, Patrick Wilson, Kerry Washington
902.Outline: A LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out the interracial couple who just moved in next door.

903.Name: Push
903.Credit: Dir: Paul McGuigan With: Camilla Belle, Dakota Fanning, Chris Evans
903.Outline: Two young Americans with special abilities must race to find a girl in Hong Kong before a shadowy government organization called Division does.

904.Name: The Killer Inside Me
904.Credit: Dir: Michael Winterbottom With: Casey Affleck, Kate Hudson, Jessica Alba
904.Outline: A West Texas deputy sheriff is slowly unmasked as a psychotic killer.

905.Name: Cleaner
905.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Samuel L. Jackson, Ed Harris, Eva Mendes
905.Outline: A former cop who now earns a wage as a crime scene cleaner unknowingly participates in a cover-up at his latest job.

906.Name: As Above, So Below
906.Credit: Dir: John Erick Dowdle With: Perdita Weeks, Ben Feldman, Edwin Hodge
906.Outline: When a team of explorers ventures into the catacombs that lie beneath the streets of Paris, they uncover the dark secret that lies within this city of the dead.

907.Name: 6 Souls
907.Credit: Dir: MÃ¥ns MÃ¥rlind, BjÃ¶rn Stein With: Julianne Moore, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Jeffrey DeMunn
907.Outline: A female forensic psychiatrist discovers that all of one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished.

908.Name: The Expendables 3
908.Credit: Dir: Patrick Hughes With: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, Jet Li
908.Outline: Barney augments his team with new blood for a personal battle: to take down Conrad Stonebanks, the Expendables co-founder and notorious arms trader who is hell bent on wiping out Barney and every single one of his associates.

909.Name: Insidious: Chapter 3
909.Credit: Dir: Leigh Whannell With: Dermot Mulroney, Stefanie Scott, Angus Sampson
909.Outline: A prequel set before the haunting of the Lambert family that reveals how gifted psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who has been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.

910.Name: Deep Impact
910.Credit: Dir: Mimi Leder With: Robert Duvall, TÃ©a Leoni, Elijah Wood
910.Outline: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

911.Name: The Collection
911.Credit: Dir: Marcus Dunstan With: Josh Stewart, Emma Fitzpatrick, Christopher McDonald
911.Outline: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is blackmailed to rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped warehouse.

912.Name: Splinter
912.Credit: Dir: Toby Wilkins With: Shea Whigham, Jill Wagner, Paulo Costanzo
912.Outline: Trapped in an isolated gas station by a voracious Splinter parasite that transforms its still living victims into deadly hosts, a young couple and an escaped convict must find a way to work together to survive this primal terror.

913.Name: Maniac
913.Credit: Dir: Franck Khalfoun With: Elijah Wood, Nora Arnezeder, America Olivo
913.Outline: As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.

914.Name: Antitrust
914.Credit: Dir: Peter Howitt With: Ryan Phillippe, Tim Robbins, Rachael Leigh Cook
914.Outline: A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.

915.Name: Sleeping with the Enemy
915.Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Julia Roberts, Patrick Bergin, Kevin Anderson
915.Outline: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

916.Name: A Man Apart
916.Credit: Dir: F. Gary Gray With: Vin Diesel, Timothy Olyphant, Larenz Tate
916.Outline: A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.

917.Name: Murder by Numbers
917.Credit: Dir: Barbet Schroeder With: Sandra Bullock, Ben Chaplin, Ryan Gosling
917.Outline: Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.

918.Name: I Am Number Four
918.Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Alex Pettyfer, Timothy Olyphant, Dianna Agron
918.Outline: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

919.Credit: Dir: GÃ©la Babluani With: Sam Riley, Alice Barrett, Gaby Hoffmann
919.Outline: A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.

920.Name: The Bodyguard
920.Credit: Dir: Mick Jackson With: Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp
920.Outline: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to a pop singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

921.Name: Welcome to the Punch
921.Credit: Dir: Eran Creevy With: James McAvoy, Mark Strong, Andrea Riseborough
921.Outline: When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.

922.Name: Die Another Day
922.Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Pierce Brosnan, Halle Berry, Rosamund Pike
922.Outline: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

923.Name: San Andreas
923.Credit: Dir: Brad Peyton With: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, Alexandra Daddario
923.Outline: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

924.Name: Lockout
924.Credit: Dir: James Mather, Stephen St. Leger With: Guy Pearce, Maggie Grace, Peter Stormare
924.Outline: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the president's daughter from an outer space prison taken over by violent inmates.

925.Name: Hobo with a Shotgun
925.Credit: Dir: Jason Eisener With: Rutger Hauer, Pasha Ebrahimi, Robb Wells
925.Outline: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

926.Name: Waterworld
926.Credit: Dir: Kevin Reynolds With: Kevin Costner, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Dennis Hopper
926.Outline: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

927.Name: The Signal
927.Credit: Dir: William Eubank With: Brenton Thwaites, Olivia Cooke, Beau Knapp
927.Outline: On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness - only to find himself in a waking nightmare.

928.Name: The Sentinel
928.Credit: Dir: Clark Johnson With: Michael Douglas, Kiefer Sutherland, Kim Basinger
928.Outline: A Secret Service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the President. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a Secret Service Protective Intelligence Division agent.

929.Name: Vampires
929.Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: James Woods, Daniel Baldwin, Sheryl Lee
929.Outline: A vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to endure sunlight.

930.Name: The Devil's Own
930.Credit: Dir: Alan J. Pakula With: Harrison Ford, Brad Pitt, Margaret Colin
930.Outline: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

931.Name: The Tournament
931.Credit: Dir: Scott Mann With: Ving Rhames, Robert Carlyle, Kelly Hu
931.Outline: Every seven years in an unsuspecting town, The Tournament takes place. A battle royale between 30 of the world's deadliest assassins...

932.Name: Flight of the Phoenix
932.Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Dennis Quaid, Miranda Otto, Giovanni Ribisi
932.Outline: Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.

933.Name: 15 Minutes
933.Credit: Dir: John Herzfeld With: Robert De Niro, Edward Burns, Kelsey Grammer
933.Outline: A homicide detective and a fire marshall must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.

934.Name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
934.Credit: Dir: Kerry Conran With: Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law, Angelina Jolie
934.Outline: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

935.Name: Hard Target
935.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Lance Henriksen, Yancy Butler
935.Outline: A woman hires a drifter as her guide through New Orleans in search of her father, who has gone missing. They discover a deadly game of cat and mouse behind his disappearance in the process.

936.Name: Romeo Must Die
936.Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Jet Li, Aaliyah, Isaiah Washington
936.Outline: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

937.Name: Automata
937.Credit: Dir: Gabe IbÃ¡Ã±ez With: Antonio Banderas, Birgitte Hjort SÃ¸rensen, Dylan McDermott
937.Outline: Jacq Vaucan is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves. What he discovers will have profound consequences for the future of humanity.

938.Name: American Ultra
938.Credit: Dir: Nima Nourizadeh With: Jesse Eisenberg, Kristen Stewart, Connie Britton
938.Outline: A stoner - who is in fact a government agent - is marked as a liability and targeted for extermination. But he's too well-trained and too high for them to handle.

939.Name: Birth
939.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Glazer With: Nicole Kidman, Cameron Bright, Lauren Bacall
939.Outline: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.

940.Name: Jumper
940.Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Hayden Christensen, Samuel L. Jackson, Jamie Bell
940.Outline: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

941.Name: Mercury Rising
941.Credit: Dir: Harold Becker With: Bruce Willis, Miko Hughes, Alec Baldwin
941.Outline: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

942.Name: The Condemned
942.Credit: Dir: Scott Wiper With: Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Nathan Jones
942.Outline: Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor.

943.Name: Transporter 3
943.Credit: Dir: Olivier Megaton With: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova
943.Outline: Frank Martin puts the driving gloves on to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukranian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery and not let his personal feelings get in the way of his dangerous objective.

944.Name: Dragonfly
944.Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Kevin Costner, Susanna Thompson, Joe Morton
944.Outline: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his late wife through his patients near death experiences.

945.Name: Dick Tracy
945.Credit: Dir: Warren Beatty With: Warren Beatty, Madonna, Al Pacino
945.Outline: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

946.Name: Eraser
946.Credit: Dir: Chuck Russell With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Vanessa Williams, James Caan
946.Outline: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

947.Name: V/H/S/2
947.Credit: Dir: Simon Barrett, Jason Eisener With: Lawrence Michael Levine, Kelsy Abbott, Adam Wingard
947.Outline: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.

948.Name: Friday the 13th Part 2
948.Credit: Dir: Steve Miner With: Betsy Palmer, Amy Steel, John Furey
948.Outline: Mrs. Voorhees is dead, and Camp Crystal Lake is shut down, but a camp next to the infamous place is stalked by an unknown assailant. Is it Mrs. Voorhees' son Jason, who did not really drown in the lake some 30 years before?

949.Name: Mission: Impossible II
949.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandie Newton
949.Outline: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

950.Name: Deception
950.Credit: Dir: Marcel Langenegger With: Hugh Jackman, Ewan McGregor, Michelle Williams
950.Outline: An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.

951.Name: Carriers
951.Credit: Dir: David Pastor, Ãlex Pastor With: Chris Pine, Piper Perabo, Lou Taylor Pucci
951.Outline: Four friends fleeing a viral pandemic soon learn they are more dangerous than any virus.

952.Name: Bug
952.Credit: Dir: William Friedkin With: Ashley Judd, Michael Shannon, Harry Connick Jr.
952.Outline: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

953.Name: The Gambler
953.Credit: Dir: Rupert Wyatt With: Mark Wahlberg, Jessica Lange, John Goodman
953.Outline: Lit professor and gambler Jim Bennett's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation is his relationship with one of his students. Will Bennett risk his life for a second chance?

954.Name: The Cable Guy
954.Credit: Dir: Ben Stiller With: Jim Carrey, Matthew Broderick, Leslie Mann
954.Outline: A lonely and disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

955.Name: Taken 3
955.Credit: Dir: Olivier Megaton With: Liam Neeson, Forest Whitaker, Maggie Grace
955.Outline: Ex-government operative Bryan Mills is accused of a ruthless murder he never committed or witnessed. As he is tracked and pursued, Mills brings out his particular set of skills to find the true killer and clear his name.

956.Name: Cowboys & Aliens
956.Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Daniel Craig, Harrison Ford, Olivia Wilde
956.Outline: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

957.Name: Sphere
957.Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone, Samuel L. Jackson
957.Outline: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

958.Name: Red Heat
958.Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, James Belushi, Peter Boyle
958.Outline: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

959.Name: The Hunted
959.Credit: Dir: William Friedkin With: Tommy Lee Jones, Benicio Del Toro, Connie Nielsen
959.Outline: An FBI deep-woods tracker captures a trained assassin who has made a sport of hunting humans.

960.Name: Punisher: War Zone
960.Credit: Dir: Lexi Alexander With: Ray Stevenson, Dominic West, Julie Benz
960.Outline: After hunting down and killing hundreds of violent criminals, Frank Castle, aka The Punisher, faces his most deadly foe yet: Jigsaw.

961.Name: Van Helsing
961.Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh
961.Outline: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

962.Name: The Tourist
962.Credit: Dir: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck With: Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie, Paul Bettany
962.Outline: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

963.Name: Original Sin
963.Credit: Dir: Michael Cristofer With: Antonio Banderas, Angelina Jolie, Thomas Jane
963.Outline: A woman along with her lover, plan to con a rich man by marrying him and on earning his trust running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she actually begins to fall in love with him.

964.Name: Turner & Hooch
964.Credit: Dir: Roger Spottiswoode With: Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham, Craig T. Nelson
964.Outline: A detective must adopt the dog of a dead man to help him find the murderer.

965.Name: Disclosure
965.Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Michael Douglas, Demi Moore, Donald Sutherland
965.Outline: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

966.Name: S.W.A.T.
966.Credit: Dir: Clark Johnson With: Samuel L. Jackson, Colin Farrell, Michelle Rodriguez
966.Outline: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

967.Name: Quarantine
967.Credit: Dir: John Erick Dowdle With: Jennifer Carpenter, Steve Harris, Columbus Short
967.Outline: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.

968.Name: Doomsday
968.Credit: Dir: Neil Marshall With: Rhona Mitra, Bob Hoskins, Alexander Siddig
968.Outline: A futuristic action thriller where a team of people work to prevent a disaster threatening the future of the human race.

969.Name: Thick as Thieves
969.Credit: Dir: Mimi Leder With: Rade Serbedzija, Morgan Freeman, Robert Forster
969.Outline: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

970.Name: Righteous Kill
970.Credit: Dir: Jon Avnet With: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Carla Gugino
970.Outline: Two veteran New York City detectives work on a case of serial executions of criminals who escaped justice.

971.Name: Sahara
971.Credit: Dir: Breck Eisner With: Matthew McConaughey, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Steve Zahn
971.Outline: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

972.Name: Cujo
972.Credit: Dir: Lewis Teague With: Dee Wallace, Daniel Hugh Kelly, Danny Pintauro
972.Outline: A friendly St. Bernard named "Cujo" contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

973.Name: Miami Vice
973.Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Colin Farrell, Jamie Foxx, Li Gong
973.Outline: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

974.Name: Pathology
974.Credit: Dir: Marc SchÃ¶lermann With: Alyssa Milano, Milo Ventimiglia, Keir O'Donnell
974.Outline: A group of medical students devise a deadly game: to see which one of them can commit the perfect murder.

975.Name: The Rite
975.Credit: Dir: Mikael HÃ¥fstrÃ¶m With: Colin O'Donoghue, Anthony Hopkins, CiarÃ¡n Hinds
975.Outline: An American seminary student travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

976.Name: Broken Arrow
976.Credit: Dir: John Woo With: John Travolta, Christian Slater, Samantha Mathis
976.Outline: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

977.Name: Domino
977.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke, Edgar Ramirez
977.Outline: A recounting of Domino Harvey 's life story. The daughter of actor Laurence Harvey turned away from her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

978.Name: The Amityville Horror
978.Credit: Dir: Andrew Douglas With: Ryan Reynolds, Melissa George, Jimmy Bennett
978.Outline: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

979.Name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
979.Credit: Dir: Justin Lin With: Lucas Black, Zachery Ty Bryan, Shad Moss
979.Outline: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

980.Name: World Trade Center
980.Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Nicolas Cage, Michael PeÃ±a, Maria Bello
980.Outline: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

981.Name: The Tall Man
981.Credit: Dir: Pascal Laugier With: Jessica Biel, Jodelle Ferland, William B. Davis
981.Outline: When her child goes missing, a mother looks to unravel the legend of the Tall Man, an entity who allegedly abducts children.

982.Name: Universal Soldier
982.Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dolph Lundgren, Ally Walker
982.Outline: Private Luc Deveraux and his sadistic sergeant, Andrew Scott, got killed in Vietnam. The army uses their bodies for a secret project - reanimating dead soldiers as deadly obedient cyborgs. However, their memories come back too.

983.Name: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
983.Credit: Dir: Paul Weitz With: Chris Massoglia, John C. Reilly, Salma Hayek
983.Outline: Teenager, Darren Shan, meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a Vampire. After a series of events Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque Du Freak and become a Vampire.

984.Name: Dream House
984.Credit: Dir: Jim Sheridan With: Daniel Craig, Rachel Weisz, Naomi Watts
984.Outline: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.

985.Name: The Fourth Kind
985.Credit: Dir: Olatunde Osunsanmi With: Milla Jovovich, Elias Koteas, Will Patton
985.Outline: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.

986.Name: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
986.Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Benjamin Walker, Rufus Sewell, Dominic Cooper
986.Outline: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.

987.Name: After.Life
987.Credit: Dir: Agnieszka Wojtowicz-Vosloo With: Christina Ricci, Liam Neeson, Justin Long
987.Outline: A young woman caught between life and death... and a funeral director who appears to have the gift of transitioning the dead, but might just be intent on burying her alive.

988.Name: The Invasion
988.Credit: Dir: Oliver Hirschbiegel With: Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig, Jeremy Northam
988.Outline: As a Washington psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.

989.Name: 3000 Miles to Graceland
989.Credit: Dir: Demian Lichtenstein With: Kurt Russell, Kevin Costner, Courteney Cox
989.Outline: A gang of ex-cons rob a casino during Elvis convention week.

990.Name: The Brothers Grimm
990.Credit: Dir: Terry Gilliam With: Matt Damon, Heath Ledger, Monica Bellucci
990.Outline: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

991.Name: Snake Eyes
991.Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Nicolas Cage, Gary Sinise, John Heard
991.Outline: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

992.Name: The Peacemaker
992.Credit: Dir: Mimi Leder With: George Clooney, Nicole Kidman, Marcel Iures
992.Outline: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

993.Name: Gone
993.Credit: Dir: Heitor Dhalia With: Amanda Seyfried, Jennifer Carpenter, Wes Bentley
993.Outline: A woman is convinced her kidnapper has returned when her sister goes missing.

994.Name: 88 Minutes
994.Credit: Dir: Jon Avnet With: Al Pacino, Alicia Witt, Ben McKenzie
994.Outline: On the day that a serial killer that he helped put away is supposed to be executed, a noted forensic psychologist and college professor receives a call informing him that he has 88 minutes left to live.

995.Name: The X Files: I Want to Believe
995.Credit: Dir: Chris Carter With: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Billy Connolly
995.Outline: Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.

996.Name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
996.Credit: Dir: Dwight H. Little With: Donald Pleasence, Ellie Cornell, Danielle Harris
996.Outline: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece on Halloween. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

997.Name: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
997.Credit: Dir: Joseph Zito With: Erich Anderson, Judie Aronson, Peter Barton
997.Outline: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

998.Name: The One
998.Credit: Dir: James Wong With: Jet Li, Carla Gugino, Delroy Lindo
998.Outline: A sheriff's deputy fights an alternate universe version of himself who grows stronger with each alternate self he kills.

999.Name: The Haunting in Connecticut
999.Credit: Dir: Peter Cornwell With: Virginia Madsen, Martin Donovan, Elias Koteas
999.Outline: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, and uncover a sinister history.

1000.Name: The Possession
1000.Credit: Dir: Ole Bornedal With: Natasha Calis, Kyra Sedgwick, Jeffrey Dean Morgan
1000.Outline: A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child.

1001.Name: The Host
1001.Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Saoirse Ronan, Max Irons, Jake Abel
1001.Outline: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie will risk everything to protect the people she cares most about, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

1002.Name: Hide and Seek
1002.Credit: Dir: John Polson With: Robert De Niro, Dakota Fanning, Famke Janssen
1002.Outline: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace -- at first -- in her imaginary friend.

1003.Name: Shaft
1003.Credit: Dir: John Singleton With: Samuel L. Jackson, Vanessa Williams, Christian Bale
1003.Outline: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

1004.Name: The 6th Day
1004.Credit: Dir: Roger Spottiswoode With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael Rapaport, Tony Goldwyn
1004.Outline: Futuristic action about a man who meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.

1005.Name: Sanctum
1005.Credit: Dir: Alister Grierson With: Rhys Wakefield, Allison Cratchley, Christopher James Baker
1005.Outline: An underwater cave diving team experiences a life-threatening crisis during an expedition to the unexplored and least accessible cave system in the world.

1006.Name: Jurassic Park III
1006.Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Sam Neill, William H. Macy, TÃ©a Leoni
1006.Outline: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Alan Grant to go to Isla Sorna (the second InGen dinosaur lab.), resulting in an unexpected landing...and unexpected new inhabitants on the island.

1007.Name: Premonition
1007.Credit: Dir: Mennan Yapo With: Sandra Bullock, Julian McMahon, Amber Valletta
1007.Outline: Depressed housewife learns her husband was killed in a car accident the day previously, awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home, and then awakens the next day after to a world in which he is still dead.

1008.Name: First Knight
1008.Credit: Dir: Jerry Zucker With: Sean Connery, Richard Gere, Julia Ormond
1008.Outline: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

1009.Name: Blade: Trinity
1009.Genre: Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Horror | Sci-Fi | Thriller
1009.Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Parker Posey
1009.Outline: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

1010.Name: P2
1010.Credit: Dir: Franck Khalfoun With: Rachel Nichols, Wes Bentley, Simon Reynolds
1010.Outline: A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.

1011.Name: Vertical Limit
1011.Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Scott Glenn, Chris O'Donnell, Bill Paxton
1011.Outline: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.

1012.Name: Battleship
1012.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd, Brooklyn Decker, Liam Neeson
1012.Outline: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

1013.Name: The Grudge
1013.Credit: Dir: Takashi Shimizu With: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, Clea DuVall
1013.Outline: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

1014.Name: The Green Hornet
1014.Credit: Dir: Michel Gondry With: Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Christoph Waltz
1014.Outline: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his father's large company, teams up with his late dad's assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.

1015.Name: Passengers
1015.Credit: Dir: Rodrigo GarcÃ­a With: Anne Hathaway, Patrick Wilson, David Morse
1015.Outline: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

1016.Name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
1016.Credit: Dir: John Singleton With: Paul Walker, Tyrese Gibson, Cole Hauser
1016.Outline: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

1017.Name: The Net
1017.Credit: Dir: Irwin Winkler With: Sandra Bullock, Jeremy Northam, Dennis Miller
1017.Outline: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

1018.Name: Into the Blue
1018.Credit: Dir: John Stockwell With: Paul Walker, Jessica Alba, Scott Caan
1018.Outline: A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

1019.Name: Into the Storm
1019.Credit: Dir: Steven Quale With: Richard Armitage, Sarah Wayne Callies, Matt Walsh
1019.Outline: Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.

1020.Name: Straw Dogs
1020.Credit: Dir: Rod Lurie With: James Marsden, Kate Bosworth, Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd
1020.Outline: L.A. screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

1021.Name: Dante's Peak
1021.Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Pierce Brosnan, Linda Hamilton, Jamie RenÃ©e Smith
1021.Outline: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town named Dante's Peak after a long dormant volcano, which has recently been named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

1022.Name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
1022.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
1022.Credit: Dir: Dave Filoni With: Matt Lanter, Nika Futterman, Tom Kane
1022.Outline: Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt, but political intrigue complicates their mission.

1023.Name: Passenger 57
1023.Credit: Dir: Kevin Hooks With: Wesley Snipes, Bruce Payne, Tom Sizemore
1023.Outline: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

1024.Name: The Descent: Part 2
1024.Credit: Dir: Jon Harris With: Michael J. Reynolds, Shauna Macdonald, Jessika Williams
1024.Outline: Refusing to believe her story about cave-dwelling monsters, the sole survivor of a spelunking exploration gone horribly wrong is forced to follow the authorities back into the caves where something awaits.

1025.Name: The Wolfman
1025.Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Benicio Del Toro, Anthony Hopkins, Emily Blunt
1025.Outline: Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten, and subsequently cursed by, a werewolf.

1026.Name: Gamer
1026.Credit: Dir: Mark Neveldine, Brian Taylor With: Gerard Butler, Michael C. Hall, Ludacris
1026.Outline: In a future mind-controlling game, death row convicts are forced to battle in a 'Doom'-type environment. Convict Kable, controlled by Simon, a skilled teenage gamer, must survive thirty sessions in order to be set free. Or won't he?

1027.Name: The Divide
1027.Credit: Dir: Xavier Gens With: Lauren German, Michael Biehn, Milo Ventimiglia
1027.Outline: Survivors of a nuclear attack are grouped together for days in the basement of their apartment building, where fear and dwindling supplies wear away at their dynamic.

1028.Name: Haywire
1028.Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: Gina Carano, Ewan McGregor, Michael Fassbender
1028.Outline: A black ops super soldier seeks payback after she is betrayed and set up during a mission.

1029.Name: Daylight
1029.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Sylvester Stallone, Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen
1029.Outline: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

1030.Name: Timecop
1030.Credit: Dir: Peter Hyams With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Mia Sara, Ron Silver
1030.Outline: An officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who has a tie to his past.

1031.Name: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
1031.Credit: Dir: Jon M. Chu With: Dwayne Johnson, Channing Tatum, Adrianne Palicki
1031.Outline: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

1032.Name: The Fan
1032.Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Robert De Niro, Wesley Snipes, Ellen Barkin
1032.Outline: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

1033.Name: Gothika
1033.Credit: Dir: Mathieu Kassovitz With: Halle Berry, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Robert Downey Jr.
1033.Outline: A repressed female psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done.

1034.Name: Firewall
1034.Credit: Dir: Richard Loncraine With: Harrison Ford, Virginia Madsen, Paul Bettany
1034.Outline: A security specialist is forced into robbing the bank that he's protecting, as a bid to pay off his family's ransom.

1035.Name: The Gunman
1035.Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: Sean Penn, Idris Elba, Jasmine Trinca
1035.Outline: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

1036.Name: The Forgotten
1036.Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Julianne Moore, Dominic West, Christopher Kovaleski
1036.Outline: After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.

1037.Name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
1037.Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Dennis Quaid, Channing Tatum, Marlon Wayans
1037.Outline: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

1038.Name: Another 48 Hrs.
1038.Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Eddie Murphy, Nick Nolte, Brion James
1038.Outline: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond--this time, to take down The Iceman, a ruthless drug lord operating in the San Francisco bay area.

1039.Name: Mortal Kombat
1039.Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Christopher Lambert, Robin Shou, Linden Ashby
1039.Outline: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

1040.Name: Hard Rain
1040.Credit: Dir: Mikael Salomon With: Morgan Freeman, Christian Slater, Randy Quaid
1040.Outline: In Huntingburg, the armored truck with three million dollars driven by Tom and his Uncle Charlie gets...

1041.Name: Cradle 2 the Grave
1041.Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Jet Li, DMX, Mark Dacascos
1041.Outline: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

1042.Name: Deep Blue Sea
1042.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Thomas Jane, Saffron Burrows, Samuel L. Jackson
1042.Outline: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the bait as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

1043.Name: Striking Distance
1043.Credit: Dir: Rowdy Herrington With: Bruce Willis, Sarah Jessica Parker, Dennis Farina
1043.Outline: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop, and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

1044.Name: Freddy vs. Jason
1044.Credit: Dir: Ronny Yu With: Robert Englund, Ken Kirzinger, Kelly Rowland
1044.Outline: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenage population. Except this time, they're out to get each other, too.

1045.Name: Oldboy
1045.Credit: Dir: Spike Lee With: Josh Brolin, Elizabeth Olsen, Samuel L. Jackson
1045.Outline: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked into solitary confinement for twenty years without reason.

1046.Name: The Paperboy
1046.Credit: Dir: Lee Daniels With: Matthew McConaughey, Nicole Kidman, John Cusack
1046.Outline: A reporter returns to his Florida home-town to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

1047.Name: Hitman: Agent 47
1047.Credit: Dir: Aleksander Bach With: Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware, Zachary Quinto
1047.Outline: An assassin teams up with a woman to help her find her father and uncover the mysteries of her ancestry.

1048.Name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
1048.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Angelina Jolie, Jon Voight, Iain Glen
1048.Outline: Video game adventuress Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

1049.Name: Priest
1049.Credit: Dir: Scott Stewart With: Paul Bettany, Cam Gigandet, Maggie Q
1049.Outline: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.

1050.Name: Sabotage
1050.Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sam Worthington, Terrence Howard
1050.Outline: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

1051.Name: Race to Witch Mountain
1051.Genre: Action | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
1051.Credit: Dir: Andy Fickman With: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, AnnaSophia Robb
1051.Outline: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

1052.Name: Bullet to the Head
1052.Credit: Dir: Walter Hill With: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Momoa, Christian Slater
1052.Outline: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

1053.Name: Cube Zero
1053.Credit: Dir: Ernie Barbarash With: Zachary Bennett, Stephanie Moore, Martin Roach
1053.Outline: A young man whose job is to watch over the Cube endeavours to rescue an innocent woman trapped in one of its rooms.

1054.Name: RoboCop 2
1054.Credit: Dir: Irvin Kershner With: Peter Weller, Belinda Bauer, John Glover
1054.Outline: Cyborg law enforcer Robocop protects the citizens of Detroit by taking on a powerful drug syndicate, while a renegade OCP executive tries to create a new, superior Robocop using a crime lord as its subject.

1055.Name: Reindeer Games
1055.Credit: Dir: John Frankenheimer With: Ben Affleck, Gary Sinise, Charlize Theron
1055.Outline: After assuming his dead cellmate's identity to get with his girlfriend, an ex-con finds himself the reluctant participant in a casino heist.

1056.Name: Open Water
1056.Credit: Dir: Chris Kentis With: Blanchard Ryan, Daniel Travis, Saul Stein
1056.Outline: When two divers find themselves stranded in the ocean, getting rescued becomes the least of their worries when a frenzy of hungry sharks close in on them.

1057.Name: Unfriended
1057.Credit: Dir: Levan Gabriadze With: Heather Sossaman, Matthew Bohrer, Courtney Halverson
1057.Outline: A group of online chat room friends find themselves haunted by a mysterious, supernatural force using the account of their dead friend.

1058.Name: Rambo III
1058.Credit: Dir: Peter MacDonald With: Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Marc de Jonge
1058.Outline: When his friend Colonel Trautman is captured by Soviets during a mission in Afghanistan, John Rambo sets out to rescue him while taking on the brutal tyrant and his army who rule that region.

1059.Name: Jaws 2
1059.Credit: Dir: Jeannot Szwarc With: Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary, Murray Hamilton
1059.Outline: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

1060.Name: Planet of the Apes
1060.Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Mark Wahlberg, Helena Bonham Carter, Tim Roth
1060.Outline: An Air Force astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

1061.Name: The Art of War
1061.Credit: Dir: Christian Duguay With: Wesley Snipes, Anne Archer, Maury Chaykin
1061.Outline: Shaw is an operative for the United Nations' covert dirty-tricks squad, using espionage and quasi-ethical tactics to secure peace and cooperation...

1062.Name: Armored
1062.Credit: Dir: NimrÃ³d Antal With: Columbus Short, Matt Dillon, Laurence Fishburne
1062.Outline: A newbie guard for an armored truck company is coerced by his veteran coworkers to steal a truck containing $42 million. But a wrinkle in their supposedly foolproof plan divides the group, leading to a potentially deadly resolution.

1063.Name: Brick Mansions
1063.Credit: Dir: Camille Delamarre With: Paul Walker, David Belle, RZA
1063.Outline: An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood that's surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.

1064.Name: Friday the 13th Part III
1064.Credit: Dir: Steve Miner With: Dana Kimmell, Tracie Savage, Richard Brooker
1064.Outline: Having revived from his wound, Jason Voorhees; now donning a new appearance, refuges at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds reside there for their vacation, Jason continues his spree.

1065.Name: Perfect Stranger
1065.Credit: Dir: James Foley With: Halle Berry, Bruce Willis, Giovanni Ribisi
1065.Outline: A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.

1066.Name: Paranoia
1066.Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Liam Hemsworth, Gary Oldman, Harrison Ford
1066.Outline: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

1067.Name: The Reaping
1067.Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Hilary Swank, David Morrissey, AnnaSophia Robb
1067.Outline: A former Christian missionary, who specializes in debunking religious phenomena, investigates a small town which seems to be suffering from the 10 biblical plagues.

1068.Name: Escape from L.A.
1068.Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Kurt Russell, Steve Buscemi, Stacy Keach
1068.Outline: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

1069.Name: Sudden Death
1069.Credit: Dir: Peter Hyams With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Powers Boothe, Raymond J. Barry
1069.Outline: A former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

1070.Name: Red Planet
1070.Credit: Dir: Antony Hoffman With: Val Kilmer, Carrie-Anne Moss, Tom Sizemore
1070.Outline: Astronauts, and their robotic dog AMEE (Autonomous Mapping Evaluation and Evasion), search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.

1071.Name: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
1071.Credit: Dir: Steve Miner With: Jamie Lee Curtis, Josh Hartnett, Adam Arkin
1071.Outline: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time and now the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

1072.Name: Lady in the Water
1072.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Paul Giamatti, Bryce Dallas Howard, Jeffrey Wright
1072.Outline: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

1073.Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
1073.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Robert Englund, Rodney Eastman, John Beckman
1073.Outline: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may know the way to defeat him for good.

1074.Name: Fool's Gold
1074.Credit: Dir: Andy Tennant With: Matthew McConaughey, Kate Hudson, Donald Sutherland
1074.Outline: A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.

1075.Name: Cube²: Hypercube
1075.Credit: Dir: Andrzej Sekula With: Kari Matchett, Geraint Wyn Davies, Grace Lynn Kung
1075.Outline: Eight strangers awaken with no memory and find themselves in a puzzling cube shaped room where the laws of physics do not always apply.

1076.Name: Children of the Corn
1076.Credit: Dir: Fritz Kiersch With: Peter Horton, Linda Hamilton, R.G. Armstrong
1076.Outline: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.

1077.Name: Machete Kills
1077.Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Danny Trejo, Alexa PenaVega, Mel Gibson
1077.Outline: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

1078.Name: The Last Exorcism
1078.Credit: Dir: Daniel Stamm With: Patrick Fabian, Ashley Bell, Iris Bahr
1078.Outline: A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.

1079.Name: Cobra
1079.Credit: Dir: George P. Cosmatos With: Sylvester Stallone, Brigitte Nielsen, Reni Santoni
1079.Outline: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far reaching plans.

1080.Name: The Purge
1080.Credit: Dir: James DeMonaco With: Ethan Hawke, Lena Headey, Max Burkholder
1080.Outline: In the future, a wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legalized.

1081.Name: Poseidon
1081.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Richard Dreyfuss, Kurt Russell, Emmy Rossum
1081.Outline: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

1082.Name: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
1082.Credit: Dir: Tim Story With: Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans
1082.Outline: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

1083.Name: Runner Runner
1083.Credit: Dir: Brad Furman With: Ben Affleck, Justin Timberlake, Gemma Arterton
1083.Outline: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.

1084.Name: Wild Card
1084.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Jason Statham, Michael Angarano, Dominik GarcÃ­a-Lorido
1084.Outline: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

1085.Name: Enough
1085.Credit: Dir: Michael Apted With: Jennifer Lopez, Billy Campbell, Tessa Allen
1085.Outline: After running away fails, a terrified woman (Jennifer Lopez) empowers herself in order to battle her abusive husband (Billy Campbell).

1086.Name: Bad Company
1086.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Anthony Hopkins, Chris Rock, Peter Stormare
1086.Outline: When a Harvard-educated CIA agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother.

1087.Name: House at the End of the Street
1087.Credit: Dir: Mark Tonderai With: Jennifer Lawrence, Elisabeth Shue, Max Thieriot
1087.Outline: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy who was the only survivor of the accident.

1088.Name: Snakes on a Plane
1088.Credit: Dir: David R. Ellis With: Samuel L. Jackson, Julianna Margulies, Nathan Phillips
1088.Outline: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly and venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

1089.Name: AVP: Alien vs. Predator
1089.Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Sanaa Lathan, Lance Henriksen, Raoul Bova
1089.Outline: During an archaeological expedition on BouvetÃ¸ya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

1090.Name: The Skulls
1090.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Joshua Jackson, Paul Walker, Hill Harper
1090.Outline: Luke McNamara, a college senior from a working class background joins a secret elitist college fraternity organization called "The Skulls"...

1091.Name: The Black Dahlia
1091.Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Josh Hartnett, Aaron Eckhart, Scarlett Johansson
1091.Outline: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

1092.Name: House on Haunted Hill
1092.Credit: Dir: William Malone With: Geoffrey Rush, Famke Janssen, Taye Diggs
1092.Outline: A millionaire offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

1093.Name: Babylon A.D.
1093.Credit: Dir: Mathieu Kassovitz With: Vin Diesel, Michelle Yeoh, MÃ©lanie Thierry
1093.Outline: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

1094.Name: Money Train
1094.Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Wesley Snipes, Woody Harrelson, Jennifer Lopez
1094.Outline: A vengeful New York transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares; his foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

1095.Name: National Security
1095.Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: Martin Lawrence, Steve Zahn, Colm Feore
1095.Outline: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

1096.Name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
1096.Credit: Dir: Troy Nixey With: Katie Holmes, Guy Pearce, Bailee Madison
1096.Outline: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.

1097.Name: Chain Reaction
1097.Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Keanu Reeves, Morgan Freeman, Rachel Weisz
1097.Outline: Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.

1098.Name: Mission to Mars
1098.Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Tim Robbins, Gary Sinise, Don Cheadle
1098.Outline: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting a unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

1099.Name: The Box
1099.Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Cameron Diaz, James Marsden, Frank Langella
1099.Outline: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

1100.Name: Johnny Mnemonic
1100.Credit: Dir: Robert Longo With: Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren, Dina Meyer
1100.Outline: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

1101.Name: Dark Water
1101.Credit: Dir: Walter Salles With: Jennifer Connelly, Ariel Gade, John C. Reilly
1101.Outline: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building. Adding further drama to their plight, they are targeted by the ghost of former resident.

1102.Name: The Pacifier
1102.Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Vin Diesel, Brittany Snow, Max Thieriot
1102.Outline: Disgraced Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

1103.Name: The Omen
1103.Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Liev Schreiber, Julia Stiles, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick
1103.Outline: A remake of the horror classic The Omen , an American official realizes that his young son may literally be the devil incarnate.

1104.Name: The Scorpion King
1104.Credit: Dir: Chuck Russell With: Dwayne Johnson, Steven Brand, Michael Clarke Duncan
1104.Outline: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

1105.Name: Exit Wounds
1105.Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Steven Seagal, DMX, Isaiah Washington
1105.Outline: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

1106.Name: Stolen
1106.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Nicolas Cage, Malin Akerman, Josh Lucas
1106.Outline: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

1107.Name: Charlie's Angels
1107.Credit: Dir: McG With: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu
1107.Outline: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

1108.Name: The Last Days on Mars
1108.Credit: Dir: Ruairi Robinson With: Liev Schreiber, Elias Koteas, Romola Garai
1108.Outline: A group of astronaut explorers succumb one by one to a mysterious and terrifying force while collecting specimens on Mars.

1109.Name: Dreamcatcher
1109.Credit: Dir: Lawrence Kasdan With: Morgan Freeman, Thomas Jane, Jason Lee
1109.Outline: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

1110.Name: Whiteout
1110.Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: Kate Beckinsale, Gabriel Macht, Tom Skerritt
1110.Outline: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.

1111.Name: Southland Tales
1111.Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Dwayne Johnson, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Seann William Scott
1111.Outline: During a three day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

1112.Name: Beverly Hills Cop III
1112.Credit: Dir: John Landis With: Eddie Murphy, Jon Tenney, Joey Travolta
1112.Outline: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

1113.Name: White Noise
1113.Credit: Dir: Geoffrey Sax With: Michael Keaton, Deborah Kara Unger, Ian McNeice
1113.Outline: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave, becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

1114.Name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
1114.Credit: Dir: Scott Derrickson With: Keanu Reeves, Jennifer Connelly, Kathy Bates
1114.Outline: A remake of the 1951 classic sci-fi film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

1115.Name: Urban Legend
1115.Credit: Dir: Jamie Blanks With: Jared Leto, Alicia Witt, Rebecca Gayheart
1115.Outline: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

1116.Name: Dhoom:3
1116.Credit: Dir: Vijay Krishna Acharya With: Aamir Khan, Katrina Kaif, Abhishek Bachchan
1116.Outline: To avenge his father's death, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics turns thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago. Two cops from Mumbai are assigned to the case.

1117.Name: My Bloody Valentine
1117.Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Jensen Ackles, Jaime King, Kerr Smith
1117.Outline: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one that believes he's innocent.

1118.Name: Collateral Damage
1118.Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, John Leguizamo, Francesca Neri
1118.Outline: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

1119.Name: The Whole Ten Yards
1119.Credit: Dir: Howard Deutch With: Bruce Willis, Matthew Perry, Natasha Henstridge
1119.Outline: Jimmy the Tulip's (Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Perry), whose wife (Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Peet) spring into action.

1120.Name: Drive Angry
1120.Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard, William Fichtner
1120.Outline: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

1121.Name: Teeth
1121.Credit: Dir: Mitchell Lichtenstein With: Jess Weixler, John Hensley, Josh Pais
1121.Outline: Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.

1122.Name: Judge Dredd
1122.Credit: Dir: Danny Cannon With: Sylvester Stallone, Armand Assante, Rob Schneider
1122.Outline: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

1123.Name: The Specialist
1123.Credit: Dir: Luis Llosa With: Sylvester Stallone, Sharon Stone, James Woods
1123.Outline: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

1124.Name: The Core
1124.Credit: Dir: Jon Amiel With: Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Delroy Lindo
1124.Outline: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

1125.Name: Red Dawn
1125.Credit: Dir: Dan Bradley With: Chris Hemsworth, Isabel Lucas, Josh Hutcherson
1125.Outline: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

1126.Name: Red Riding Hood
1126.Credit: Dir: Catherine Hardwicke With: Amanda Seyfried, Lukas Haas, Gary Oldman
1126.Outline: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

1127.Name: I Spy
1127.Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Eddie Murphy, Owen Wilson, Famke Janssen
1127.Outline: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

1128.Name: Killing Season
1128.Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Robert De Niro, John Travolta, Milo Ventimiglia
1128.Outline: Two veterans of the Bosnian War - one American, one Serbian - find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions.

1129.Name: Killers
1129.Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Katherine Heigl, Ashton Kutcher, Tom Selleck
1129.Outline: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

1130.Name: Volcano
1130.Credit: Dir: Mick Jackson With: Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche, Gaby Hoffmann
1130.Outline: A volcano erupts in downtown L.A., threatening to destroy the city.

1131.Name: Stone
1131.Credit: Dir: John Curran With: Edward Norton, Milla Jovovich, Robert De Niro
1131.Outline: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

1132.Name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
1132.Credit: Dir: William Shatner With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
1132.Outline: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.

1133.Name: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
1133.Credit: Dir: Geoff Murphy With: Steven Seagal, Eric Bogosian, Everett McGill
1133.Outline: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

1134.Name: Pathfinder
1134.Credit: Dir: Marcus Nispel With: Karl Urban, Clancy Brown, Moon Bloodgood
1134.Outline: A Viking boy is left behind after his clan battles a Native American tribe. Raised within the tribe, he ultimately becomes their savior in a fight against the Norsemen.

1135.Name: The Messengers
1135.Credit: Dir: Danny Pang, Oxide Chun Pang With: Dylan McDermott, Penelope Ann Miller, Kristen Stewart
1135.Outline: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

1136.Name: Bangkok Dangerous
1136.Credit: Dir: Danny Pang, Oxide Chun Pang With: Nicolas Cage, Charlie Yeung, Shahkrit Yamnarm
1136.Outline: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

1137.Name: Blackhat
1137.Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Chris Hemsworth, Viola Davis, Wei Tang
1137.Outline: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

1138.Name: Max Payne
1138.Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Beau Bridges
1138.Outline: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective whose family was slain as part of a conspiracy and an assassin out to avenge her sister's death. The duo will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

1139.Name: Resident Evil: Retribution
1139.Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Michelle Rodriguez
1139.Outline: Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.

1140.Name: The Eye
1140.Credit: Dir: David Moreau, Xavier Palud With: Jessica Alba, Alessandro Nivola, Parker Posey
1140.Outline: A woman receives an eye transplant that allows her to see into the supernatural world.

1141.Name: The Counselor
1141.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Michael Fassbender, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Cameron Diaz
1141.Outline: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

1142.Name: Masters of the Universe
1142.Credit: Dir: Gary Goddard With: Dolph Lundgren, Frank Langella, Meg Foster
1142.Outline: A prince turned warrior named He-Man battles against the dark lord Skeletor on the planet Eternia. He-Man and his comrades arrive on Earth and discover two teenage lovers to find the magical Cosmic Key.

1143.Name: Turistas
1143.Credit: Dir: John Stockwell With: Josh Duhamel, Melissa George, Olivia Wilde
1143.Outline: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

1144.Name: Hollywood Homicide
1144.Credit: Dir: Ron Shelton With: Harrison Ford, Josh Hartnett, Isaiah Washington
1144.Outline: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

1145.Name: Daredevil
1145.Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell
1145.Outline: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

1146.Name: A Good Day to Die Hard
1146.Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch
1146.Outline: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

1147.Name: The Astronaut's Wife
1147.Credit: Dir: Rand Ravich With: Charlize Theron, Johnny Depp, Joe Morton
1147.Outline: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.

1148.Name: Trespass
1148.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Nicolas Cage, Nicole Kidman, Cam Gigandet
1148.Outline: As they're held for ransom, a husband and wife's predicament grows more dire amid the discovery of betrayal and deception.

1149.Name: Godzilla
1149.Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo
1149.Outline: There is a gigantic monstrous creature who came from the sea that is set loose in Manhattan. Can anyone defeat this monster and kill its babies.

1150.Name: The Colony
1150.Credit: Dir: Jeff Renfroe With: Kevin Zegers, Laurence Fishburne, Bill Paxton
1150.Outline: Forced underground by the next ice age, a struggling outpost of survivors must fight to preserve humanity against a threat even more savage than nature.

1151.Name: One for the Money
1151.Credit: Dir: Julie Anne Robinson With: Katherine Heigl, Jason O'Mara, Daniel Sunjata
1151.Outline: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

1152.Name: The Covenant
1152.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Steven Strait, Sebastian Stan, Toby Hemingway
1152.Outline: Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.

1153.Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
1153.Credit: Dir: Samuel Bayer With: Jackie Earle Haley, Rooney Mara, Kyle Gallner
1153.Outline: The spectre of a dead child rapist haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

1154.Name: A Serbian Film
1154.Credit: Dir: Srdjan Spasojevic With: Srdjan Todorovic, Sergej Trifunovic, Jelena Gavrilovic
1154.Outline: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

1155.Name: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
1155.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Brendan Fraser, Jet Li, Maria Bello
1155.Outline: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

1156.Name: Doom
1156.Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Dwayne Johnson
1156.Outline: Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.

1157.Name: Ghost Rider
1157.Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes, Sam Elliott
1157.Outline: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.

1158.Name: The Stepford Wives
1158.Credit: Dir: Frank Oz With: Nicole Kidman, Bette Midler, Matthew Broderick
1158.Outline: What does it take to become a Stepford wife, a woman perfect beyond belief? Ask the Stepford husbands, who've created this high-tech terrifying little town, in a very modern comedy-thriller.

1159.Name: Shutter
1159.Credit: Dir: Masayuki Ochiai With: Joshua Jackson, Rachael Taylor, James Kyson
1159.Outline: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved.

1160.Name: Apollo 18
1160.Credit: Dir: Gonzalo LÃ³pez-Gallego With: Warren Christie, Lloyd Owen, Ryan Robbins
1160.Outline: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where two American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.

1161.Name: The Lazarus Effect
1161.Credit: Dir: David Gelb With: Olivia Wilde, Mark Duplass, Evan Peters
1161.Outline: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

1162.Name: I, Frankenstein
1162.Credit: Dir: Stuart Beattie With: Aaron Eckhart, Bill Nighy, Miranda Otto
1162.Outline: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

1163.Name: Exorcist: The Beginning
1163.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd, Izabella Scorupco, James D'Arcy
1163.Outline: Years before Father Lancaster Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

1164.Name: Alex Cross
1164.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Tyler Perry, Matthew Fox, Rachel Nichols
1164.Outline: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled serial killer who specializes in torture and pain.

1165.Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child
1165.Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Robert Englund, Lisa Wilcox, Kelly Jo Minter
1165.Outline: Alice, having survived the previous installment of the Nightmare series, finds the deadly dreams of Freddy Krueger starting once again...

1166.Name: Get Carter
1166.Credit: Dir: Stephen Kay With: Sylvester Stallone, Rachael Leigh Cook, Miranda Richardson
1166.Outline: Years ago, Jack Carter left his Seattle home to become a Las Vegas mob casino financial enforcer. He...

1167.Name: Lost in Space
1167.Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Gary Oldman, William Hurt, Matt LeBlanc
1167.Outline: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

1168.Name: The Cave
1168.Credit: Dir: Bruce Hunt With: Piper Perabo, Morris Chestnut, Cole Hauser
1168.Outline: Bloodthirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

1169.Name: Stay Alive
1169.Credit: Dir: William Brent Bell With: Jon Foster, Samaire Armstrong, Frankie Muniz
1169.Outline: For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.

1170.Name: The Happening
1170.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Mark Wahlberg, Zooey Deschanel, John Leguizamo
1170.Outline: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

1171.Name: Agent Cody Banks
1171.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller
1171.Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Frankie Muniz, Hilary Duff, Andrew Francis
1171.Outline: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

1172.Name: Silent Hill: Revelation 3D
1172.Credit: Dir: Michael J. Bassett With: Adelaide Clemens, Kit Harington, Sean Bean
1172.Outline: When her father disappears, Heather Mason is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

1173.Name: Abduction
1173.Credit: Dir: John Singleton With: Taylor Lautner, Lily Collins, Alfred Molina
1173.Outline: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

1174.Name: Stealth
1174.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel, Jamie Foxx
1174.Outline: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

1175.Name: When a Stranger Calls
1175.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Camilla Belle, Tommy Flanagan, Katie Cassidy
1175.Outline: During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

1176.Name: Chernobyl Diaries
1176.Credit: Dir: Bradley Parker With: Jesse McCartney, Jonathan Sadowski, Olivia Taylor Dudley
1176.Outline: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.

1177.Name: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones
1177.Credit: Dir: Christopher Landon With: Andrew Jacobs, Jorge Diaz, Gabrielle Walsh
1177.Outline: When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

1178.Name: Poltergeist
1178.Credit: Dir: Gil Kenan With: Sam Rockwell, Rosemarie DeWitt, Kennedi Clements
1178.Outline: A family whose suburban home is haunted by evil forces must come together to rescue their youngest daughter after the apparitions take her captive.

1179.Name: The Grudge 2
1179.Credit: Dir: Takashi Shimizu With: Amber Tamblyn, Edison Chen, Arielle Kebbel
1179.Outline: Three interwoven stories about a terrible curse. A young woman encounters a malevolent supernatural force while searching for her missing sister in Tokyo; a mean high school prank goes horribly wrong; a woman with a deadly secret moves into a Chicago apartment building.

1180.Name: Darkness Falls
1180.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Liebesman With: Chaney Kley, Emma Caulfield, Antony Burrows
1180.Outline: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

1181.Name: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
1181.Credit: Dir: Rachel Talalay With: Robert Englund, Lisa Zane, Shon Greenblatt
