1181.Outline: Freddy Krueger returns once again to haunt both the dreams of his daughter and Springwood's last surviving teenager.

1182.Name: The Cold Light of Day
1182.Credit: Dir: Mabrouk El Mechri With: Henry Cavill, Bruce Willis, Sigourney Weaver
1182.Outline: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.

1183.Name: Knock Knock
1183.Credit: Dir: Eli Roth With: Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo, Ana de Armas
1183.Outline: When a devoted husband and father is left home alone for the weekend, two stranded young women unexpectedly knock on his door for help. What starts out as a kind gesture results in a dangerous seduction and a deadly game of cat and mouse.

1184.Name: The Darkest Hour
1184.Credit: Dir: Chris Gorak With: Emile Hirsch, Olivia Thirlby, Max Minghella
1184.Outline: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

1185.Name: Seed of Chucky
1185.Credit: Dir: Don Mancini With: Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif, John Waters
1185.Outline: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent son, Glen, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.

1186.Name: The Haunting
1186.Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Liam Neeson, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Owen Wilson
1186.Outline: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

1187.Name: Dracula 2000
1187.Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Gerard Butler, Justine Waddell, Jonny Lee Miller
1187.Outline: A group of thieves break into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

1188.Name: The Roommate
1188.Credit: Dir: Christian E. Christiansen With: Minka Kelly, Leighton Meester, Cam Gigandet
1188.Outline: When college freshman Sara arrives on campus for the first time, she befriends her roommate, Rebecca, unaware that the girl is becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

1189.Name: The Spirit
1189.Credit: Dir: Frank Miller With: Gabriel Macht, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson
1189.Outline: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

1190.Name: The Unborn
1190.Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Odette Annable, Gary Oldman, Cam Gigandet
1190.Outline: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.

1191.Name: Texas Chainsaw 3D
1191.Credit: Dir: John Luessenhop With: Alexandra Daddario, Tania Raymonde, Scott Eastwood
1191.Outline: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.

1192.Name: Elektra
1192.Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: Jennifer Garner, Goran Visnjic, Will Yun Lee
1192.Outline: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

1193.Name: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
1193.Credit: Dir: Colin Strause, Greg Strause With: Reiko Aylesworth, Steven Pasquale, Shareeka Epps
1193.Outline: Warring alien and predator races descend on a small town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

1194.Name: The Marine
1194.Credit: Dir: John Bonito With: John Cena, Kelly Carlson, Robert Patrick
1194.Outline: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

1195.Name: Jonah Hex
1195.Credit: Dir: Jimmy Hayward With: Josh Brolin, Megan Fox, John Malkovich
1195.Outline: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

1196.Name: The Boy Next Door
1196.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman, Kristin Chenoweth
1196.Outline: A recently cheated on married woman falls for a younger man who has moved in next door, but their torrid affair soon takes a dangerous turn.

1197.Name: Psycho
1197.Credit: Dir: Gus Van Sant With: Vince Vaughn, Anne Heche, Julianne Moore
1197.Outline: A young female embezzeler arrives at the Bates Motel which has terrible secrets of its own.

1198.Name: Superhero Movie
1198.Credit: Dir: Craig Mazin With: Drake Bell, Leslie Nielsen, Sara Paxton
1198.Outline: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

1199.Name: The Butterfly Effect 2
1199.Credit: Dir: John R. Leonetti With: Eric Lively, Erica Durance, Dustin Milligan
1199.Outline: Nick Larson discovers a supernatural way to alter his life and travel back in time to key moments in his life by looking at photographs.

1200.Name: Taxi
1200.Credit: Dir: Tim Story With: Queen Latifah, Jimmy Fallon, Gisele BÃ¼ndchen
1200.Outline: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

1201.Name: The Island of Dr. Moreau
1201.Credit: Dir: John Frankenheimer With: David Thewlis, Marlon Brando, Val Kilmer
1201.Outline: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

1202.Name: Jason X
1202.Credit: Dir: James Isaac With: Kane Hodder, Lexa Doig, Jeff Geddis
1202.Outline: Jason Voorhees returns with a new look, a new machete, and his same murderous attitude as he is awakened on a spaceship in the 25th century.

1203.Name: Skyline
1203.Credit: Dir: Colin Strause, Greg Strause With: Eric Balfour, Donald Faison, Scottie Thompson
1203.Outline: Strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the Earth.

1204.Name: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
1204.Credit: Dir: Mark Neveldine, Brian Taylor With: Nicolas Cage, CiarÃ¡n Hinds, Idris Elba
1204.Outline: As Johnny Blaze hides out in Eastern Europe, he is called upon to stop the devil, who is trying to take human form.

1205.Name: xXx: State of the Union
1205.Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Ice Cube, Samuel L. Jackson, Willem Dafoe
1205.Outline: Darius Stone, a new agent in the XXX program, is sent to Washington, DC to defuse a power struggle amongst national leaders.

1206.Name: Striptease
1206.Credit: Dir: Andrew Bergman With: Demi Moore, Burt Reynolds, Armand Assante
1206.Outline: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

1207.Name: Basic Instinct 2
1207.Credit: Dir: Michael Caton-Jones With: Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, David Thewlis
1207.Outline: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

1208.Name: Boogeyman
1208.Credit: Dir: Stephen Kay With: Barry Watson, Emily Deschanel, Lucy Lawless
1208.Outline: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has affected his life.

1209.Name: Halloween: Resurrection
1209.Credit: Dir: Rick Rosenthal With: Jamie Lee Curtis, Busta Rhymes, Brad Loree
1209.Outline: Three years after he last terrorized his sister, Michael Myers confronts her again, before traveling to Haddonfield to deal with the cast and crew of a reality show which is being broadcast from his old home.

1210.Name: Highlander II: The Quickening
1210.Credit: Dir: Russell Mulcahy With: Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Virginia Madsen
1210.Outline: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

1211.Name: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
1211.Credit: Dir: Joe Berlinger With: Jeffrey Donovan, Stephen Barker Turner, Erica Leerhsen
1211.Outline: A group of tourists arrive in Burkittsville, Maryland after seeing "The Blair Witch Project" to explore the mythology and phenomenon, only to come face to face with their own neuroses and possibly the witch herself.

1212.Name: RoboCop 3
1212.Credit: Dir: Fred Dekker With: Nancy Allen, Robert John Burke, Mario Machado
1212.Outline: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

1213.Name: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale
1213.Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Jason Statham, Ron Perlman, Ray Liotta
1213.Outline: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son -- two acts committed by the Krugs, a race of animal-warriors who are controlled by the evil Gallian.

1214.Name: Street Fighter
1214.Credit: Dir: Steven E. de Souza With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Raul Julia, Ming-Na Wen
1214.Outline: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

1215.Name: Speed 2: Cruise Control
1215.Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Sandra Bullock, Jason Patric, Willem Dafoe
1215.Outline: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

1216.Name: The Avengers
1216.Credit: Dir: Jeremiah S. Chechik With: Ralph Fiennes, Uma Thurman, Sean Connery
1216.Outline: Two British agents (John Steed and Emma Peel) team up to stop Sir August De Wynter from destroying the world with a weather changing machine.

1217.Name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
1217.Credit: Dir: John R. Leonetti With: Robin Shou, Talisa Soto, James Remar
1217.Outline: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

1218.Name: The Wicker Man
1218.Credit: Dir: Neil LaBute With: Nicolas Cage, Ellen Burstyn, Leelee Sobieski
1218.Outline: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

1219.Name: Catwoman
1219.Credit: Dir: Pitof With: Halle Berry, Sharon Stone, Benjamin Bratt
1219.Outline: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

1220.Name: Dragonball: Evolution
1220.Credit: Dir: James Wong With: Justin Chatwin, James Marsters, Yun-Fat Chow
1220.Outline: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

1221.Name: Gunday
1221.Credit: Dir: Ali Abbas Zafar With: Ranveer Singh, Arjun Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra
1221.Outline: Two childhood friends travel from Bangladesh to Calcutta during the turbulent 1970s, becoming criminal superstars who both fall for a cabaret dancer.
